story:
Short Summary

Robert Vlašić- director of company Viking ltd. Innovator since he was a little kid. From the beginning into avio modeling, kiting and makeing of car models to multiple international award-winning innovations in the area of ​​personal transportation. 

Among other things, Roberts company Viking ltd is developing with electric vehicles along with a world-renowned "GYRO" vehicle,jet to be seen. We won the Silver Award at the Innova Innovation Fair in Brussels. Successfully implemented "Proof of Concept" project for the vehicle "GYRO " and orbitrike  for the "Orbitrike" road. Golden medal of the Ministry of Science and Technology at the same fair.

Following all mentioned, we are free to offer "E- Bike", an electric bike designed and manufactured in our manufacturing plants in the Republic of Croatia.

What We Need & What You Get

We need funds to provide and support current and fast serial production of bicycles

  • We give 60% discount onE-bike price to reach our goal
  • a little useful gift of surprise with purchuse
  • lifelong gratitude for support
  • We are confident that, with your help,we can reach the goal, in case we do not realize it all  funds collected go to the development of serial production of electric vehicles

Viking E-Bike Bicycle with  1500W electric motor in the rear wheel

Autonomy 70-90 km

Charging time 3 hours (70% capacity), 5 hours (100% capacity)

Maximum speed 25 km / h (limited by some country regulations) or 70km/h unlimited where permitted 

Tires 26" road version  as well as "off road " version

Brakes front and rear disks

Charger located in the body of the bike and only need to connect the cable to the socket (220 V)

The specifications refer to the attached model, but the concept is designed to fit the "Viking E- Bike" needs and therefore we offer models with several 250w, 500w, 1000w 1500w electric motors, as well as various battery kits, and autonomy can be increased or reduced , as needed.

Robert Vlašić- director of company Viking ltd. Innovator since he was a little kid. From the beginning into avio modeling, kiting and makeing of car models to multiple international award-winning innovations in the area of ​​personal transportation.

We won the Silver Award at the Innova Innovation Fair in Brussels. Successfully implemented "Proof of Concept" project for the vehicle "GYRO " and orbitrike  for the "Orbitrike" road. Golden medal of the Ministry of Science and Technology at the same fair.
Following all mentioned, we are free to offer "E- Bike", an electric bike designed and manufactured in our manufacturing plants in the Republic of Croatia.

What We Need & What You Get
We need funds to provide and support current and fast serial production of bicycles

We give 60% discount onE-bike price to reach our goal
a little useful gift of surprise with purchuse
lifelong gratitude for support
We are confident that, with your help,we can reach the goal, in case we do not realize it all  funds collected go to the development of serial production of electric vehicles


Viking E-Bike Bicycle with  1500W electric motor in the rear wheel
Autonomy 70-90 km
Charging time 3 hours (70% capacity), 5 hours (100% capacity)
Maximum speed 25 km / h (limited by some country regulations) or 70km/h unlimited where permitted 
Tires 26" road version  as well as "off road " version
Brakes front and rear disks
Charger located in the body of the bike and only need to connect the cable to the socket (220 V)
The specifications refer to the attached model, but the concept is designed to fit the "Viking E- Bike" needs and therefore we offer models with several 250w, 500w, 1000w 1500w electric motors, as well as various battery kits, and autonomy can be increased or reduced , as needed.

story:
Short Summary

TCB medical is proud to introduce a new epinephrine auto-injector designed for emergency administration of epinephrine in patients who experience severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis).  Most epinephrine injectors are bulky pen shaped devices that are awkward to carry, and consequently, most patients do not carry them. Our device was designed by an allergist to be a small, portable device that attaches to a keychain.  The device goes everywhere your keys go, and is more likely to be available for emergency use when the need arises. The size of the device significantly reduces the burden of carrying epinephrine, and the revolutionary concept of attaching the device to a keychain facilitates access to the device. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our current prototype was produced by a process known as stereolythography. This process produces a material that is relatively soft and is useful for prototypes, but not finished products. We need funding to create the necessary machinery to produce hard plastic devices for production and for the FDA approval process.  Once we receive approval and you have supplied us with a prescription from your doctor, you can receive devices based on your pledge.

The Impact

The success of our device will mean that allergy sufferers everywhere can have easy access to life saving epinephrine.  Most allergy patients do not carry the currently available devices (EPIPEN being the most common).  Our device can change that.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please let anyone you know who has experienced anaphylaxis about our device.

story:
We are in college, and in September 2018, we will be seniors. To us, it seems necessary that our friendship must culminate into forming the Apocalypse Moped Gang (AMG). Arham will be studying abroad in England throughout next year, and will be back in Middletown, CT at Wesleyan University in September 2018. Ben will remain at Wesleyan. Two things are certain - first, that they will both count the number of days till they reunite, and second, that their mutual desire for The Destroyer and The Annihilator will only grow with time. 

Unfortunately, neither of us can invest in a moped ourselves. We want your help in making possible the best year of our collective lives, where the AMG will play a central part. With your help, upon Arham's return in September 2018, Ben and Arham may finally create the AMG - fulfillment will follow soon afterwards! Thank you for visiting our page!

story:
The Professionals TV RS2000 PNO 672R (seen as PNO 641T in the show) will soon be back from bodywork restoration. However, this alone has cost me more money than I have.

To complete the car there are still various items that need attention like the interior and the repair of the infamous Hollandia sunroof.

This alone will add another £10,000 to the restoration and as such there are no funds left; hence the reason for this fund-raiser - as I'm sure many people will want to see the car finished rather than languish for another decade. 

For everyones benefit this is a target met fundraiser which means if it doesn't reach the desired amount your pledges will be returned.

Several patented after-image technologies create a message that clearly communicates to upcoming traffic.

S.Light is very effective if you experience trouble on a boat, allowing you to get help more quickly.

story:
The VEXA500 is a commuter-friendly eBike that is jam-packed with features unlike any other electric bike on the market that is available at this low price. With the VEXA500, you can get where you need to go in a smarter, faster and greener fashion. Don’t let morning or afternoon traffic continue to be a constant challenge for you; the VEXA500 offers an alternative form of transportation that takes urban mobility to a whole new level while also improving your travel needs. 

Stop spending money on gas and pesky parking fees, and start reducing your carbon footprint with the VEXA500. This rapidly accelerating eBike has so many different features, similar to that of a motorcycle, that you'll forget you're even riding a bike!







What's the deal with shipping?

With shipping, there are a few different options to choose from:

OPTION 1 - Pledge once for your VEXA500 of choice and include shipping costs in your initial contribution. Click the VEXA500 perk in the color of your choice. On the next page, add an additional gift and click "Custom" to enter your shipping cost. It’s that easy! For shipping to the U.S.*, add an additional $199 and for Canada, add an additional $229 (*Unfortunately, the VEXA500 cannot be shipped to Alaska or Hawaii). 

OPTION 2 - If you’ve already pledged to get your VEXA500 and forgot to add shipping, no worries! Simply back the project again and select the shipping perk for either the U.S. or Canada!

OPTION 3 - If you happen to be in the area, you can always pick up your VEXA500 from the VEXA500 team’s Hawthorne facility in California. This option does not require shipping costs, but California residents will be subject to CA sales tax that will be collected upon delivery or pickup. If you're a CA backer and choose not to include shipping, just privately comment on the page and we'll let you know where to go from there!

Wondering about shipping insurance?

You can also pledge an additional $25 for shipping insurance. At times, packages can be damaged* or even lost or stolen along the way (*to prevent damage, we are sure to pack the VEXA500s up with extra care). We want to make sure that you’re covered just in case anything should happen to your VEXA500, so we have opened up this option to you!

The market for eBikes has recently become very crowded, but the VEXA500 team felt there was room for something a little different. The VEXA500 team began focusing their attention on marketing a low-cost eBike in the U.S. with the help of a crowdfunding campaign to bring the most feature-packed electric bike to you.


We chose to do a crowdfunding campaign to help the clean transportation movement by making eBikes more readily available in the United States. 

When dealing with large objects, such as the VEXA500, there are bound to be risks and challenges, especially when it comes to shipping. There is always a risk of manufacturing delays and other obstacles. In order to avoid any setbacks in getting the VEXA500 delivered to you, we've made sure to set realistic shipping dates to ensure that you'll receive them on time.

GENERAL

Does the VEXA500 come fully assembled?

No, the handlebar assembly has to be turned to the proper position and locked down. The front wheel, wire basket, mirrors, and pedals are attached and the battery pack is installed. The entire procedure takes a little over an hour with minimal hand tools and comes with a detailed, illustrated instruction booklet. 

How will my VEXA500 be delivered?

Your VEXA500 will be delivered to your door in two cartons. The main carton will be 125 pounds, 64" x 12" x 39" and will hold your eBike. The second, smaller carton will house the battery pack, weighing in at 48 pounds and sized at 12.25" x 10" x 5.35". 

Is the VEXA500 covered by a warranty?

Yes, there's a limited one-year warranty against defects in materials or workmanship. You'll find a printed copy of the warranty inside the box when you receive your VEXA500. 

Are replacement parts available?

Our facility, located in Hawthorne, California, will have a full inventory of commonly replaced parts such as tires, tubes, batteries, brake levers and other items. 

PERFORMANCE

How fast does the VEXA500 go?

The VEXA500 meets all laws with respect to speeds and goes up to 20 mph. Most states limit electric bike speeds to 20 mph. The Federal Electric Bicycle law limits electric bike speeds to 20 mph as well. Some electric bike manufacturers claim higher speeds than this, but they are not in compliance with the law. 

How do I know how much life is left in my battery?

You'll be able to clearly see the amount of charge remaining in the battery pack on the VEXA500's dashboard. 

How long before I have to replace the battery pack?

The lead acid battery pack used in the VEXA500 will last three to four years before requiring replacement. 

Does the charger automatically shut off when the batteries are fully charged?

Yes.

LEGAL

Where can the VEXA500 be legally driven in the United States?

At this time, eBikes are not permitted in New York State. The VEXA500 complies with all known eBike requirements in every other state in the US. In most instances, you can ride your VEXA500 anywhere that you can ride a conventional bicycle. Some states may limit bike trails to pedal power only. 

Do I need a driver's license or registration?

In most cases, you will not need a license or registration. For all intents and purposes, state regulations treat eBikes the same as conventional bicycles. Because rules and regulations are constantly changing, we recommend that you research eBike regulations in your state.

Is there a minimum age to legally ride an eBike?

Yes, in most states. The minimum age varies from state to state but is generally in the age range of 14 to 16.

What are the requirements for safety equipment?

Some states do require a helmet on eBike riders; it's just a matter of checking your state's requirements. We strongly recommend wearing a helmet when riding the VEXA500 or any other bike. 

Help us spread the word! 

The VEXA500 electric bike is currently not available in the United States at this incredibly low price. Only you can help us bring this bike to the U.S. at an affordable price by supporting our Indiegogo campaign. By enlisting a large number of supporters, we will be able to bring this bike to you at an amazingly low cost. Together, we can help minimize pollution and bring people a fun and clean method of affordable transportation. Please help us by sharing our campaign with your friends and family to bring VEXA500 here!

story:
The Innovative New Way To Get Around Town! 

               

                                             

                                            



                               

                                           

                                                   

                                                              


                                                   For Press Kit Click Here

                                          The ScootMatic Experience 

We wanted to create something unique, innovative and smooth. With the feel of a bike but a features of a scooter. Something Light, Powerful, Silent, Beautiful, Fun, Comfortable & GREEN.


We created it. The ScootMatic is the most innovative bike/scooter combo ever. Thanks to our brushless motor system we are able to achieve a light weight vehicle, weighing in at 39 LBS (18 KG) and holding a riding weight of 265 LBS. The ScootMatic has many great features including:

  • 500W Engine
  • Unique Folding Concept
  • Bluetooth Speakers
  • USB Charger
  • Remote Control Starter
  • LED Screen
  • Hydraulic Disk Brakes
  • Front & Rear Suspension
  • Samsung Lithium Batteries
  • German Core Motor
  • WaterProof
  • Leather Saddle
  • LED Front Lights
  • Made with Aviation Aluminum
  • Car-like Alarm System
  • & Much More!


    •                                       

    The ScootMatic has extended range for your urban or suburban lifestyle. It can be used instead of or with public transportation, and can help you reach your destination with a fun and exciting vehicle!

    • 28 mile range on one charge (45 KM)
    • Approx. 16 MPH speeds (25 KM)
    • Compact after folding:  (Laying Down) - Height: 22 inches | Length: 48 inches|

                         The ScootMatic is the new way to get around town! 

                                                    

    EXTRAS: The ScootMatic Phone Pack

    The Scootmatic phone back is the perfect accessory to go along with the ScootMatic. 

    Features Include:

    • Phone Holder (Fits all types of Mobile Phones: iPhone 5, 6, 6+, and Samsung Phones)
    • Ability to enable GPS for directions while you ride
    • Pouch to carry your valuables
    • Made out of High Quality PU

    See the "Perks" section to get the holder for an added $39!

    A Great Design

    Simple, sleek, “K” Dynamic Design. The ScootMatic has an ultra-modern look. All the functions of the ScootmMatic are smoothly integrated in pure shapes and work in harmony together. The slick folding design makes it easy to fit at work or at home. Turn heads with the ScootMatic.

    A Great Engine

    One of the reasons the ScootMatic is so light is the innovative brush-less engine. This engine provides a high level of integration, power, and density to achieve a highly reduced weight. 

    An Incredible Riding Experience

    Not only the coolest but the smoothest ride in town…

    • Hydraulic Disk Brakes
    • Brake Power Protection
    • Front and Rear Suspensions
    • Four Different Gears for all Different Surfaces

    All of these feautres  are combined to create a humanized operating system to assure the user complete safety while riding the ScootMatic.

    A Smart Folding System

    The folding system makes the ScootMatic very compact. When folded the ScootMatic laying horizontally is Height 22 Inches & Length 48 Inches and a Width of 9.5 Inches. 

                                    

    You can easily lay it horizontally under your desk while charging The ScootMatic at work or stand it up vertically to a power outlet at a bar or restaurant. The ScootMatic can charge anytime and anywhere! 

    When Done Riding Fold in Easy Second!

    The rolling feature allows you to take your ScootMatic anywhere conveniently!

    Incredible Extras

    Enjoy all the incredible extra features of the ScootMatic:

    • USB Charging Interface
    • Keyless Start System
    • Waterproof Bluetooth Speakers
    • LED Screen (Temperature Display)
    • Car-Like Alarm System 
    • & Throttle Drive!

    Development Status

    We have worked vigorously on the ScootMatic and now have our working prototypes ready to go, we are now focused on:

    • Making final tweaks on our branding
    • Finalizing quality control systems
    • Developing accessories 
    Take the ScootMatic anywhere, anytime!

    The Suburbs - or the city! 

    Check out the ScootMatic in downtown Seattle! 

    Why We Need Your Support:

    We’ve been working on ScootMatic now for over a year. Unlike many other technology projects on Indiegogo the SONT INC team has had the experience of bringing many projects to life. The ScootMatic has been a lot of work and the team at SONT has been working day and night to bring this to the world. Your support will allow us to make the ScootMatic even better and prove that the future is now!

    So why should you contribute with us?

    • You’ll be the first to get a ScootMatic
    • You’ll save money, you’ll save time, and you’ll make your transportation more fun.
    • Make it real for people and build trust.

     

                                             

    About SONT Inc.

    We sell products through our network of web sites utilizing the full spectrum of advertising and promotion.

    Our building in downtown Everett serves as our office and showroom. A mere stone's throw away from the railroad and the Everett docks, this central location is located perfectly for our current operations and helps with our expansion plans.

    Branding & Promotion:
    We make sure that every step of product development is adhered to as we turn an idea into a product which we forge into a brand that we market to the world.
    Product Development:
    SONT specializes in product development including brand development and market research. We find manufacturing sources for products and develop marketing plans for these brands.
    Innovation Team:
    We have product development and marketing experts who can take an idea, realize it as a product and market it to the world. This is what we do.
    SONT Team:

    GEORGE JARJOUR

    George Jarjour is the COO of SONT TV INC. He graduated from University of Washington in 2010. George Jarjour not only works full-time but will also graduate from his MBA in Entrepreneurship and Leadership in December of 2016.

    SAMI JARJOUR

    Sami is the Social Media Strategist of SONT TV Inc. He recently graduate from Chapman University in Southern California, in May of 2016. Sami worked full-time will completing his undergraduate degree. Sami is excited to have an open schedule in order to continue to the success and group of the Seen On Screen TV team. 

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Will the production bikes be the same exact ones as seen in the video and pictures?

    No, they are going to be branded with ScootMatic and SONT logos.

    How do I choose the color?

    Once the campaign ends we will send you a survey to choose your color.

    Can we do a test ride?

    If you live in the Seattle area absolutely, anytime! 

    Is there a warranty?

    The Scootmatic is completely protected with a one year warranty.

    How do I get replacement parts?

    You’ll be able to get replacement parts at our online store that will be opening after the campaign ends at http://www.scootmatic.com. 

    Technical Info:

    How much does the Scootmatic weigh?

    The Scootmatic weights 39 LBS

    What kind of charger does it come with?

    We have standard 120V for US Markets. However, we will match the charger to the country we are shipping to.

    What’s the top speed of the Scootmatic?

    The Scootmatic can easily achieve 15 MPH on flat surface. All bikes have a speedometer to track how fast you are going. Easily achieve over 25 MPH downhill.

    Do I need to wear a helmet?

    They are required by law in some places and optional in other places. We always encourage safety! 

    Payments & Shipping

    How much is shipping?

    USA is $99 and International is $149

    When does it ship?

    We will ship in Mid-Late September. And anticipate the bike to arrive to the customers by first week of October.

    Can I get a Refund?

    Please refer to IndieGoGo’s policy (Link Here)

We
created it. The ScootMatic is the most innovative bike/scooter combo ever. Thanks to our brushless motor system we are able to achieve a light weight
vehicle, weighing in at 39 LBS (18 KG) and holding a riding weight of 265 LBS. The ScootMatic has many great features including:

500W Engine 
Unique Folding Concept
Bluetooth Speakers
USB Charger 
Remote Control Starter
LED Screen
Hydraulic Disk Brakes
Front & Rear Suspension
Samsung Lithium Batteries
German Core Motor
WaterProof 
Leather Saddle
LED Front Lights 
Made with Aviation Aluminum
Car-like Alarm System
& Much More!











                                      
The
ScootMatic has extended range for your
urban or suburban lifestyle. It can be used instead of or with public
transportation, and can help you reach your destination with a fun and exciting vehicle! 


28 mile range on one charge (45 KM)

Approx. 16 MPH speeds (25 KM)

Compact after folding: 
(Laying Down) - Height: 22 inches | Length: 48 inches|

                     The
ScootMatic is the new way to get around town! 

                                                

EXTRAS: The ScootMatic Phone Pack
The Scootmatic phone back is the perfect accessory to go along with the ScootMatic. 
Features Include:


Phone Holder (Fits all types of Mobile Phones: iPhone 5, 6, 6+, and Samsung Phones)
Ability to enable GPS for directions while you ride
Pouch to carry your valuables
Made out of High Quality PU









See the "Perks" section to get the holder for an added $39!
A Great
Design
Simple, sleek, “K” Dynamic Design. The
ScootMatic has an ultra-modern look. All the functions of the ScootmMatic are
smoothly integrated in pure shapes and work in harmony together. The slick
folding design makes it easy to fit at work or at home. Turn heads with the
ScootMatic.





A Great
Engine
One
of the reasons the ScootMatic is so light
is the innovative brush-less engine. This engine provides a high level of
integration, power, and density to achieve a highly reduced weight. 


An Incredible Riding Experience


Not only the coolest but the smoothest ride
in town…




Hydraulic Disk Brakes
Brake Power Protection
Front and Rear Suspensions
Four Different Gears for all Different Surfaces


All of these feautres  are combined to create a humanized operating
system to assure the user complete safety while riding the ScootMatic.



A Smart
Folding System
The
folding system makes the ScootMatic very compact. When folded the ScootMatic
laying horizontally is Height 22 Inches & Length 48 Inches and a Width of 9.5
Inches. 

                                
You can easily lay it horizontally under your desk while charging The
ScootMatic at work or stand it up vertically to a power outlet at a bar or
restaurant. The ScootMatic can charge anytime and anywhere! 



When
Done Riding Fold in Easy Second!


The rolling feature allows you to take your ScootMatic anywhere conveniently!


Incredible
Extras
Enjoy all
the incredible extra features of the ScootMatic:


USB Charging Interface
Keyless Start System
Waterproof Bluetooth Speakers
LED Screen (Temperature Display)
Car-Like Alarm System 
& Throttle Drive!




Development Status
We
have worked vigorously on the ScootMatic and now have our working prototypes ready to go, we are
now focused on:

Making final tweaks on our
     branding
Finalizing quality control
     systems
Developing accessories 

Take the ScootMatic anywhere, anytime!

The Suburbs - or the city! 

Check out the ScootMatic in downtown Seattle! 



Why We Need Your
Support:


We’ve
been working on ScootMatic now for over a year. Unlike many other technology
projects on Indiegogo the SONT INC team has had the experience of bringing many
projects to life. The ScootMatic has been a lot of work and the team at SONT
has been working day and night to bring this to the world. Your support will
allow us to make the ScootMatic even better and prove that the future is now!
So
why should you contribute with us?

You’ll be the first to get a
     ScootMatic

You’ll save money, you’ll
     save time, and you’ll make your transportation more fun.
Make it real for people and
     build trust.

 


                                          


About SONT Inc.





We sell products through our network of web sites utilizing the full spectrum of advertising and promotion.
Our building in downtown Everett serves as our office and showroom. A mere stone's throw away from the railroad and the Everett docks, this central location is located perfectly for our current operations and helps with our expansion plans.





Branding & Promotion:

We make sure that every step of product development is adhered to as we turn an idea into a product which we forge into a brand that we market to the world.

Product Development:
SONT specializes in product development including brand development and market research. We find manufacturing sources for products and develop marketing plans for these brands.

Innovation Team:
We have product development and marketing experts who can take an idea, realize it as a product and market it to the world. This is what we do.

SONT Team:

GEORGE JARJOUR




George Jarjour is the COO of SONT TV INC. He graduated from University of Washington in 2010. George Jarjour not only works full-time but will also graduate from his MBA in Entrepreneurship and Leadership in December of 2016.
SAMI JARJOUR





Sami is the Social Media Strategist of SONT TV Inc. He recently graduate from Chapman University in Southern California, in May of 2016. Sami worked full-time will completing his undergraduate degree. Sami is excited to have an open schedule in order to continue to the success and group of the Seen On Screen TV team. 

Frequently Asked Questions
Will the production
bikes be the same exact ones as seen in the video and pictures?
No, they are going to be branded with ScootMatic and SONT logos.
How do I choose the
color?
Once the campaign ends we will send you a survey to choose
your color.
Can we do a test
ride?
If you live in the Seattle area absolutely, anytime! 
Is there a warranty?
The Scootmatic is completely protected with a one year
warranty. 
How do I get
replacement parts?
You’ll be able to get replacement parts at our online store
that will be opening after the campaign ends at http://www.scootmatic.com.  
Technical Info:
How much does the Scootmatic
weigh?
The Scootmatic weights 39 LBS
What kind of charger
does it come with?
We have standard 120V for US Markets. However, we will match
the charger to the country we are shipping to. 
What’s the top speed
of the Scootmatic? 
The Scootmatic can easily achieve 15 MPH on flat surface.
All bikes have a speedometer to track how fast you are going. Easily achieve
over 25 MPH downhill.
Do I need to wear a
helmet?
They are required by law in some places and optional in
other places. We always encourage safety! 
Payments & Shipping
How much is shipping?
USA is $99 and International is $149
When does it ship?
We will ship in Mid-Late September. And anticipate the bike
to arrive to the customers by first week of October.
Can I get a Refund?
Please refer to IndieGoGo’s policy (Link Here)

story:
Good day!

My name is Jacek, I’m most thankful for visiting our Indiegogo campaign.

 

Not interested in drones? Please support our project with 1$, thank you!

 

LGE stands for Liquid Gravity Engine. 

 

 
Do you like drones? Well we’ve got news for you. LGE takes drones flying to all new level of fun.
 

 

The engine is installed inside a waterproof body, there are no moving parts or propellers on the outside. It’s a flying waterproof sphere, not affected by wind* or any kind of weather, fly it in air and feel free to dive underwater* anytime.

 
There’s a camera eye and connectors on the bottom, beside this… the body is solid, you can paint it or dress it. You can be piloting a disco-ball, a death star, a gigantic eyeball…. Whatever you’re in to. Oh and another thing, flying propeller drones is fun, but flying an LGE is a completely new thing, it’s more like commanding an object to move around space, rather than fighting air to keep up.
* Details in specification.
 

LGE Drone 1: First drone using LGE engine. Sphere shape, no outside propellers or moving parts.
All weather proof / not affected by wind (up to 6 points bs). Waterproof /can dive up to 1,8 m (5 ft). Bump-proof soft leather-like coating.
 
Drone equipment:

 

Live streaming video quality: 720p
Levitate / flight time: 30 - 40 minutes
Max speed: 60 km/h (37 mph)
Max altitude: 122 m as per FAA regulation, user adjustable (400 ft)
Communication: Secure WiFi network, 2.4 GHz
Weight: 1,5 Kg (3.3 lbs) (With dock weight included). Dimensions: Diam 25 cm (10 inch)
Battery charge time: 50 - 65 minutes (6000 mAh version)
Control app requirements: iOS 8.0 or later / Android 4.3 or later
Drone equipment:
- 1 wide angle camera unit 720p
- Ultra-white LED torch
- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio sensors
Also in package:
- Dock with radio sensors
- AC Dock charger 110 / 230 V
- Receiver (no internal storage / SD card expandable)
- AC Receiver charger 110 / 230 V
- Control unit with micro USB mobile phone connector
- Software (Flashdrive or provided download link) + instruction
Before you ask…
- The length of stored recording depends on SD card capability and video settings
- The drone is water / all-weather / wind (up to 6 points) proof
- The dock and charger are not waterproof
- This drone can operate in temperature: from -15 to 45 deg. Celsius / from 5 to 113 deg. Fahrenheit.
- In case of air temperature below -5 C / 23 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperature
- In case of air temperature above 30 C /  86 F the dock should be placed / charging take place in shadowed area.
- Drone equipped with a 1/4 inch screw mount bay.*
- Drone is capable of lifting external weight of 0,8 KG (1.7 lbs)*
* In case equipment is installed through mount bay, auto-docking and manual docking is unavailable.

LGE Security Drone description:
Security drone equipped with 3 wide angle cameras (night vision included) and one bottom torch (24 super-white LED).
The drone can be programmed to fly around property (follow programmed path) and stream live video to receiver, once batteries reach 15%, drone automatically returns to dock to charge up. Once battery recharges, drone resumes to follow programmed path. Drone can be programmed to  automatically start programmed patrol on particular weekdays and hours. In case the drone meets any problems (interception, lack of communication) the dock / receiver sounds an alarm.

 

Drone equipment:
- 3 wide angle camera units 720p with night vision
- 24 LED torch
- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio sensors
Also in package:
- Dock with radio sensors
- AC Dock charger 110 /230 V
- Receiver (no internal storage / SD card expandable)
- AC Receiver charger 110 /230 V
- Control unit with micro USB mobile phone connector
- Software (Flashdrive or download link) and instruction
Before you ask…
- It is easy to set / update drone’s patrol patch and time, thanks to “step by step” instruction and software wizard
- The length of stored patrol recording depends on SD card capability and video settings
- The drone can be operated manually anytime (controlled with the included control unit), without cancelling patrol memory.
- The drone is water / all-weather / wind (up to 6 points) proof
- The dock and charger are not waterproof
- This drone can operate in temperature: from -15 to 45 deg. Celsius / from 5 to 113 deg. Fahrenheit.
In case of air temperature below -5 C / 23 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperature
In case of air temperature above 30 C /  86 F the dock should be placed / charging take place in shadowed area.
 


LGE Show Drone description:
Drone for carrying advertisements, it is not equipped with camera or torch.
The drone can be programed to follow programmed path (for example fly in front of a store), once batteries reach 15%, drone automatically returns to dock to charge up. Once battery recharges, drone resumes to follow programmed path. Drone can be programmed to  automatically start programmed path on particular weekdays and hours. In case the drone meets any problems (interception, lack of communication) the dock / receiver sounds an alarm.
Drone equipment:
- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio sensors
Also in package:
- Dock with radio sensors
- AC Dock charger 110 /230 V
- Receiver (no internal storage)
- AC Receiver charger 110 /230 V
- Control unit with micro USB mobile phone connector
- Software (Flashdrive or download link) and instruction
Before you ask…
- It is easy to set / update drone’s fly patch and time, thanks to “step by step” instruction and software wizard
- The drone can be operated manually anytime (controlled with the included control unit), without cancelling path memory.
- The drone is water / all-weather / wind (up to 6 points) proof
- The dock and charger are not waterproof
- This drone can operate in temperature: from -25 to 55 deg. Celsius / from -13 to 131 deg. Fahrenheit.
In case of air temperature below -15 C / 5 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperature
In case of air temperature above 35 C /  95 F the dock should be placed / charging take place in shadowed area.
 

 

 

 

It all started back in 2012 when me and Pawel came up with and started working on this project, at first it was a chain of fails, but we didn't give up...  it took almost a year to apply corrections and almost another year to create final version the liquid capable of working correctly inside this high pressure engine. Of course both of us have work, families, kids, it was very hard to accord our everyday life with this project. 

 

 

On the 3rd of August 2015 the prototype was finally ready, it worked for 9 seconds, it stayed 2 meters above ground, caring weight of 1 KG, for 9 long seconds and... crashed (breaking also the garage door). 9 long seconds, before it broke. We have fixed it, upgraded a little and today- we hold a working unit, a result of a beautiful idea and 3 years of hard work.

We can’t stop now, at this moment our engine is still unstable, and sometimes unpredictable, due to all corrections, fixes, rebuilding, and mistakes we have made from the beginning. We have to complete the new unit, same one but made correctly from the start, with a laser precision, then once all final blueprints are ready- we are ready to order first part of LGE drones (500 - 3000 units, depending on demand). The drones project is completed, missing only final engine.

After presenting our engine at Baltic 2 Expo, we were offered founding, however in each case we would lose rights to all our work, including the patent. We decided to try raising founds ourselves. We have one investor, University of Jagiellonian Professor, who agreed to found a part of the project in return for a part of future shareholding. We are still short, we ask for your help, each dollar counts. Help us build better tomorrow.

 

Please support our project with 1$, thank you!

 


How does it work?
Long story - short: The liquid inside opposite rotating wheels produces centrifugal energy, proper distribution of liquid’s mass causes the device to maintain a constant directional pull. The most of the success lies in the liquid’s formula (patent pending), the viscosity, weight, magnetic properties etc. are a result of endless calculations, experiments and tests.

 

 


What does it mean to you?
That the whole world will change my friend! The technology opens door for completely new type of engines, one step at a time and we will have flying segways next decade . You always knew that all those levitating devices and flying cars seen in Sci-Fi movies are coming sooner or later, we’ll here’s a real chance to make it come “sooner” than “later”.


Just imagine – a completely “clean” - environmentally friendly, quiet engine that can use any energy (electricity, gas, any type of fuel) to run, sealed - not requiring any maintenance, oil refilling etc., not producing any waste or pollution, capable of working in any environment (underwater, land, air), and… what’s most important – capable of moving any direction, including up and sustaining there. The technology is baby now, but a baby with a great potential, we have the engine itself and drones coming up, but just think what will we have next years…
If you are not interested in ordering a drone, we would appreciate your support of our project: 1$ (please see perks). Thank you.

 

The money plan, assuming ordering 800 pcs of drones
We need money for...
USD 6 500 is required for completing engine project
USD 800 is required for patent & fees purposes
USD 240 000 is required for manufacturing 800 pcs of drone complete sets
USD 20 000 is required for shipping / duty purposes
USD 2 800 is required for documentation
USD 3 200 is required for ordering professional advertisement clips
Total: USD 273 300.
We have USD 151 000
We need founding: USD 122 300

 

Please support us with any amount, each dollar counts.

 

You can order your drone today (please see perks), to be sure that you will receive the drone upon its premiere.
Ordering drone means supporting LGE technology development, the selected drone package will be shipped to you as soon as the final product is ready. 

No additional charges for drone, equipment or it's shipping shall be charged. The provided date of shipping is estimated and can change, the price of drone is estimated, however in case the final product turns out to be more expensive, you will NOT be asked to pay more. In case all required founding is  not received, drones will be sent to those who ordered anyway, only the premiere date can change. The premiere date (drones sending) depends on technology and manufacture success.

 
Thank you for your interest in our campaign.
 

Just imagine how much can the world change once LGE engine is ready. We already proved that the engine can carry itself + additional weight of abt 800 grams, of course we would like to tell you that it will be shortly ready carry people and cargo, but it's not that easy. When it comes to propeller engines, the rule is simple - build a bigger propeller so it has more power, in case of LGE engine this does not apply, for each engine size different amount of liquid should be used, depending on this the size and amount of wheels will be different, and each size, weight & amount of wheels must be controlled with a updated control unit, gyroscope and etc. Each LGE engine is designed for a specific size / maximum weight, in case of any change- everything must be recalculated and redesigned.


Karl Johnson, from Tech-News wrote:
(...) The first device using the LGE engine will be a drone. Why a drone not a flying car? The answer is simple, for the moment the company is capable of producing an LGE engine that can lift up itself plus 1 or 2 more pounds only. (...)
Let us disagree, we are capable of producing and LGE capable of flying a car, however in this case we would need a LOT greater money for start. Let's make the drones first.p

Please support us with 1$ or share this campaign, each type of support is much appreciated. 

In case you have any questions, please feel free to write me.
Thank you. Jacek Warchol.

story:
Built on passion and ingenuity

Our founders have a strong passion for cars, as well as a strong goal to make this world a better place for everyone. People can lose everything in seconds, their assets, and more importantly, their loved ones. Our goal is to make an impact on that, to prevent as many car fires as possible. It's time to end this!

On average, 345 people die from vehicle fires every year.

Each year, from 2014 to 2016, an estimated 171,500 highway vehicle fires occurred in the United States, resulting in an annual average of 345 deaths; 1,300 injuries; and $1.1 billion in property loss. These highway vehicle fires accounted for 13 percent of fires responded to by fire departments across the nation.

Our Mission

Americans spend an average of 17,600 minutes driving each year. Our main goal is to make those commutes as safe as possible. The mechanisms we're developing will be able to prevent any kind of fire, in any of vehicle's compartments. We care about your safety and your assets!

Product

A mechanism that will detect and put out any without any harm to the passengers and minimal damage to the vehicle.

 

We're looking for $3.5M funding to develop a product that will save millions of lives and billions of dollars on a yearly basis.

Our product is designed to minimize the amounts of fires and besides saving lives and property, we're here to save our planet!

 

Risks and challenges

We're challenged to find the right employees that will support our mission and help us develop our product and set standards for the automotive industry.
story_txt:
Built on passion and ingenuity
Our founders have a strong passion for cars, as well as a strong goal to make this world a better place for everyone. People can lose everything in seconds, their assets, and more importantly, their loved ones. Our goal is to make an impact on that, to prevent as many car fires as possible. It's time to end this!
On average, 345 people die from vehicle fires every year.
Each year, from 2014 to 2016, an estimated 171,500 highway vehicle fires occurred in the United States, resulting in an annual average of 345 deaths; 1,300 injuries; and $1.1 billion in property loss. These highway vehicle fires accounted for 13 percent of fires responded to by fire departments across the nation.
Our Mission
Americans spend an average of 17,600 minutes driving each year. Our main goal is to make those commutes as safe as possible. The mechanisms we're developing will be able to prevent any kind of fire, in any of vehicle's compartments. We care about your safety and your assets!
Product
A mechanism that will detect and put out any without any harm to the passengers and minimal damage to the vehicle.
 
We're looking for $3.5M funding to develop a product that will save millions of lives and billions of dollars on a yearly basis.
Our product is designed to minimize the amounts of fires and besides saving lives and property, we're here to save our planet!
 
Risks and challenges
We're challenged to find the right employees that will support our mission and help us develop our product and set standards for the automotive industry.

story:
Ultima Hybrid Bikes

The World Needs more Sustainable Commuting Solutions. At ULTIMA, we are on a mission to create eco-friendly and sustainable hybrid bikes as a replacement for fossil fuels, that are fun, convenient, and affordable.

Meet the ULTIMA: Sustainable. Convenient. Affordable. 

  • An eBike that stands out.
  • An eBike that delivers a premium biking experience. 
  • An eBike that offers safety, performance, and efficiency all-in-one package.
  • An eBike with a remarkable value that covers all riding gears you might ever need for your journey.

 

As low as 16.34Kg/36lbs. (Dry weight)

Frame made from T6 aviation-grade aluminum alloy processed through 3D hydraulic technology, which makes The ULTIMA easy to lift and carry.

 

4-Levels of Power-Assist
Fitness, Aerobic, Comfort, and Climb

Want to ramp up your heart rate? Switch it to 0% assistance in Fitness Mode.
Need a break? Go for 90% assistance in Climb Mode and let the bike tackle that steep hill.

 

Smooth, Comfortable Ride

Unique Frame Design, Torque-Sensing Technology, Fork suspension with adjustable damping result in pleasant ride quality.

 

Invisible and Replaceable Battery

For the ultimate convenience, Ultima invisible battery packs are replaceable in under 30 seconds. The XS 5.8Ah battery pack is fully charged between 2.5-3h, and XT 13.6 Ah battery packs between 3-5h. Style and functionality hand to hand for your convenience in one place.
 
 

Shimano Gear Shift 

Shimano 3 speed (internal) gear shift in XS-Models and Shimano 7-speed (internal) gear shift in XT-Models 

 

Hydraulic Disk Brakes

Always Safety Comes First. e-Bike 6.5'' TEKTRO Hydraulic Disk Brake System, with 2 pistons and  power cut-off sensor, will assist you to control the circumstances. 

 
 

We think the Ultima Series is remarkable. Here’s what our reviewers have been saying about the Ultima hybrid bikes: 
 
 

 

 

 
 
The Ultima XS and XT Base Models stand out when it comes to design, build, and performance. The SE edition is an ultimate commuter package with gears, accessories, and equipment that turn a great e-Bike into a smart commuter vehicle.
 

 

What do I get for the SE Package? 

 

1. Ultima 4K Ultra-HD Dual Screen Action Camera

Record your epic journeys and keep safe on your commute with HD recording, featuring an easy-use remote control. Share with Friends and Family

 
 

2. Ultima Smart LED Headlights & Tail Lights

Ride with confidence. Clear visibility - Anytime, Any-condition.

 

3. Compact, Replacement Battery

The SE edition comes with an extra battery back that extends the range further (30-40Kms).

It's easy to replace under 30 seconds and comes with individual carrying bag.

 

4. Ultima ALL Weather 3-in-1 Helmet

Stay protected on the move. Transformable Helmet (Fully-open/Ventilation/Close-top) with Cover. 

 

5. Ultima Detachable Smartphone Holder

Go to places using your phone's navigation or managing your calls. Quick and Easy Mount.

 

6. Ultima Foldable Safety Chain Lock

Compact foldable design (2 -keys). Anti-theft security level 9. 

 

7. Ultima Power Bank (20,000 mAh)

Never run out of power when you need it the most. Recharge your devices on the move.

 

8. Ultima GPS Tracker 

  • Real-time Positioning and Tracking
  • Vibration Detection Alarm (SMS MSG)
  • Remote Listening and Recording
  • Geo Fencing Notification (in/out)
  • Speed-limits Detection Alarm (SMS MSG)
  • Navigation to Tracker location
  • 3 Main Standby Modes: Real-Time Tracking, Smart Tracking, Sleep Mode)
  • Track History (Place, Time, Direction and mileage)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

9. Ultima Backpack

A place for your Ultima gears, accessories, equipments, and your other belongings.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

10. ULTIMA Tire Repair Kit (DIY)

Be ready and prepared for everything. Never stuck with a flat tire on the middle of trip, again!

 
 

11. Ultima Bike Cover

Keep your Ultima protected. 

 

 

12. Ultima Smart Air Pump

Plug. Set. Go. The pump will automatically switch off once the set pressure is attained. 

 
 

13. Ultima Accessories Box

Carry your accessories safely and securely in their dedicated box.

 

 

14. Ultima Detachable Bell

Alert pedestrians on the move. No compromises on safety. 

 

 

15. Ultima Carrier Box (3.0L)

Safely and securely carry all your essentials.

 

 

16. Multi-Function Toolbox

Be prepared and have the necessary tools, right when you need them. 

 

 

17. Ultima First Aid Kit

Accidents happen. Don't let minor injuries stop you. 

 
 
 
 

Great up with everything you need for your journey. 

Here's a full list of comparisons between the Base and the SE Package. 

 

 

 

 

colours are available for all models. No restrictions. 


All Prices In USD

 

 

Ultima XT-SE Package

In Ultima, we avoid of over-promising and under-delivering; however, we are working hard to start the shipping from March 2022.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Quality does not happen by accident – it takes a lot of experience, passion, and continuous improvement to reach perfection. 

 

The concept behind Ultima hybrid bikes was devised by Ramin Rasavar – a prolific entrepreneur and renowned engineer with more than 28 years of experience in the automotive and motorsport industries. Meet the founder here.

 

Loving Our Community

Be a part of a global movement towards sustainability. We offer smart commuter solutions that are fun, safe, and affordable. But we have another goal – supporting our community.

We believe in giving back to the community which is why we are donating ​10% of this campaign's profits to World Vision Canada. 

 

We are extremely grateful to you for supporting us in this mission

 

Order Your Ultima Now

The Ultima Hybrid Bikes are at the pre-commercialization stage now and your support will take it to the mass production level.

Join us to accomplish this mission together, positively impact our planet, and propel electronic transportation forward.

Ultima e-Bikes by E.V Canada

 

 

Shipping, Taxes, Import Duties

Please note that the Shipping, Taxes, and/or Import duties, are not included in the campaign prices. The backer is responsible for all import duties, and/or taxes.

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and the significant fluctuations in international and domestic freight charges, we are currently unable to quote accurate shipping charges for the next 8-12 months. To avoid charging unfair shipping fees, we would prefer not to charge our backers until the shipping begins. Once your product is ready to ship, we will provide the best shipping options specific to your address, with complete transparency and no markups.

All Canadian orders will be subject to the applicable Provincial and Federal taxes (PST/GST/HST). The listed prices are all exclusive of taxes. Canadian taxes will be collected separately along with the shipping expenses since Canadian Taxes are not applicable for backers from other counties. We will offer instalment payment options for accumulated payable shipping and Canadian Taxes, for Canadian Backers only. 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

General

 

It is too Good to be True!?

First of all, we are so glad that backers see enough value in our perks since it validates our 3 years 24/7 hard working to bring Ultima e-Bikes to life, and it’s just a start! 

Ultima offers over 25 branded gears, accessories & equipment that each has a capacity for a standalone campaign, that results from dedication, hard work, testings, and continuous improvements. 

The Campaign perks is inclusive of commercial markups and are based on our manufacturing cost @ volume production. It’s how we value our backer’s support in return. 

We guarantee to fulfill every single order or 100% refund.

Please check out the testimonials made by citizens that asked to share their honest feedback about Ultima e-Bikes.

 

What is the story behind the Ultima e-Bikes? Who is the founder?

Please find the brief information here.

 

What are the risks that my pledge won’t be fulfilled?

The World Needs More Sustainable Commuting Solutions. At ULTIMA, we are on a mission to design and make eco-friendly sustainable hybrid bikes as a replacement for fossil fuels that are fun, convenient, and affordable.

After years of hard work, Ultima is now at the pre-commercialization stage and ready for mass production. Technically, at this point, no obstacle unbale us from mass production; e-bikes, gears and equipment have been tested long enough, and all photos and videos are based on actual products; what you see is beyond the prototyping and the majority of parts are finalized. Currently only few detachable accessory brackets are still under improvement to be qualified for mass production.

We try to avoid over promising and under delivering and planning for unexpected situations that are out of our control.

The only matter that can affect the shipping time is the supply-chain delays or waiting times that can cause unwanted delay in our production time. However, we already considered all possible delays in our delivery time estimation based on current market demands and supply situation, post-pandemic. Nevertheless, we are trying to improve our sourcing to reduce supply chain delays and waiting times to fulfill the orders prior to the estimated delivery time.

 

Why is it called the Ultima? 

Ultima is a Latin word synonym with Ultimate.

Ultima SE Edition is an ultimate commuter solution that never have been offered before. 

 

What models do you offer?

  • XS-Base
  • XS-SE Edition 
  • XT-Base
  • XT-SE Edition

 

Ultima XS/XT are categorized in which class of e-Bikes? Do have other types of e-Bikes?

Ultima XS/XT are both Class (I), Paddle/Power Assist 250W, regulated as conventional bikes and they are road legal in most of countries around the world.

Ultima XS is offer slick and stylish design that focused on weight saving, however the XT is offer fortitude design with fat tires, suspension fork and with dual batteries is more focused on range. 

Currently, we are prototyping new folding e-Bike. 

 

What colors do you offer for XS/XT?

We offer 9 colors:

  • Black/Red, 
  • Grey/Blue, 
  • White/Green, 
  • Yellow/White, 
  • Black/Red Wine, 
  • Black/White, 
  • White/Blue, 
  • Yellow/Black, 
  • Yellow/Green

 

Where is the Ultima made-in?

Our main suppliers and manufacturing partners are in China, Korea, Taiwan, and Japan.

 

Will COVID-19 affect the production and deliveries?

However currently, the pandemic has minimal direct effects on production itself, but it’s not deniable that has significant direct effects on part’s supply-chain and shipping time and expenses. Post covid-19 more people prefer to commute with bikes rather than public transportation whenever possible, so sudden increased demands on the market caused the delay in part’s supply-chain. On the other hand, the shipping time and expenses were increased by 3X.   

We have over 34 manufacturing partners that are one of the best on industry and closely worked with them to optimize the manufacturing process and minimize the pandemic effects on production, however the part’s supply-chain delay and shipping are out of our sole control However, we are trying hard to manage unwanted or unexpected effects out of our control, with our best ability.

 

How easy is assembling the Ultima XS/XT?

Ultima e-Bikes are fully assembled and tested one-by-one prior to authorized shipping Afterwards, few parts like handlebar, paddles, and kickstand disassembled that bike fits into the shipping package. Although, after delivery, it’s very easy to reassemble the bike, we provide you step by step descriptive assembly manual.

 

What is the Ultima e-Bikes warranty coverage?

All Ultima Hybrids e-Bikes should pass the QC tests one by one to ensure they are defect and fault-free before being authorized for shipping.

The Base model and SE Package have 12-Months full warranty coverage, Plus 6-months Frame extended warranty (warranty is excluded the wear, tears or man-made damages)
the Signature Editions have 18-Months full warranty coverage, Plus 6-months Frame extended warranty (warranty is excluded the wear, tears or man-made damages)

The Warranty covers the spare part replacement; however, the shipping expenses would be covered by customer.

 

What if warranty expired or I broke it myself?

No worries, we will support and supply you all parts and gears you require to fix your Ultima e-Bikes through our online store, even after the warranty expired or whether you broke it yourself. 

 

How do I get the replacement parts?

Simply place the order through our online store and replacement parts/Gears will be shipped to your address, if you need further assistance, our support team will help you purchase the correct replacement components.  

 

Where can I get my Ultima Hybrid serviced?

The Ultima Hybrids comes with user, maintenance/repair manual that guides you through step-by-step assembly and maintenance/repairs procedures, allowing you with minimal hands-on tool expertise to maintain and service your e-Bike yourself; and always you can reach out to our support team for further assistance. Also, you can get assistance from reputable bike shops to get your Ultima e-Bike serviced.

 

Technical

 

The XS and XT equipped with the same frame?

No, however both have similar frame design outlines but technically they are different.

 

Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?

No, they would be even better, The photo and videos are from Prototypes, we constantly we are working to improve the design and functionality of parts, comfort and detachable brackets.

 

Where is the battery?  

The Ultima XS/XT both have unique frame designs with invisible detachable lithium 5.8Ah battery embedded on frame’s top tube, however the XT model also equipped with extra 7.8Ah lithium battery (13.6 Ah in total) locates under the seat post.

 

What are the ranges for XS/XT? 

e-Bike’s ranges vary based on pedal assist level, incline levels, rider’s weight, type of terrains, climates, tire air pressure, and many other factors.

The XS range is Min. 25km - Max. 60km; The XS average range in different road conditions: 30-40km

The XT range is Min. 55km - Max. 140km; The XT average range in different road conditions: 60-70km

 

The XS-SE and XT-SE equipped with the same motor and battery that used in Base models, how they have an extended range?

The SE package comes with the ultimate commuter package, included an extra detachable lithium 5.8Ah battery pack that extends the renege of XS-SE/XT-SE by an average 30-40km (Min. 25km- Max. 60km), and is replaceable under 30 Sec.

The XS-SE range is Min. 50km - Max. 120km; The XS-SE average range in different road conditions: 60-80km

The XT-SE range is Min. 80km - Max. 180km; The XT-SE average range in different road conditions: 90-110km

 

What is the maximum speed for XS and XT?

The Class (I) e-Bikes maximum speed directly depends on rider’s muscular strengths, paddling power, rider’s weight, gear ratio and wheel’s size, train conditions, and some other factors;  However, based on Class (I) regulations the power assist mechanism (regardless of assist level) should cut off in certain speeds that is 32km/h (20 miles/h) in most of North American countries and 25km/h in most of European countries.  

The Ultima XS/XT are Class (I) e-Bikes and follows the destination regulations for pedal/power assist cut-off speed.

Ultima XS/XT e-bikes are designed for commuting, city travel, trekking or for leisure purposes, so the max speed really wasn’t the primary concern in the design and built; however, they are smoothly capable of achieving safe speeds (ranges from 35 to 50km/h) that balanced with braking performance for maximizing the safety for the rider and other commuters on the road.

 

In what way are the LED lights smart? 

The front LED headlight has smart working mode, which adjust the working mode and brightness according to the ambient light and movements status as following:

  • When there is sufficient light (> 30lux) is detected by sensor, the heal light start flashing as daytime warning light
  • When the sensor detected its dark (< 30lux), the head light mode changed to steady 400 Lumen to illuminate the e-Bike path while saving power to extend the headlight running time.
  • When the e-Bike become stationary for more than 120 seconds, the smart mode enters into the sleep/standby state, indwell be return to working mode after sensing the movements, vibration, or clicking on the light button. 

The Rear LED taillight has smart autodetection braking feature that turns on the high steady Stop/Brake light(100Lm), and in steady stationary situation (>60s) light automatically switch to standby sleep mode. 

 

Can I charge my mobile phone and accessories on the move?

Yes. You can purchase Ultima Powerbank (20,000 mAh) that can be used for charging most of the gears and accessories. This Powerbank is a standard equipment in SE Edition.

 

What type/brand of suspension fork is used? 

Ultima e-Bikes equipped with Ultima branded parts, gears & accessories; We have over 34 manufacturing partners with excellent standing and reputations in the industry. 

Expect the parts made by leading brands like Shimano, TEKTRO & LG, the most of the other parts/gears are Ultima Branded.

  • XS Suspension type: HeadShock; comfort for City, Trekking
  • XT Suspension type: Fork, adjustable damping; comfort for City, Trekking

 

What models of Shimano hub gearbox and derailleur are used?

XS: SHIMANO NEXUS INTER-3 SERIES – REVOSHIFT (Internal)

XT: SHIMANO TOURNEY SERIES 7-Speed, SHIMANO TOURNEY Thumb Shifter Plus-7, TOURNEY TY Derailleur, TOURNEY TZ 7-Speed Freewheels

 

Are the brakes hydraulic? 

Ultima XS equipped with e-bike TEKTRO Hydraulic, Dual Piston, 6.5” disk brake, and Power Cut-off system. 

Ultima XT initial prototype was equipped with Jack mechanical 6.5” disk brake system; However afterwards we decided to upgrade XT to Hydraulic disk baking system at production.

So, the answer is: Yes, the both XS/XT models will come with e-bike Hydraulic disk brake system as standard.

 

Do I notify for powertrain failure? 

Yes, On-Board Diagnostics System (OBD) monitoring the powertrain system, on real-time diagnose the potential failure in Motor, Controller, Sensor, Batteries or Brake System and prompt on HD LED Display

 

Can I monitor the bike's battery level?

Yes, HD LED multi-function meter displays the real-time: speed, trip, ODO, time, battery level, current assist mode, ODB warnings (Brake, Motor, Controller, Sensor, Battery)

What is the maximum recommended height and weight for rider?

The Ultima XS recommended height is: 4’11”- 6’3” (149.86cm to 190.5cm)

The Ultima XT recommended height is: 5’- 6’4” (152.5cm to 193cm)

The maximum recommended rider weight for both XS and XT is: 120kg (267 lbs) 

 

Can you ride it in the rain?

Yes, the minimum Precaution level for XS/XT models are: IP54; however, it’s highly recommended to consider the safety percussion and tips for riding on slippery terrains.

 

What size tires fit in XS/XT?

  • XS: 20" * 1.95"
  • XT: 20" * 3" Fat Tires

 

How much are they (XS/XT) weigh?

XS Dry (without battery):   16,340kg (36lbs)

XS (with battery):                  17,725kg (39lbs)

XS-SE (fully loaded):            19,600kg (43.2lbs)

 

XT Dry (without battery):   20,635kg (45.5lbs)

XT (with battery):                 23,875kg (52.4lbs)

XT-SE (fully loaded):            25,750kg (56.7lbs)

 

How do you charge the battery and how long does it take?

Detachable LG 18650 lithium battery pack, 5.8 Ah, XS & XT, Charging time: 2.5-3h 

Fixed LG 18650 lithium battery pack, 7.8 Ah, XT Only, Charging time: 3-5h

XS full Charging time (5.8 Ah): 2.5-3h

XT full Charging time (13.6 Ah): 2.5-5h

Ultima XT equipped with dual batteries and comes with two chargers (one for each battery)

 

Can the battery be replaced?

Absolutely, Both XS/XT models are equipped with 5.8Ah replaceable batteries embedded on the frame’s top tube (hidden) and can be replaced with a fully charged battery under 30 sec, which extends the average range about 30-40km.

 

Does charger support both standard 120V/220V outlets?

Yes, the Li-ion charger is rated 100-240V~50/60Hz and compatible with both standards.

 

Are LED lights, fenders (mudguards) and Kickstand Standard on Base model XS/XT?

Yes, absolutely, not only Smart LED lights, Mudguards and kickstand are standard equipment on base model XS/XT, but also the Bluetooth Speakers, Smartphone Holder, Rear View Mirrors, Foldable Anti-theft chain lock, Bell, Mode selector, Torque-sensing System, e-Bike Hydraulic Disk Brake system, all are standard equipment on Ultima base model XS/XT.

 

Do you sell caring/cargo box for XS/XT?

Yes, Ultima XS/XT have branded 3.0L rear caring/cargo box, mountable on seatpost, you can order from our online store, however if you order the SE package, the Caring/Cargo box is already a part of SE package; Plus over 25 extra gears and equipment.  

 

What happens if I get a Puncture?

Changing a flat tire on an e-Bike is the same as on a conventional bike. 

The SE package included with Toolbox, Tire repair tool kit, and Smart electric Air-pump. 

The Maintenance/Repair manual will guide you through a DIY step-by-step process to fix the flat tire anywhere in the shortest possible time.

 

How much maintenance does the motor require?

The Ultima Motors are maintenance free and designed for a long run. All Motors should pass QC test before they mount on the s-Bikes. 

 

How can I protect my Ultima e-Bike and gears from the risk of theft?

All Ultima e-Bikes comes with compact foldable Anti-theft chain lock, security level 9, to secure your Ultima Hybrid from theft risk, also all gears and equipment are detachable and you can remove them through quick release mechanism from their mounting brackets in a second, like: Battery pack, LED Lights, Smartphone Holder, Bell, Camera, Caring/Cargo box, … 

The SE package also included with the Accessory box and Backpack to hold and carry your Ultima accessories and gears with yourself, also It’s included with GPS tracker that enable the owner for:

  • Real-time Positioning and Tracking
  • Vibration Detection Alarm (SMS MSG)
  • Remote Listening and Recording
  • Geo Fencing Notification (in/out)
  • Speed-limits Detection Alarm (SMS MSG)
  • Navigation to Tracker location
  • 3 Main Standby Modes: Real-Time Tracking, Smart Tracking, Sleep Mode)
  • Track History (Place, Time, Direction and mileage)

 

Can I take a photo or record my commute meanwhile riding the bike? Can I see the Camera footages on my smartphone screen?

The SE package included with 4k Ultra-HD dual screen Camera, detachable mounts and the Remote controller on handlebar for taking photos or capture the videos from your journey, the camera through WiFi connect to your smartphone and can also mirror the camera screen on your phone screen.

Also, you can purchase the Camera through our online store separately.

  

How can I change the power assist level and navigate through bike meter information?

There are two ways to do it:

First-method uses the two buttons embedded on the bike meter display, the left one is for changing the power assist level (Fitness, Aerobic, Eco, Climb) and the right one is for navigating on meter information (Trip, ODO, Time, Battery Capacity, …)

Second-method (recommended) is utilizing the remote controller on the handlebar with 3 buttons right under your thumb.

 

Does XS/XT have speed Sensor?

No! Ultima e-Bikes equipped with Torque Sensing Technology that provides a very smooth and seamless rid quality based on the level of the torque that rider puts on the paddles, which is a very remarkable feature in all speeds specifically in stand-start rolling on uphill paths.

 

What is included in the SE package?

Ultima SE is beyond an e-Bike, but an ultimate commuter solution; Fully loaded with utility gears, accessories and equipment as a standard package at an unmatched level that ever have -been offered!  

The SE owners would be granted free lifetime Ultima Club Membership with discounts on all products (e-Bikes & parts); Plus extra branded gears, accessories and equipment which the whole package worth over $2,250 in retail value; here is the shortlist:

  • Smart LED Headlights with remote control (1,700lm)
  • Smart LED, Taillight (50Lm Drive-time -100Lm Brake-time)
  • 4K Ultra-HD Dual Screen Action Camera with remote control and App
  • GPS Tracker with App
  • Built-in Bluetooth Speakers 
  • Detachable smartphone holder
  • Detachable bell
  • Rear view mirrors
  • Foldable Anti-theft chain lock
  • Unique Helmet(3in1) with rain cover
  • Toolbox
  • Accessory box
  • Tire repair tool kit
  • The portable smart electric air-pump
  • Shoe rain-cover with waterproof bag
  • First aid emergency kit
  • Front and Rear fenders/Mudguards
  • Backpack for carrying e-Bike accessories and equipment

Plus:

  • Commuter extra battery pack for (add extra 30-40Km in average)
  • Bike-cover
  • Detachable 3.0L carrier/Cargo box
  • 20,000 mAh Emergency power bank for charging the lights, phone & camera
  • Torque sensing system
  • e-Bike Hydraulic disk brake system 
  • Lifetime Ultima Club Membership with discounts

Note: The Ultima XS/XT Base models upgraded with extra features from SE package, specifically for IGG campaign backers. 

 

 

Legal

 

The Ultima e-Bikes are legal in North America and European Countries? Do I need a license to operate them?

Ultima XS/XT are standard Class (I) power/pedal assist e-Bikes, with 250W max motor power, they are legally allowed to ride where bicycles are permitted, including bike lanes, roads, multiuse trails and bike-only paths. no registration, insurance, or licence is required to ride them in most North American and European countries.

The only difference between north America and EU is the Power Assist Cut-off speed, that in North America and most of the world is 32Km/h (20 miles/h) and in most EU countries is 25km/h.

We highly recommend that backers check their own local government’s legislation and regulations, before backing Ultima campaign.

 

Do I need to wear a helmet?

However, in most of countries wearing a helmet for adult cyclist is not mandatory, but We highly recommend to use a helmet for your own safety, Please check your local legislations and regulation in this regards.

 

 

Payments and Shipping

 

When does it ship?

June 2022 is an estimated date, In Ultima, we avoid of over-promising and under-delivering; however, we are working hard to start the shipping from March 2022.

We have almost 34 manufacturing partners, the only matter that can affect the shipping time is the supply-chain delays or waiting times that can cause unwanted delay in our production time. However, we already considered all possible delays in our delivery time estimation based on current market demands and supply situation, post-pandemic. Nevertheless, we are trying to improve our sourcing to reduce supply chain delays and waiting times to fulfill the orders prior to the estimated delivery time. 

 

How much does the shipping cost?

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and the significant fluctuations in international and domestic freight charges, we are currently unable to quote accurate shipping charges for the next 8-12 months. To avoid charging unfair shipping fees, we would prefer not to charge our backers until the shipping begins. Once your product is ready to ship, we will provide the best shipping options specific to your address, with complete transparency and no markups.

 

Who is responsible for additional duties, taxes, or VAT?

The backer is responsible, we strongly recommend you to check your local legislation before backing our campaign, since it might be varying in different countries; The import duties for Class-I Electric Bikes in the USA, Canada and some other countries is 0%.

 

Do you have financing?

We are negotiating to offer third-party financing options post campaign, please contact us at info@ultimaebikes.com

 

What is your refund policy?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's refund policy, Refunds are eligible before the end of the Indiegogo campaign. Since the bikes are made by order, unfortunately refunds are not eligible at the manufacturing stage.

 

What is your return/exchange policy?

At Ultima, all products pass through comprehensive Quality Control (QC) tests before shipping out, we process the returns/exchanges on a case-by-case basis, only unopened/unused products in original packaging are eligible for return or exchange. Please consider customers are responsible for shipping expenses in both-ways.

 

How about Canadian taxes?

All Canadian orders will be subject to the applicable Provincial and Federal taxes (PST/GST/HST). The listed prices are all exclusive of taxes. Canadian taxes will be collected separately along with the shipping expenses since Canadian Taxes are not applicable for backers from other counties. We will offer installment payment options for accumulated payable shipping and Canadian Taxes, for Canadian Backers only. 

 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Please emails us at info@ultimaebikes.com

 

 

Ultima e-Bikes in Media
story_txt:
Ultima Hybrid BikesThe World Needs more Sustainable Commuting Solutions. At ULTIMA, we are on a mission to create eco-friendly and sustainable hybrid bikes as a replacement for fossil fuels, that are fun, convenient, and affordable.Meet the ULTIMA: Sustainable. Convenient. Affordable. 
An eBike that stands out.
An eBike that delivers a premium biking experience. 
An eBike that offers safety, performance, and efficiency all-in-one package.
An eBike with a remarkable value that covers all riding gears you might ever need for your journey.

 
As low as 16.34Kg/36lbs. (Dry weight)
Frame made from T6 aviation-grade aluminum alloy processed through 3D hydraulic technology, which makes The ULTIMA easy to lift and carry.
 
4-Levels of Power-AssistFitness, Aerobic, Comfort, and Climb
Want to ramp up your heart rate? Switch it to 0% assistance in Fitness Mode.Need a break? Go for 90% assistance in Climb Mode and let the bike tackle that steep hill.
 
Smooth, Comfortable Ride
Unique Frame Design, Torque-Sensing Technology, Fork suspension with adjustable damping result in pleasant ride quality.
 Invisible and Replaceable BatteryFor the ultimate convenience, Ultima invisible battery packs are replaceable in under 30 seconds. The XS 5.8Ah battery pack is fully charged between 2.5-3h, and XT 13.6 Ah battery packs between 3-5h. Style and functionality hand to hand for your convenience in one place.  
Shimano Gear Shift 
Shimano 3 speed (internal) gear shift in XS-Models and Shimano 7-speed (internal) gear shift in XT-Models 


 
Hydraulic Disk Brakes
Always Safety Comes First. e-Bike 6.5'' TEKTRO Hydraulic Disk Brake System, with 2 pistons and  power cut-off sensor, will assist you to control the circumstances. 
  

We think the Ultima Series is remarkable. Here’s what our reviewers have been saying about the Ultima hybrid bikes: 
 



 

 




 




  The Ultima XS and XT Base Models stand out when it comes to design, build, and performance. The SE edition is an ultimate commuter package with gears, accessories, and equipment that turn a great e-Bike into a smart commuter vehicle.  What do I get for the SE Package?  1. Ultima 4K Ultra-HD Dual Screen Action CameraRecord your epic journeys and keep safe on your commute with HD recording, featuring an easy-use remote control. Share with Friends and Family  
2. Ultima Smart LED Headlights & Tail Lights
Ride with confidence. Clear visibility - Anytime, Any-condition.

 
3. Compact, Replacement Battery
The SE edition comes with an extra battery back that extends the range further (30-40Kms).
It's easy to replace under 30 seconds and comes with individual carrying bag.


 
4. Ultima ALL Weather 3-in-1 Helmet
Stay protected on the move. Transformable Helmet (Fully-open/Ventilation/Close-top) with Cover. 

 
5. Ultima Detachable Smartphone Holder
Go to places using your phone's navigation or managing your calls. Quick and Easy Mount.

 
6. Ultima Foldable Safety Chain Lock
Compact foldable design (2 -keys). Anti-theft security level 9. 

 
7. Ultima Power Bank (20,000 mAh)
Never run out of power when you need it the most. Recharge your devices on the move.

 

8. Ultima GPS Tracker 

Real-time Positioning and Tracking
Vibration Detection Alarm (SMS MSG)
Remote Listening and Recording
Geo Fencing Notification (in/out)

Navigation to Tracker location
3 Main Standby Modes: Real-Time Tracking, Smart Tracking, Sleep Mode)
Track History (Place, Time, Direction and mileage)

10. ULTIMA Tire Repair Kit (DIY)
Be ready and prepared for everything. Never stuck with a flat tire on the middle of trip, again!
 
 
11. Ultima Bike Cover
Keep your Ultima protected. 
 
 
12. Ultima Smart Air Pump

13. Ultima Accessories Box

14. Ultima Detachable Bell
Alert pedestrians on the move. No compromises on safety. 
 
 
15. Ultima Carrier Box (3.0L)
Safely and securely carry all your essentials.
  
 
16. Multi-Function Toolbox

17. Ultima First Aid Kit
