Great up with everything you need for your journey. 
Here's a full list of comparisons between the Base and the SE Package. 


 

 
 
 
colours are available for all models. No restrictions. 





All Prices In USD
 


 



Ultima XT-SE Package





In Ultima, we avoid of over-promising and under-delivering; however, we are working hard to start the shipping from March 2022.
 

 
 
 


 


 
Quality does not happen by accident – it takes a lot of experience, passion, and continuous improvement to reach perfection. 
 

The concept behind Ultima hybrid bikes was devised by Ramin Rasavar – a prolific entrepreneur and renowned engineer with more than 28 years of experience in the automotive and motorsport industries. Meet the founder here.
 
Loving Our Community
Be a part of a global movement towards sustainability. We offer smart commuter solutions that are fun, safe, and affordable. But we have another goal – supporting our community.
We believe in giving back to the community which is why we are donating ​10% of this campaign's profits to World Vision Canada. 

 
We are extremely grateful to you for supporting us in this mission
 
Order Your Ultima Now
The Ultima Hybrid Bikes are at the pre-commercialization stage now and your support will take it to the mass production level.
Join us to accomplish this mission together, positively impact our planet, and propel electronic transportation forward.
Ultima e-Bikes by E.V Canada
 
 
Shipping, Taxes, Import Duties
Please note that the Shipping, Taxes, and/or Import duties, are not included in the campaign prices. The backer is responsible for all import duties, and/or taxes.
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and the significant fluctuations in international and domestic freight charges, we are currently unable to quote accurate shipping charges for the next 8-12 months. To avoid charging unfair shipping fees, we would prefer not to charge our backers until the shipping begins. Once your product is ready to ship, we will provide the best shipping options specific to your address, with complete transparency and no markups.
All Canadian orders will be subject to the applicable Provincial and Federal taxes (PST/GST/HST). The listed prices are all exclusive of taxes. Canadian taxes will be collected separately along with the shipping expenses since Canadian Taxes are not applicable for backers from other counties. We will offer instalment payment options for accumulated payable shipping and Canadian Taxes, for Canadian Backers only. 
 
 
Frequently Asked Questions
 
General
 
It is too Good to be True!?
First of all, we are so glad that backers see enough value in our perks since it validates our 3 years 24/7 hard working to bring Ultima e-Bikes to life, and it’s just a start! 
Ultima offers over 25 branded gears, accessories & equipment that each has a capacity for a standalone campaign, that results from dedication, hard work, testings, and continuous improvements. 
The Campaign perks is inclusive of commercial markups and are based on our manufacturing cost @ volume production. It’s how we value our backer’s support in return. 
We guarantee to fulfill every single order or 100% refund.
Please check out the testimonials made by citizens that asked to share their honest feedback about Ultima e-Bikes.
 
What is the story behind the Ultima e-Bikes? Who is the founder?
Please find the brief information here.
 
What are the risks that my pledge won’t be fulfilled?
The World Needs More Sustainable Commuting Solutions. At ULTIMA, we are on a mission to design and make eco-friendly sustainable hybrid bikes as a replacement for fossil fuels that are fun, convenient, and affordable.
After years of hard work, Ultima is now at the pre-commercialization stage and ready for mass production. Technically, at this point, no obstacle unbale us from mass production; e-bikes, gears and equipment have been tested long enough, and all photos and videos are based on actual products; what you see is beyond the prototyping and the majority of parts are finalized. Currently only few detachable accessory brackets are still under improvement to be qualified for mass production.
We try to avoid over promising and under delivering and planning for unexpected situations that are out of our control.
The only matter that can affect the shipping time is the supply-chain delays or waiting times that can cause unwanted delay in our production time. However, we already considered all possible delays in our delivery time estimation based on current market demands and supply situation, post-pandemic. Nevertheless, we are trying to improve our sourcing to reduce supply chain delays and waiting times to fulfill the orders prior to the estimated delivery time.
 
Why is it called the Ultima? 
Ultima is a Latin word synonym with Ultimate.
Ultima SE Edition is an ultimate commuter solution that never have been offered before. 
 
What models do you offer?

XS-Base
XS-SE Edition 
XT-Base
XT-SE Edition

 
Ultima XS/XT are categorized in which class of e-Bikes? Do have other types of e-Bikes?
Ultima XS/XT are both Class (I), Paddle/Power Assist 250W, regulated as conventional bikes and they are road legal in most of countries around the world.
Ultima XS is offer slick and stylish design that focused on weight saving, however the XT is offer fortitude design with fat tires, suspension fork and with dual batteries is more focused on range. 
Currently, we are prototyping new folding e-Bike. 
 
What colors do you offer for XS/XT?
We offer 9 colors:

Black/Red, 
Grey/Blue, 
White/Green, 
Yellow/White, 
Black/Red Wine, 
Black/White, 
White/Blue, 
Yellow/Black, 
Yellow/Green

 
Where is the Ultima made-in?
Our main suppliers and manufacturing partners are in China, Korea, Taiwan, and Japan.
 
Will COVID-19 affect the production and deliveries?
However currently, the pandemic has minimal direct effects on production itself, but it’s not deniable that has significant direct effects on part’s supply-chain and shipping time and expenses. Post covid-19 more people prefer to commute with bikes rather than public transportation whenever possible, so sudden increased demands on the market caused the delay in part’s supply-chain. On the other hand, the shipping time and expenses were increased by 3X.   
We have over 34 manufacturing partners that are one of the best on industry and closely worked with them to optimize the manufacturing process and minimize the pandemic effects on production, however the part’s supply-chain delay and shipping are out of our sole control However, we are trying hard to manage unwanted or unexpected effects out of our control, with our best ability.
 
How easy is assembling the Ultima XS/XT?
Ultima e-Bikes are fully assembled and tested one-by-one prior to authorized shipping Afterwards, few parts like handlebar, paddles, and kickstand disassembled that bike fits into the shipping package. Although, after delivery, it’s very easy to reassemble the bike, we provide you step by step descriptive assembly manual.
 
What is the Ultima e-Bikes warranty coverage?
All Ultima Hybrids e-Bikes should pass the QC tests one by one to ensure they are defect and fault-free before being authorized for shipping.
The Base model and SE Package have 12-Months full warranty coverage, Plus 6-months Frame extended warranty (warranty is excluded the wear, tears or man-made damages)the Signature Editions have 18-Months full warranty coverage, Plus 6-months Frame extended warranty (warranty is excluded the wear, tears or man-made damages)
The Warranty covers the spare part replacement; however, the shipping expenses would be covered by customer.
 
What if warranty expired or I broke it myself?
No worries, we will support and supply you all parts and gears you require to fix your Ultima e-Bikes through our online store, even after the warranty expired or whether you broke it yourself. 
 
How do I get the replacement parts?
Simply place the order through our online store and replacement parts/Gears will be shipped to your address, if you need further assistance, our support team will help you purchase the correct replacement components.  
 
Where can I get my Ultima Hybrid serviced?
The Ultima Hybrids comes with user, maintenance/repair manual that guides you through step-by-step assembly and maintenance/repairs procedures, allowing you with minimal hands-on tool expertise to maintain and service your e-Bike yourself; and always you can reach out to our support team for further assistance. Also, you can get assistance from reputable bike shops to get your Ultima e-Bike serviced.
 
Technical
 
The XS and XT equipped with the same frame?
No, however both have similar frame design outlines but technically they are different.
 
Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?
No, they would be even better, The photo and videos are from Prototypes, we constantly we are working to improve the design and functionality of parts, comfort and detachable brackets.
 
Where is the battery?  
The Ultima XS/XT both have unique frame designs with invisible detachable lithium 5.8Ah battery embedded on frame’s top tube, however the XT model also equipped with extra 7.8Ah lithium battery (13.6 Ah in total) locates under the seat post.
 
What are the ranges for XS/XT? 
e-Bike’s ranges vary based on pedal assist level, incline levels, rider’s weight, type of terrains, climates, tire air pressure, and many other factors.
The XS range is Min. 25km - Max. 60km; The XS average range in different road conditions: 30-40km
The XT range is Min. 55km - Max. 140km; The XT average range in different road conditions: 60-70km
 
The XS-SE and XT-SE equipped with the same motor and battery that used in Base models, how they have an extended range?
The SE package comes with the ultimate commuter package, included an extra detachable lithium 5.8Ah battery pack that extends the renege of XS-SE/XT-SE by an average 30-40km (Min. 25km- Max. 60km), and is replaceable under 30 Sec.
The XS-SE range is Min. 50km - Max. 120km; The XS-SE average range in different road conditions: 60-80km
The XT-SE range is Min. 80km - Max. 180km; The XT-SE average range in different road conditions: 90-110km
 
What is the maximum speed for XS and XT?
The Class (I) e-Bikes maximum speed directly depends on rider’s muscular strengths, paddling power, rider’s weight, gear ratio and wheel’s size, train conditions, and some other factors;  However, based on Class (I) regulations the power assist mechanism (regardless of assist level) should cut off in certain speeds that is 32km/h (20 miles/h) in most of North American countries and 25km/h in most of European countries.  
The Ultima XS/XT are Class (I) e-Bikes and follows the destination regulations for pedal/power assist cut-off speed.
Ultima XS/XT e-bikes are designed for commuting, city travel, trekking or for leisure purposes, so the max speed really wasn’t the primary concern in the design and built; however, they are smoothly capable of achieving safe speeds (ranges from 35 to 50km/h) that balanced with braking performance for maximizing the safety for the rider and other commuters on the road.
 
In what way are the LED lights smart? 
The front LED headlight has smart working mode, which adjust the working mode and brightness according to the ambient light and movements status as following:

When there is sufficient light (> 30lux) is detected by sensor, the heal light start flashing as daytime warning light
When the sensor detected its dark (< 30lux), the head light mode changed to steady 400 Lumen to illuminate the e-Bike path while saving power to extend the headlight running time.
When the e-Bike become stationary for more than 120 seconds, the smart mode enters into the sleep/standby state, indwell be return to working mode after sensing the movements, vibration, or clicking on the light button. 

The Rear LED taillight has smart autodetection braking feature that turns on the high steady Stop/Brake light(100Lm), and in steady stationary situation (>60s) light automatically switch to standby sleep mode. 
 
Can I charge my mobile phone and accessories on the move?
Yes. You can purchase Ultima Powerbank (20,000 mAh) that can be used for charging most of the gears and accessories. This Powerbank is a standard equipment in SE Edition.
 
What type/brand of suspension fork is used? 
Ultima e-Bikes equipped with Ultima branded parts, gears & accessories; We have over 34 manufacturing partners with excellent standing and reputations in the industry. 
Expect the parts made by leading brands like Shimano, TEKTRO & LG, the most of the other parts/gears are Ultima Branded.

XS Suspension type: HeadShock; comfort for City, Trekking
XT Suspension type: Fork, adjustable damping; comfort for City, Trekking

 
What models of Shimano hub gearbox and derailleur are used?
XS: SHIMANO NEXUS INTER-3 SERIES – REVOSHIFT (Internal)
XT: SHIMANO TOURNEY SERIES 7-Speed, SHIMANO TOURNEY Thumb Shifter Plus-7, TOURNEY TY Derailleur, TOURNEY TZ 7-Speed Freewheels
 
Are the brakes hydraulic? 
Ultima XS equipped with e-bike TEKTRO Hydraulic, Dual Piston, 6.5” disk brake, and Power Cut-off system. 
Ultima XT initial prototype was equipped with Jack mechanical 6.5” disk brake system; However afterwards we decided to upgrade XT to Hydraulic disk baking system at production.
So, the answer is: Yes, the both XS/XT models will come with e-bike Hydraulic disk brake system as standard.
 
Do I notify for powertrain failure? 
Yes, On-Board Diagnostics System (OBD) monitoring the powertrain system, on real-time diagnose the potential failure in Motor, Controller, Sensor, Batteries or Brake System and prompt on HD LED Display
 
Can I monitor the bike's battery level?
Yes, HD LED multi-function meter displays the real-time: speed, trip, ODO, time, battery level, current assist mode, ODB warnings (Brake, Motor, Controller, Sensor, Battery)
What is the maximum recommended height and weight for rider?
The Ultima XS recommended height is: 4’11”- 6’3” (149.86cm to 190.5cm)
The Ultima XT recommended height is: 5’- 6’4” (152.5cm to 193cm)
The maximum recommended rider weight for both XS and XT is: 120kg (267 lbs) 
 
Can you ride it in the rain?
Yes, the minimum Precaution level for XS/XT models are: IP54; however, it’s highly recommended to consider the safety percussion and tips for riding on slippery terrains.
 
What size tires fit in XS/XT?

XS: 20" * 1.95"
XT: 20" * 3" Fat Tires

 
How much are they (XS/XT) weigh?
XS Dry (without battery):   16,340kg (36lbs)
XS (with battery):                  17,725kg (39lbs)
XS-SE (fully loaded):            19,600kg (43.2lbs)
 
XT Dry (without battery):   20,635kg (45.5lbs)
XT (with battery):                 23,875kg (52.4lbs)
XT-SE (fully loaded):            25,750kg (56.7lbs)
 
How do you charge the battery and how long does it take?
Detachable LG 18650 lithium battery pack, 5.8 Ah, XS & XT, Charging time: 2.5-3h 
Fixed LG 18650 lithium battery pack, 7.8 Ah, XT Only, Charging time: 3-5h
XS full Charging time (5.8 Ah): 2.5-3h
XT full Charging time (13.6 Ah): 2.5-5h
Ultima XT equipped with dual batteries and comes with two chargers (one for each battery)
 
Can the battery be replaced?
Absolutely, Both XS/XT models are equipped with 5.8Ah replaceable batteries embedded on the frame’s top tube (hidden) and can be replaced with a fully charged battery under 30 sec, which extends the average range about 30-40km.
 
Does charger support both standard 120V/220V outlets?
Yes, the Li-ion charger is rated 100-240V~50/60Hz and compatible with both standards.
 
Are LED lights, fenders (mudguards) and Kickstand Standard on Base model XS/XT?
Yes, absolutely, not only Smart LED lights, Mudguards and kickstand are standard equipment on base model XS/XT, but also the Bluetooth Speakers, Smartphone Holder, Rear View Mirrors, Foldable Anti-theft chain lock, Bell, Mode selector, Torque-sensing System, e-Bike Hydraulic Disk Brake system, all are standard equipment on Ultima base model XS/XT.
 
Do you sell caring/cargo box for XS/XT?
Yes, Ultima XS/XT have branded 3.0L rear caring/cargo box, mountable on seatpost, you can order from our online store, however if you order the SE package, the Caring/Cargo box is already a part of SE package; Plus over 25 extra gears and equipment.  
 
What happens if I get a Puncture?
Changing a flat tire on an e-Bike is the same as on a conventional bike. 
The SE package included with Toolbox, Tire repair tool kit, and Smart electric Air-pump. 
The Maintenance/Repair manual will guide you through a DIY step-by-step process to fix the flat tire anywhere in the shortest possible time.
 
How much maintenance does the motor require?
The Ultima Motors are maintenance free and designed for a long run. All Motors should pass QC test before they mount on the s-Bikes. 
 
How can I protect my Ultima e-Bike and gears from the risk of theft?
All Ultima e-Bikes comes with compact foldable Anti-theft chain lock, security level 9, to secure your Ultima Hybrid from theft risk, also all gears and equipment are detachable and you can remove them through quick release mechanism from their mounting brackets in a second, like: Battery pack, LED Lights, Smartphone Holder, Bell, Camera, Caring/Cargo box, … 
The SE package also included with the Accessory box and Backpack to hold and carry your Ultima accessories and gears with yourself, also It’s included with GPS tracker that enable the owner for:

Real-time Positioning and Tracking
Vibration Detection Alarm (SMS MSG)
Remote Listening and Recording
Geo Fencing Notification (in/out)
Speed-limits Detection Alarm (SMS MSG)
Navigation to Tracker location
3 Main Standby Modes: Real-Time Tracking, Smart Tracking, Sleep Mode)
Track History (Place, Time, Direction and mileage)

 
Can I take a photo or record my commute meanwhile riding the bike? Can I see the Camera footages on my smartphone screen?
The SE package included with 4k Ultra-HD dual screen Camera, detachable mounts and the Remote controller on handlebar for taking photos or capture the videos from your journey, the camera through WiFi connect to your smartphone and can also mirror the camera screen on your phone screen.
Also, you can purchase the Camera through our online store separately.
  
How can I change the power assist level and navigate through bike meter information?
There are two ways to do it:
First-method uses the two buttons embedded on the bike meter display, the left one is for changing the power assist level (Fitness, Aerobic, Eco, Climb) and the right one is for navigating on meter information (Trip, ODO, Time, Battery Capacity, …)
Second-method (recommended) is utilizing the remote controller on the handlebar with 3 buttons right under your thumb.
 
Does XS/XT have speed Sensor?
No! Ultima e-Bikes equipped with Torque Sensing Technology that provides a very smooth and seamless rid quality based on the level of the torque that rider puts on the paddles, which is a very remarkable feature in all speeds specifically in stand-start rolling on uphill paths.
 
What is included in the SE package?
Ultima SE is beyond an e-Bike, but an ultimate commuter solution; Fully loaded with utility gears, accessories and equipment as a standard package at an unmatched level that ever have -been offered!  
The SE owners would be granted free lifetime Ultima Club Membership with discounts on all products (e-Bikes & parts); Plus extra branded gears, accessories and equipment which the whole package worth over $2,250 in retail value; here is the shortlist:

Smart LED Headlights with remote control (1,700lm)
Smart LED, Taillight (50Lm Drive-time -100Lm Brake-time)
4K Ultra-HD Dual Screen Action Camera with remote control and App
GPS Tracker with App
Built-in Bluetooth Speakers 
Detachable smartphone holder
Detachable bell
Rear view mirrors
Foldable Anti-theft chain lock
Unique Helmet(3in1) with rain cover
Toolbox
Accessory box
Tire repair tool kit
The portable smart electric air-pump
Shoe rain-cover with waterproof bag
First aid emergency kit
Front and Rear fenders/Mudguards
Backpack for carrying e-Bike accessories and equipment

Plus:

Commuter extra battery pack for (add extra 30-40Km in average)
Bike-cover
Detachable 3.0L carrier/Cargo box
20,000 mAh Emergency power bank for charging the lights, phone & camera
Torque sensing system
e-Bike Hydraulic disk brake system 
Lifetime Ultima Club Membership with discounts

Note: The Ultima XS/XT Base models upgraded with extra features from SE package, specifically for IGG campaign backers. 
 
 
Legal
 
The Ultima e-Bikes are legal in North America and European Countries? Do I need a license to operate them?
Ultima XS/XT are standard Class (I) power/pedal assist e-Bikes, with 250W max motor power, they are legally allowed to ride where bicycles are permitted, including bike lanes, roads, multiuse trails and bike-only paths. no registration, insurance, or licence is required to ride them in most North American and European countries.
The only difference between north America and EU is the Power Assist Cut-off speed, that in North America and most of the world is 32Km/h (20 miles/h) and in most EU countries is 25km/h.
We highly recommend that backers check their own local government’s legislation and regulations, before backing Ultima campaign.
 
Do I need to wear a helmet?
However, in most of countries wearing a helmet for adult cyclist is not mandatory, but We highly recommend to use a helmet for your own safety, Please check your local legislations and regulation in this regards.
 
 
Payments and Shipping
 
When does it ship?
June 2022 is an estimated date, In Ultima, we avoid of over-promising and under-delivering; however, we are working hard to start the shipping from March 2022.
We have almost 34 manufacturing partners, the only matter that can affect the shipping time is the supply-chain delays or waiting times that can cause unwanted delay in our production time. However, we already considered all possible delays in our delivery time estimation based on current market demands and supply situation, post-pandemic. Nevertheless, we are trying to improve our sourcing to reduce supply chain delays and waiting times to fulfill the orders prior to the estimated delivery time. 
 
How much does the shipping cost?
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and the significant fluctuations in international and domestic freight charges, we are currently unable to quote accurate shipping charges for the next 8-12 months. To avoid charging unfair shipping fees, we would prefer not to charge our backers until the shipping begins. Once your product is ready to ship, we will provide the best shipping options specific to your address, with complete transparency and no markups.
 
Who is responsible for additional duties, taxes, or VAT?
The backer is responsible, we strongly recommend you to check your local legislation before backing our campaign, since it might be varying in different countries; The import duties for Class-I Electric Bikes in the USA, Canada and some other countries is 0%.
 
Do you have financing?
We are negotiating to offer third-party financing options post campaign, please contact us at info@ultimaebikes.com
 
What is your refund policy?
Please refer to IndieGoGo's refund policy, Refunds are eligible before the end of the Indiegogo campaign. Since the bikes are made by order, unfortunately refunds are not eligible at the manufacturing stage.
 
What is your return/exchange policy?
At Ultima, all products pass through comprehensive Quality Control (QC) tests before shipping out, we process the returns/exchanges on a case-by-case basis, only unopened/unused products in original packaging are eligible for return or exchange. Please consider customers are responsible for shipping expenses in both-ways.
 
How about Canadian taxes?
All Canadian orders will be subject to the applicable Provincial and Federal taxes (PST/GST/HST). The listed prices are all exclusive of taxes. Canadian taxes will be collected separately along with the shipping expenses since Canadian Taxes are not applicable for backers from other counties. We will offer installment payment options for accumulated payable shipping and Canadian Taxes, for Canadian Backers only. 
 
If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Please emails us at info@ultimaebikes.com
 
 
Ultima e-Bikes in Media

story:
A testimonial from Peter, one of our backers, who had a Skillion for a few days.

Seriously ladies and gentlemen, this is a cool bike! On the second day on this mad fun electric fatbike, I decided to dress up for the ride. It was fun, comfortable ride into work. (about 25 minutes from Lane Cove (Sydney)).  The drive used to take me 15 - 20 depending on traffic and I didn't get an ounce of exercise in the process...I even took a quick trip into the city ...10 Mins each way across the Sydney Harbour Bridge...it was fun. .....

Here's the full version of the post...

http://www.linkedin.com/pulse/youd-think-i-had-...




Skillion Design

Taking the design of an Electric FatBike to a new level, the Skillion has every detail refined to create the most versatile, capable and fun bike possible.


COLORS AND SIZES

The Skillion is designed with a range of frame sizes, frame colors and rims colors, pick a design that suits you, or your friend.

DELIVERY TIMELINE


Our Story

I've been a keen mountain bike rider for more than 15 years, taking me to some of the world’s most beautiful places around the globe. I've always enjoyed getting outdoors in the fresh air and getting a bit of exercise. As an engineer I've seen loads of innovation for all sorts of bikes in specialist areas, like road cycling, mountain biking, down hill, and commuting. Not to mention the explosion of trails, bikeways and commuter paths along with the push for social responsibility.

Until I was introduced to fatbikes, I always thought you'd need a garage full of bikes to really explore all the options a bike can offer (see image below). A fatbike has extra wide tires giving so much more grip and traction, allowing you to go into places a normal bike would simply get bogged.

Of course the problem is the wide tires create a lot of drag and that means a lot more sweat. Adding an electric motor seemed like the innovation that was needed. I'd seen it done, but until I built one I would not have guessed how an electric motor can make such a difference to the riding experience. The first thing you notice is that the bike can move ahead without you having to peddle, this makes it so much easier and safer to get going. Pedaling along is easy and not an effort, but the choice is yours, you can cruise along using the motor only or switch off the motor and have a great workout – it's up to you. The low center of gravity and wide grip tires make the bike one of the safest I've ever ridden, as well as being the most fun.

Off road, the tires come into their own and give excellent grip and handling. Tire pressure makes a big difference for grip, traction and smoothness of ride. Mountain bike tires are typically 25-40 psi and road bikes much higher, up to 65psi, but the lower pressures, less than 20psi for a fatbike mean the ride is still smooth and there is no need for heavy and costly suspension. For soft sand the tire pressure can be reduced to very low levels to give great traction even on very soft sand. In this area the electrics make such a difference.

Having an electric motor means that people of all skill and fitness levels can enjoy riding together and this makes it ideal for couples.

An Electric fatbike is a great all round bike for commuting, off road trails, exploring, adventuring and having loads of fun especially with friends.

Demo' day at the local store (see image below).


Skillion Bondi Challenge

We heard a lot of chatter about how bikes are faster than public transport, so we decided to try it for ourselves..

The Impact

The increase in bike pathways for commuters and short distance travel is having a positive effect on the environment. Electric bikes are the lowest carbon emission form of transport period (see independent report). The lack of exercise in modern society is seen as the single biggest problem we face in the health of our nation.

Riding a bike is not only good for your health, but its good for the environment and it gets you where you want to go in a fun way!


Risks & Challenges

The biggest technical challenge is around quality control. Here at Skillion we demand very high standards of our electric bikes. I will be investing heavily in developing our specifications and quality processes to be sure our supporters get the very best electric bike available on the market. 


About us

We a bunch of blokes who came together cause we reckon this bike fits the bill. When we're not riding our bikes around town or lying around on Bondi Beach <grin> we hold down regular jobs in engineering, management and technology.



Stephan is a seasoned engineer and good-hand with hardware, software and firmware. He already has a prototype Smartphone App for the Skillion bike.

 

Nathan is our online information technology guru and has developed several online App's and is a bit of gun when it comes to the internet and Growthhacking.


Hi, I’m Pete! I've been mountain biking through Australia, UK and Finland for more than 15 years. While biking is a passion, my expertise comes from being a professional engineer for more than 25 years where I have worked for major electronics companies such as HP, Aristocrat, Breville, Nokia and Agilent Technologies. Mixing both my personal and professional passions, I’ve had the opportunity to build everything from bikes to mobile phones and the largest aircraft. I’m so very excited that I can finally bring to you a bike that defines what an electric bike should be, a Skillion Electric FatBike.

Stephan .. Pete .. Nathan

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't want a bike you can help us by contributing a small amount for a membership and spreading the word about our Skillion Electric FatBike
story_txt:
A testimonial from Peter, one of our backers, who had a Skillion for a few days.

Seriously ladies and gentlemen, this is a cool bike! On the second day on this mad fun electric fatbike, I decided to dress up for the ride. It was fun, comfortable ride into work. (about 25 minutes from Lane Cove (Sydney)).  The drive used to take me 15 - 20 depending on traffic and I didn't get an ounce of exercise in the process...I even took a quick trip into the city ...10 Mins each way across the Sydney Harbour Bridge...it was fun. .....Here's the full version of the post...
http://www.linkedin.com/pulse/youd-think-i-had-...

















Skillion DesignTaking the design of an Electric FatBike to a new level, the Skillion has every detail refined to create the most versatile, capable and fun bike possible.



COLORS AND SIZES
The Skillion is designed with a range of frame sizes, frame colors and rims colors, pick a design that suits you, or your friend.


DELIVERY TIMELINE

story:
CyberDash Story

Hello everyone! My name is Andrea Gini, and I have a passion for machines. As a child, I disassembled and re-assembled my computer to understand how it worked, and turned that into a career of over 23 years in information technology. I am a founding member of the first not-for-profit maker space in Barcelona, Spain, and contributor on city grid infrastructure and large art installations appearing at Burning Man and across the world. When I am not focused on computers, I am riding and maintaining motorcycles, and for the last 9 years, that has been with a BMW R1200 GS. I love this machine, and while I am not ready to trade it in, the features on newer models got me thinking about creating an upgrade to the interface. In recent history, humans have taken to adapting analog tools to the modern standards of the digital era — everything from toothbrushes to vehicles — with easy-to-read digital screens and phone app interactivity, and my hope was to bring these features to a replacement dashboard.

With the entire world in lockdown, I finally found the time to bring this idea to fruition. Thanks to the manufacturing experience of our team at Aviatek Flight Simulators, together we built a digital dashboard for my machine. After sharing the progress with my local off-road adventure group, I discovered that I am not alone in my excitement about this project. This broad interest has given me the motivation to take the CyberDash from a personal project to a fully-developed prototype, now ready to be made available to R1200 GS owners world wide.

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make CyberDash widely available, we need to meet our goal of €60,000 to begin production. The bulk of the funds will go toward manufacturing the custom mold for the chassis, followed by the glass and electronic components.

This is why we need for you to back CyberDash now!

The 7-inch digital TFT display streamlines all of the important, real-time information you need from your motorcycle into one place. The easy-to-read screen assures that you can quickly check your stats while you keep your focus on what matters most — your surroundings.

When we reach our goal we will start the production process and you will receive your CyberDash in January 2021

 

Important Note

This is a fixed funding campaign (all or nothing).

In the event that we reach our goal production will begin in September.

In the event that we do not reach our goal production will not go forward, and all funds will be automatically returned to you by Indiegogo.

 

 

Nota Importante

Esta es una campaña de financiación fija (todo o nada).

En caso de que alcancemos el objetivo, la producción comenzará en septiembre.

En el caso de que no alcancemos el objetivo, la producción no avanzará, e Indiegogo le devolverá automáticamente todos los fondos.

 

Nota Importante

Questa è una campagna di finanziamento fisso (tutto o nulla).​

Nel caso in cui raggiungiamo il nostro obiettivo la produzione inizierà a settembre.

Nel caso in cui non raggiungiamo il nostro obiettivo la produzione non andrà avanti e tutti i fondi ti verranno automaticamente restituiti da Indiegogo.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Why we need your help:

From the start, CyberDash has been entirely self-funded. We've utilized our life savings to pursue this dream of sharing our creation with the world. Your pledge will allow us to purchase the custom mold for the chassis of the dashboard, and move forward with the first production run of CyberDash!

 

Stretch Goals:

We have already had many requests from owners of R1200 GS LC model years from 2013 to 2017, asking if CyberDash is available to fit their motorcycles. In order to accommodate those requests we have set two campaign stretch goals.

The first stretch goal will be at 500 claimed perks. If we reach this goal, we will build a CyberDash variant compatible with the R1200 GS Liquid Cooled model years from 2013 to 2017, and the perks for this variant will be automatically activated and available to claim.

The second stretch goal will be at 1000 claimed perks. If we reach this goal we will poll the community in order to evaluate which models are most desired for a CyberDash variant.

 

Risks & Challenges

We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however, please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues including:

  • Production delays
  • Suppliers are unable to provide accessories on time

Currently, we have an initial prototype of CyberDash but building any new product is a huge task and there are risks involved. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in January 2021. As such, we will be providing our backers with regular updates on this progress. We’ll always keep in touch with you, and welcome any messages you wish to send.

 

Product specifications may change to ensure that CyberDash is produced at the highest standards possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of our crowdfunding page.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love for you to join the CyberDash movement and help by spreading the word on social media or telling colleagues and friends about our campaign using the following links:

Indiegogo : https://igg.me/at/cyberdash

Youtube : https://youtu.be/468xAT-nN84

 

The Team

story:
Hi Everyone!

 

Graham from Shifteck here. As you may have seen us post on Instagram, we put the GT350 up on the lift today to work on the prototype x-pipe. Unfortunately, based on our findings, we are going to cancel the indiegogo campaign.

 

Why you might ask? Well, its because we were already able to make a jig and produce a few pipes!!! This means that you can go to the shifteck website at shifteck.com (or direct link here: https://shifteck.myshopify.com/products/shiftec...) and order your X-pipe. We have them on the shelf and will ship them out the SAME DAY or NEXT DAY after you order!! In fact, if you order today - sunday, we will ship them on Monday and upgrade you to 2-day shipping. No more waiting until September from the Indiegogo campaign, we are going to get them to you THIS WEEK!!

 

The price on the website is $200 and will remain that way for 1 week before we raise the price up a little bit, but we wanted to personally invite you to place your order and get your x-pipe ASAP. Please let us know if you have any questions.

 

 

Thanks

Graham

Shifteck

story: Bike is all I need
story_txt: Bike is all I need

story:
Just look at the difference!

 

Say goodbye to numb hands and sore wrists!

Designed to fit the hand and support good posture, Handalz mean more miles in comfort.

So, whether you’re going round the park, or across the country, Handalz can make a difference to your ride.

 

What's the problem?

Standard bicycle grips (both cylinder and current ergo grips) promote poor posture and uneven load distribution. They allow the wrist to collapse down and out, placing strain on the tendons and pressure on key nerve sites.

And that’s why your hands and wrists get tired, sore, or even injured.

 

What's the solution?

Handalz distinctive design supports the hand and prevents the collapse of the wrist.

The end result is a stronger, more natural posture, where the wrist can perform its role as a shock absorber and load is distributed more evenly across the hand.

 

Are Handalz really different?

Yes! Some current ergo grip designs do a decent job of enlarging the load bearing surface area, but they can't be rotated forward enough to support good posture without risk of sliding off the flat upper surface (e.g. when braking). So strain on the wrist and load on key nerve sites remain high. The unique design of Handalz can safely be mounted higher, supporting better posture without that risk of slippage.

This means that Handalz can address both root causes of common issues.

 

Are Handalz just for people with an injury?

No! Think about hiking boots. You wouldn't recommend them only for people with a foot injury caused by walking too much. They're simply the right equipment for the job and everyone should be wearing them.

 

It works!

Handalz have been independently tested in collaboration with Edinburgh Napier University.

In the Lab

Sophisticated 3D capture systems allowed them to measure the precise benefits to posture, with 100% of riders seeing improvements.

Importantly, Handalz reduced flexion across a key 26 degree threshold that research has shown to be associated with poorer carpal tunnel syndrome outcomes.

On the Road

In the same independent testing we received 96% positive feedback on the riding experience! Here are some of our favourite quotes from testers and our broader user community.


And our personal favourite from two time Scottish cyclocross champion Iain Paton when we put his regular grips back on his bike :)

"These thin grips feel weird!"

This is Iain enjoying Handalz before we stole them back!

 

 

Installs in seconds

Handalz can be installed in seconds on any standard straight handlebar.

 

 

The Design Process

The Handalz journey began with a simple goal: to make cycling more comfortable for everyone.

Over the course of literally hundreds of iterations we refined the design to optimise posture and reduce strain.

 

Along the way we consulted with medical professionals (hand surgeon), sports performance experts and (most importantly) cyclists. Handalz constantly evolved based on feedback and testing.

 

Next, the award winning professional design team brought their skills to bear, ensuring that Handalz incorporate the highest standards of industrial engineering. Handalz are made in a two-step injection moulding process. 

A semi-rigid substrate provides structure.

A softer outer material provides cushioning and dampens vibration.

An aluminium lock ring completes the assembly, providing a secure mounting point to the bike.

 

The end result is a patent pending design that addresses the weaknesses of current options.

 

And looks beautiful too!

 

Technical Specifications

 

What's left to do?

We have a fully functional prototype that has been thoroughly (and independently) tested. We also have a beautiful final aesthetic design, shown above. To ensure the product you receive doesn't just perform well but also looks great, these will be merged in a final design phase before manufacture. Note that we are NOT messing with the proven features, so no surprises!

 

Who are the BikeSenz team?

We're a small group of passionate cyclists who really believe that there is a better way. We also have an extensive group of advisors spanning disciplines from medicine (hand surgeon), to the cycling industry, to sports performance experts to ensure we create the best product possible. Clearly, this is a business venture, but we are also unashamedly passionate about cycling and the benefits it can have for both people and the planet. Our mission is to make cycling more fun for everyone.

 

Schedule

Below is the schedule for estimated Handalz delivery. Our team includes members with extensive project delivery experience from blue chip companies, so we feel good about meeting our promises. Obviously we will be fully transparent in the event of any updates.

 

What if the project fails to meet its funding goal?

If we don't raise sufficient funds to deliver, we'll refund all our supporters. End of story.

 

Are Handalz right for me?

Version 1 of Handalz has been refined for the majority of riders (e.g. commute, park ride, etc). If you're an extreme off roader with an aggressive elbows out stance then you may find the radial deviation correction in version 1 too strong. We also like the idea of a double lock ring design to handle the rigours of extreme off road use. Stay tuned!

 

Stretch goals

As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked. So share with your friends to keep the surprises coming!

$50K Vote for Colours

The most requested stretch goal so far. If we exceed $50k you'll get the chance to vote for your favourite colour options! We'll make Handalz available in the top choices.

Future stretch goals ... 

We'll unlock new stretch goals as we go! If you back us, please feel free to leave us a comment telling us which stretch goals you'd like to see.

 

Share our story

If you believe in what we're trying to do please share our story and help us be successful. Use the Indiegogo share tools, click the buttons below, or just share the link.

 

Something we missed?

If you were looking for an answer and you can't find it here or on the FAQ page, please get in touch! We've swapped a lot of emails with many of you in the run up to the campaign and we love it! If you're on your PC/Mac then you can use the 'Ask a question' link below the project title or we're always available at support@bikesenz.com

We're a small group of passionate cyclists who really believe that there is a better way. We also have an extensive group of advisors spanning disciplines from medicine (hand surgeon), to the cycling industry, to sports performance experts to ensure we create the best product possible. Clearly, this is a business venture, but we are also unashamedly passionate about cycling and the benefits it can have for both people and the planet. Our mission is to make cycling more fun for everyone.
 
Schedule
Below is the schedule for estimated Handalz delivery. Our team includes members with extensive project delivery experience from blue chip companies, so we feel good about meeting our promises. Obviously we will be fully transparent in the event of any updates.

 
What if the project fails to meet its funding goal?
If we don't raise sufficient funds to deliver, we'll refund all our supporters. End of story.
 
Are Handalz right for me?
Version 1 of Handalz has been refined for the majority of riders (e.g. commute, park ride, etc). If you're an extreme off roader with an aggressive elbows out stance then you may find the radial deviation correction in version 1 too strong. We also like the idea of a double lock ring design to handle the rigours of extreme off road use. Stay tuned!
 

Stretch goals
As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked. So share with your friends to keep the surprises coming!
$50K Vote for Colours

The most requested stretch goal so far. If we exceed $50k you'll get the chance to vote for your favourite colour options! We'll make Handalz available in the top choices.
Future stretch goals ... 
We'll unlock new stretch goals as we go! If you back us, please feel free to leave us a comment telling us which stretch goals you'd like to see.
 Share our storyIf you believe in what we're trying to do please share our story and help us be successful. Use the Indiegogo share tools, click the buttons below, or just share the link. Something we missed?If you were looking for an answer and you can't find it here or on the FAQ page, please get in touch! We've swapped a lot of emails with many of you in the run up to the campaign and we love it! If you're on your PC/Mac then you can use the 'Ask a question' link below the project title or we're always available at support@bikesenz.com

story:
Short Summary

 

  • My name is Jean M. Paulroc, I'm the founder of rwydedriver.com, is a taxi company, not just any taxi company, but a taxi transportation solution company for all your transport needs.

    I have great experience in the logistics field, I know the transportation plays a major part in everyone's everyday lives.

  • I want to bring the solution to the consumer's transportation lives, the ones that depend on every movement when a person steps foot out of the door. Rwyde Driver will be at your door, whenever you need transportation no matter the distance. Rwyde Driver is available on Google Play, and on the internet. 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  •  We are looking for $200,000.00, the funds will be going towards Rwyde Driver for office         expenses, staff expenses, vehicle expenses, technology expenses
  •  Our perks are different. it's original 
  •  If we don't reach our goal the funds will be put towards Rwyde Driver to start.
  •  If we don't reach our entire goal we will start with the funds that we raised      
  •  The project is valuable to the contributor around the world, the company will benefit everyone in their everyday lives.
  • We are offering 2% in Revenues to our investors

The Impact

  •  We already have drivers line up to work, many clients have downloaded our rwydedriverapp/ rwydeuser app on google play

Risks & Challenges

  •  Our plan for solving these challenges is to thrive for success, provide the best customer service that anyone can offer

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.

Please share the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

story:
Rides on the hovercraft will be available to all contributors in multiple locations across the United States.

Mercier-Jones will be traveling with the working hovercraft to areas where a majority of our contributors live. IL, VA, MD, VT, OH and OK are on the list and we are likely to come to your state as well if you contribute!

 

Reviews Around the Web!

 "...we just know it'll end up on Lake Havasu." Wired.com

 "Sports car-inspired design aims to bring hovercraft into the 21st century" Gizmag.com

 "It’s also, as you can see, stylish. That’s really the thing: this thing looks superb. It’s a crime it isn’t already in production." Guyism.com

"That's not your grandfather's hovercraft." Buzz:60

"...the prospects for the personal hovercraft look, to this reviewer, surprisingly good." Alphaleaks.com

"...one hopes that the gasoline-electric hybrid hovercraft goes beyond being just a pipedream." Newlaunches.com

"Mercier-Jones Sporty Hovercraft is simply amazing" Vehiclepassion.com

"Mercier-Jones sporty hovercraft looks awesome." "We truly hope they succeed!" Autoevolution.com 

International Acclaim!

"...design tastes of the super sports car." Norway

"There's some R8 and "Transformers" in the design of this hovercraft." France

"...soon we will have even hybrid hovercraft." Greece

"...respectable of agent 007 or Batman." Slovenia

Special update for all contributors:

As the interest is spiking around the web, more and more of you are excited to one day soon be piloting your very own Mercier-Jones hovercraft. So, as an extra reward to those of you contributing to this campaign, we are now giving you two times your contribution amount as a credit towards your purchase of a Mercier-Jones hovercraft. That means a contribution of $5 gives you a $10 credit and $350 gives you a $700 credit towards your new ride! The credit is limited to an amount of $1,000. Thank you for your support!

 

Hovercraft Aren't (just) Science Fiction 
Hovercraft are the most versatile of recreational vehicles, becuase they can travel over water and land in a variety of environments. Hovercraft travel on a cushion of air and literally hover right above the surface. This low level "flying" makes it possible to travel over grass, water, sand, ice, and many other terrain. Because they are traveling on air, there is very little friction to overcome, so recreational hovercraft can travel smoothly at speeds up to 40-60 miles per hour. Hovercraft can be piloted in lakes, ponds, rivers, beaches, fields, and in your back yard.


 
 
 
From Concepts to Reality
The automotive industry is filled with futuristic concept cars that inspire and intrigue us, but we never actually get to drive them because they are never manufactured. The technology of a hovercraft is both futuristic and intriguing, but the designs of current production models don't inspire the way they should. We are here to change that. Our concepts are the future of personal hovercraft, and it's time to start building them to make you the next pilot.
 
 
We have already built several hovercraft prototypes in less eye-catching forms. These prototypes, and the lessons learned from them, make up the foundation of knowledge that will bring this current design to fruition. The MML1 "Red Bench" is an original design and prototype of a hovercraft lift system. If you pledge at the $65 level, you can build a version of this prototype and start developing with us.
 
Building the MML1 Hovercraft Prototype
 
Hovering on the "Red Bench"
 
A Cool Design is Only the Start
The core technology of hovercraft has been around for over 50 years, and it's time for an upgrade. We are pioneering the development of hovercraft that are quieter, easier to maneuver, and more environmentally friendly. Mercier-Jones hovercraft will allow you to hover without the need for earplugs, will offer steering and braking ability similar to a car, and fly-by-wire control on a gas-electric hybrid power train to unlock design potential. Our patent pending hovercraft directional control system allows fine tuned control in the forward, lateral and reverse directions. Independent control over each side of the thrust system enables advanced maneuvering for the pilot.
 
The Nuts and Bolts... and Carbon Fiber
The hovercraft will employ state-of-the-art materials and components from the marine, automotive, and aerospace industries, but without the hefty price tag. By utilizing existing technologies and fabrication methods, we will be able to build vehicles that the general public can purchase and enjoy. Weight saving materials like aluminum and carbon fiber will give our hovercraft better performance characteristics and more stylish looks. We want every detail of a Mercier-Jones hovercraft to evoke quality and performance. We want the price tag to be within reach. Our goal is for our entry level hovercraft to cost $19,900 or less.
 
 
Give the Development a Go!
As an IndieGoGo.com backer you are essential for us to build fully functional versions of the hovercraft as you see them pictured here. Your contribution will fund the purchasing of components, materials, and equipment to build and test several vehicles that we will bring around the country for your enjoyment. Don’t get us wrong, Mercier-Jones has tools of our own, but with your help, we don’t have to be the only ones who get to enjoy what they can build. The ultimate reward for us will be safely piloting one of these incredible machines over land and water and bringing that experience to others; that's why every backer gets a ride! Your comments, feedback, and suggestions will also be invaluable for us to bring you the hovercraft that you have been waiting for.
 
Structural Materials: The raw materials and structure 
This includes carbon fiber, fiber glass, resin, foam core, marine plywood, and aluminum and steel framing. 
 
Drive Train and Controls: The power systems and motion actuators
This includes gasoline engines, electric motors, actuators, alternators, batteries, bearings, cables, pulleys, belts and drive shafts.
 
Aerodynamics: The lift and thrust components
This includes lift fans, thrust fans, stators, vents and skirt materials. 
 
Work Space: The building and testing locations
This includes large work shop rental space, permits, and testing grounds.
 
Fees: Campaign fees 
This includes fees to indiegogo, paypal and shipping and handling.
 
Tools: Specialty tools for building and testing
This includes a pitot tube anemometer, infrared thermometer, vacuum bags, and safety equipment.
Project Timeline
 
A Dedicated Team
Michael Mercier has been talking about building hovercraft since the 8th grade. He built three in 9th grade and nearly won in his category for an all-grades high school science fair. He designed and built a four-person hovercraft the summer after highschool. It had some flaws, but he re-designed it and built a better one two years later. The MML1 "Red Bench" hovercraft is the working proof of concept for his simple and efficient plenum-hull lift system design. During and after completing his degree in Mechanical Engineering at VCU and focusing in product development, he has designed and built everything from UAVs to Paper Shredders including VTOL Craft,Surgical Tables, Wagons, Tri-Cycles, and Packaging Machinery. His passion for hovercraft stays strong and he's ready to build the future of these vehicles through Mercier-Jones.

Chris Jones is Michael Mercier's cousin but the two are practically brothers. Chris is a natural role model and a brilliant business mind who has always been interested in how companies enter the marketplace, offer products consumers want, become national or global competitors and everything in-between. He grew up with close ties to prominent businessmen in the state of Oklahoma and has always dreamed of one day owning his very own company. This led him to complete his degree in Business Administration, which only furthered his interest in the business world. Chris is also a car fanatic who has grown up admiring the automotive form, both functionally and aesthetically, so when Michael suggested they re-shape the face of the hovercraft industry by infusing modern automotive design, he was immediately committed.

Rewards:
PLEDGE $1 OR MORE - Everyone Gets a Ride!
You'll get to ride one of the first Mercier-Jones hovercraft! The goal is to make the future of hovercraft a reality for everyone! Every backer will get to enjoy and experience the thrill of this hovercraft! You'll also get your name proudly displayed on our website as a backer. Rides will be available at our home base and at hovercraft events around the USA.
 
PLEDGE $15 OR MORE - A Render for You
Choose your color scheme and get a signed print of a Mercier-Jones hovercraft rendering! Keep the image where you can see it as you anticipate your ride on the future. ($1 level rewards included)
PLEDGE $25 OR MORE - Wear Your Support!
You will receive an exclusive silk screened "I Backed the Future" T-shirt along with the $1 level rewards. Show off this awesome T-shirt design and the awesome fact that you have made the future of hovercraft possible!
 
The color choices for the t-shirt are maroon, white, and charcoal. If part of your perk is the t-shirt, you will be contacted after reaching our funding goal (we can do it!) to tell us your choice of color, size, and men's or women's style.

PLEDGE $45 OR MORE - A Longer Ride
You'll get a 15min ride on a Mercier-Jones hovercraft with at least one advanced maneuver like a 360 spin! You will also receive a print, T-shirt, and your name on the website.
 
PLEDGE $65 OR MORE - Hovercraft Developer
Become a part of the development team by receiving your own plans for building the MML1 "Red Bench" hovercraft. The MML1 is a proof of concept prototype for a simplified hovercraft lift system, so there is no thrust or controls. The design is not refined, but with these plans, you can build the version we made, and work with us on refining it! We've included formulas and tips to help you advance. ($45 level rewards included)
 
PLEDGE $80 OR MORE - Hovercraft Pilot  
Pilot the Mercier-Jones hovercraft for 30 minutes. This is not just a ride, you get to fly it! An instructor will ride along with you and give you training and tips on controlling the vehicle. This is what it’s all about, piloting the future! Of course, you'll also get a t-shirt, print, and your name on the website.
 
PLEDGE $100 OR MORE - Hovercraft Pilot and Developer
Become a pilot and developer! You'll get the MML1 plans, the 30 minute pilot session, the t-shirt, print, and your name on the website under "Top Backers".
 
PLEDGE $150 OR MORE - Facility Tour
You get to peek behind the curtain and look under the skirt of the hovercraft during a hands-on facility tour. Come see the research and development center, and learn how to work with carbon fiber! ($100 level rewards included)
 
PLEDGE $250 OR MORE  - A Piece of History
Keep a part of hovercraft and transportation history forever. You’ll get a carbon fiber piece of a Mercier-Jones hovercraft body panel mounted and identified on a 5x7" plaque. Hang this on your wall and show it off to all your friends! ($100 level rewards included)
 
PLEDGE $350 OR MORE  - Inner Circle
Become a part of the Mercier-Jones Inner Circle. You’ll get updates on new vehicle models and types in development, before anyone else. Experience an inside scoop on the design and build process. You’ll get priority access and position on waiting lists for this and any future Mercier-Jones vehicles. And to top it off, you’ll get 2 piloting sessions on this hovercraft and every Mercier-Jones vehicle to come! ($150 level rewards included)
 
PLEDGE $15,000 OR MORE  (3 available) - Take Home the Future
You get a pre-production Mercier-Jones hovercraft and amazement in the eyes of everyone who sees you piloting it. We will deliver it to you personally within the USA. Celebration and VIP treatment are guaranteed. ($350 level rewards included)

Frequently Asked Questions:

Where can I use the Mercier-Jones hovercraft? What are the laws for them?
Hovercraft can be used in water such as lakes, rivers, ponds and oceans and on land such as fields, beaches, dirt and gravel. Hovercraft can also be used in areas such as swamps, frozen waterways, dry riverbeds and a large variety of other locations.
 
When operating a hovercraft over water, the hovercraft should be registered and insured as a boat. When operating a hovercraft on land, it should be registered and insured as an all-terrain vehicle. 
 
Can they survive rough waters? 
This first Mercier-Jones hovercraft model is about the size of a small speed boat, so it will be able to handle about the same water conditions. Generally, if its not safe for you to be out in a small boat, you would want to hover on land for that day. 
 
Are hovercraft street legal? Can I drive this on the road?
Hovercraft are not currently street legal, but Mercier-Jones has plans in the pipeline for that.
 
What safety considerations went into the design?
Four of the top safety considerations are number one, protecting the pilot and passengers from the lift and thrust fans. The cockpit is not exposed to any of the fans and the intakes and exhausts are protected by guards to keep the fans out of accidental reach. Second, the cockpit and windshield serve to protect passengers from debris. Third, the hovercraft will have inherent flotation and emergency power to get the hovercraft to shore if something unexpected happens while out on the water. Fourthly, the ability to reverse thrust and maneuver with ease gives the pilot more control and ability to avoid a collision.
 
When can I buy a Mercier-Jones hovercraft?
At the end of the indiegogo campaign, Mercier-Jones will offer the opportunity to get on the waiting list for the first production ready hovercrafts. The first production versions are estimated to be ready by September 2013. Contribute at the $15,000 level to get one sooner and at a great price!

Where can I use the Mercier-Jones hovercraft? What are the laws for them?
Hovercraft can be used in water such as lakes, rivers, ponds and oceans and on land such as fields, beaches, dirt and gravel. Hovercraft can also be used in areas such as swamps, frozen waterways, dry riverbeds and a large variety of other locations.
 
When operating a hovercraft over water, the hovercraft should be registered and insured as a boat. When operating a hovercraft on land, it should be registered and insured as an all-terrain vehicle. 
 


Can they survive rough waters? 
This first Mercier-Jones hovercraft model is about the size of a small speed boat, so it will be able to handle about the same water conditions. Generally, if its not safe for you to be out in a small boat, you would want to hover on land for that day. 
 


Are hovercraft street legal? Can I drive this on the road?
Hovercraft are not currently street legal, but Mercier-Jones has plans in the pipeline for that.





 


What safety considerations went into the design?
Four of the top safety considerations are number one, protecting the pilot and passengers from the lift and thrust fans. The cockpit is not exposed to any of the fans and the intakes and exhausts are protected by guards to keep the fans out of accidental reach. Second, the cockpit and windshield serve to protect passengers from debris. Third, the hovercraft will have inherent flotation and emergency power to get the hovercraft to shore if something unexpected happens while out on the water. Fourthly, the ability to reverse thrust and maneuver with ease gives the pilot more control and ability to avoid a collision.
 


When can I buy a Mercier-Jones hovercraft?
At the end of the indiegogo campaign, Mercier-Jones will offer the opportunity to get on the waiting list for the first production ready hovercrafts. The first production versions are estimated to be ready by September 2013. Contribute at the $15,000 level to get one sooner and at a great price!

story:
Now Available at https://www.altorlocks.com/products/saf-lock

 

Bike lock designs haven't kept pace with the tools thieves use. In the past 10 years battery powered angle grinders have become commonplace and can cut through any lock currently on the market in seconds. The SAF Lock is the first lock designed specifically to defend against portable angle grinders. 

We put the SAF Lock and the current leading bicycle locks up against the best portable angle grinders as chosen by Popular Mechanics. 

While all bike locks on the market that we've tested were cut in under 45 seconds, the SAF Lock outlasted every portable angle grinder.

Bicycling Magazine took our lock to task and produced a comprehensive testing video. While it takes seconds to get through normal bicycle locks, it took Bicycling Magazine over an hour and multiple angle grinders, blades and batteries to get through our lock. Read and watch their complete review here. 

 

The SAF Tech Shell prevents any meaningful damage from occurring while causing damage to the angle grinder disc. The SAF Tech Shell is designed to withstand attacks from angle grinders with cutting discs up to 5 inches in diameter.

All portable angle grinders tested against the SAF Lock eventually failed due to one or more of of the following:

  1. Battery died.
  2. Angle grinder overheated.
  3. Angle grinder disc broke.

No portable angle grinder has been able to cut through the SAF Lock. 

 

In the last 10 years, there has been a large shift in bicycle theft from bolt cutters and hacksaws to portable angle grinders. This has been driven by lithium-ion batteries and ever more compact and affordable angle grinders. Simply put, right now any thief can walk into a hardware store and get an angle grinder for under $100 which will fit more easily in their backpack than a bolt cutter. 

In addition to protecting against angle grinders you can count on the SAF Lock to protect your bike against bolt cutters, hacksaws, hammers, levers, bottle jacks and lock picks.  

We designed the SAF Lock to be as strong as possible, not as portable as possible. Keep the lock locked to your rack at home or at your office and have a second, smaller, lock for when you go to get coffee. The SAF lock weighs about 13.7 lbs or 6.25 kg which is lighter than some chains, but heavier than you'll probably want to carry. 

 

 

 

We stand by our lock and we've made over 45 minutes of testing videos available. Watch the SAF Lock go up against three of the top rated angle grinders in the video below. 

 

 
We are also holding live demos with Bicycling Magazine and Popular Mechanics. 
 
 

 

The SAF Lock after one angle grinder.

The outer rubber coating is damaged as well as the SAF Tech Outer Shell but the inner hardened steel Core Shackle remains unharmed. 

The SAF Lock after 3 angle grinders and over 15 minutes of cutting. 

Using three angle grinders, back to back, on the same lock we were able to cut away a section of the SAF Tech Shell which exposed some of the hardened core shackle. Still after 15 minutes the lock maintained its strength. Additionally, for the lock to fail, you would need to cut completely through both sides of the shackle. 

 

Altor was started in 2016 with the idea that cyclists needed to ride more and worry less. Cyclists deserved a better lock. We invented and patented the Altor 560g, a titanium folding lock that defeated bolt cutters and weighed only 560 grams. The Altor Apex Ti weighs just 1.5 lbs and is our patented next generation product that improved upon our initial design. For those cyclists who are less weight conscious, the Altor Apex weighs just 2.5 pounds and is made of hardened steel. We assemble our locks in our Sterling, Virginia manufacturing facility. Our team of seven then decided to do the undoable. All locks are vulnerable to angle grinders, until now! The SAF lock continues our tradition to do what has never been done before.

 

At Altor, we've been making lightweight locks for years. If you want a lightweight lock to complement your SAF Lock, all Indiegogo backers receive $50 off any of our APEX lock models at altorlocks.com.

story:
Unfortunately the Vineyard Cruiser fat tire electric bike and bike trailer campaign ended before it ever really began… The bike path less traveled zigged and zagged a bit more than expected, maybe got a little rocky there for a while, but our fat tires (w/ just a little bit of electric assist) rode right over it all and now we’re pedaling in the right direction again. 

If you’re still interested in learning more about our fat tire bikes and fat tire bike trailers – including availability and current ordering details – please check out the official site at Vineyard–Cruisers.com today. 

Welcome to the path less traveled & thank you for your support!

story:
WHAT IS THIS?

The MiniDrive is a retrofit that allows anyone to quickly and easily increase the available storage space in a modern MacBook laptop. This is the only microSD card solution that fits the 13'' MacBook Retina.

THE STORY:

It allstarted in 2011 when my MacBook Pro's hard drive filled up. I needed to add storage space to the computer, but I did not want to void the AppleCare warranty by upgrading the hard drive myself and I did not want to spend $350 at the Apple store. To solve this problem, I built an adapter to retro-fit a 64gb microSD card into the SD card slot. This adapter was constructed using $3 worth of used parts from eBay. 

In November of this year, a friend showed me the Nifty MiniDrive which is essentially the same thing I built for $3.00, sold for $35.00. That is crazy expensive. Lets bring bring the price down to $6.00!

We are here to offer you an economical, fully functional and ascetically pleasing alternative to what exists.... 

THE PRODUCT:

 

Here is our MiniDrive. With it, you can take an inexpensive 64GB microSD card and add "plug-in-and-forget" storage space to your MacBook.

 

 
 
The MiniDrive sits flush and fits securely into the SD slot of all modern (2010+) MacBook computers. (Click here for your specific model)

WITHOUT THE MINIDRIVE:

If you just stick any old SD card into your MacBook slot to add storage, it's going to stick out of your computer. That is not something viable for a device that's thrown into your MacBook case or backpack. It will get broken...

INSTALLATION:

The MiniDrive adapter, works with any microSD cards. It can be placed into the computer for a semi-permanent storage installation or removed on-demand. When the MiniDrive is placed into the computer it is discretely hidden - its plastic tab can be folded into the slot. The MiniDrive can then be removed by pulling the plastic tab out with a paperclip or pencil.

 

THE PLAN:

Here is where we need your help! We can offer a product with the same basic functionality as our closest (and only) competitor ( The $35.00 +Shipping NiftyDrive ), and we can do so for significantly less cost. Our design has the ability to universally fit all MacBooks. Why crowdsource the project? The money raised on IndiGoGo will be used to construct 1000 units - Through volume we can decrease price.

 

*EXTRA* PROTOTYPE PHOTOS:
