story:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We will ship BoardUp when Campaign ends. 

While traveling, Bin Lu (left) saw many passengers struggling with their longboard at airports, on the bus, and at coffee shops. He saw that longboards were used daily as people rode it to work and around town. But once they arrived to where their destination, there were few places to store it!

He wanted to solve this and, as a veteran engineer, figured out a way to make a portable, foldable, and sturdy solution. He wanted to make a board that won't pinch fingers, won't fold while doing tricks, and won't sacrifice the familiar longboarding feel. He then showed it to people at skateparks and they loved it! Encouraged by fans, he wanted to expand the team to create a market-ready product. He then met CJ Terral (right), an active athlete and traveler, who immediately loved the idea. CJ took to helping package the brand and market it to other boarding enthusiasts.

 

Fold and Go.

BoardUp is the world's first patented self-folding longboard, requiring no hands to fold. It's easy to fit in your backpack or locker, an airplane compartment, or by your desk. Now, you can longboard anywhere in the world with ease.

 

Featured on:

Main Features:

 

 

 

Sturdy enough for all types of riding.

When it comes to riding, keeping that familiar feel is important to us. More than that, having a longboard made with quality materials creates a feeling of security when bombing down neighborhood hills and cruising on the streets.

Fits easily in your backpack and locker.

Easy to carry and safe on your hands.

Our ergonomic handle is designed to ensure your fingers won't be pinched while folding or unfolding the board. (note: caution is still recommended)

 

Dimensions (when unfolded): 8 1/4" X 33"

Dimensions (when folded): 8 1/2" X 16.5" X 3" (4 5/8" at far end) 

Weight: less than 7.7 pounds 

Wheel Size: 75mm X 50mm (standard for longboards) 

Truck Length: Kingpin 6" Bearings: ABEC 9 

Longboard Material: Canadian maple wood 

Hinge Material: Aluminum alloy 

 

Easy on trip:

 

Travel the world with BoardUp

Imaging that you pull out BoardUp from you backpack while you are visiting Yosemite  national park. and rider next to the river, to the mountain. 

 

Enjoy riding anywhere, anytime.

 

 

Pro skateboarder Aaron Kyro (over 2.8M followers on YouTube) tested BoardUp. Watch the video HERE.

 

 

"It's folds like origami, but sturdy like tree"  -  Kickstarter Backer

"It is a Game Changer"  -  BoardUp Fan on Facebook.com/GoBoardUp

"Bloody Brilliant"  -  BoardUp Fan on Facebook.com/GoBoardUp

"I would use that thing all the time to ride to school. I don't have a locker big enough for my board so my teachers yell at me if i bring my it to class"  -  Youtube Video Comments (click here to watch)

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

Letting more folks to know about US patent granted BoardUp, and understand the unique benefit and fun with BoardUp.  You will receive a special bag only for Indiegogo backers.  

BoardUp can’t wait to meet you and make your daily commuting more fun.  

If the goal is not met. We will refund you in full. Of course you are always welcome to order on our website here.

IMPACT

What's benefit to my son Alan Lu, I belive it can also be good to you too.  together, let's make the world a little more fun. make commuters and college students life a little more easier. 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

SAFETY

Always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear in case of a fall. Do not ride the board out of your skills and be cautious of your surroundings. Although the hinge design is made with anti-pinch technology, use caution when folding the longboard.

LEGALITY

Laws and regulations regarding longboards vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product before you ride it.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

The BoardUp longboard is more sophisticated than your typical longboard. Getting this product into full scale production is not easy. However, we are working with amazing suppliers and partners to make it work.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any small things can be helpful to bring the benefit to more commuters and college students, please spread out the word by clicking the shared link. 

                          

 

How to contact us:

General inquiries: contact@goboardup.com

Creator: binlu@goboardup.com

 

FAQ:

1. Will this come pre-assembled with trucks, bearings, and wheels?

Each reward (except the "REPLACEMENT WHEELS AND BEARINGS" reward) are pre-assembled with high quality trucks, bearings, and wheels. Once you take it out of the box, it is ready to ride.

2. Can trucks, wheels, and bearings with BoardUp be replaced with parts we buy at a skate shop?

Yes. You can use standard wheels (75mm X 50mm) and bearings. While BoardUp's rear truck is standard, its front truck is unique to this longboard. The good news is that trucks normally last a long time.

3.I don't like the artwork on the back of the longboard. Can you ship me one without the artwork?

For a bolder presence, we refined the artwork to be more aesthetically simple. It was carefully designed by a talented artist we knew through friends in the in Bay Area who has a passion for boarding. Over 80% of the backside surface will be the original Canadian maple color. With the same passion and creativity we put into BoardUp, we think you'll love it as is.

4.The middle of the longboard where the hinge is seems to bow up. Could you change it to be flat like a normal longboard?

We designed it so that, as you ride on campus or through the streets, the hinge won't collide with bumps that you may come across. At 1 1/4" tall, if the board were flat, this may cause a disturbance in your ride as you run over something below the longboard. That's why we slightly bowed the middle. Friends of ours and professional longboarders have tried it out and they prefer how smooth of a ride it becomes with this feature.
story_txt:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We will ship BoardUp when Campaign ends. 

While traveling, Bin Lu (left) saw many passengers struggling with their longboard at airports, on the bus, and at coffee shops. He saw that longboards were used daily as people rode it to work and around town. But once they arrived to where their destination, there were few places to store it!
He wanted to solve this and, as a veteran engineer, figured out a way to make a portable, foldable, and sturdy solution. He wanted to make a board that won't pinch fingers, won't fold while doing tricks, and won't sacrifice the familiar longboarding feel. He then showed it to people at skateparks and they loved it! Encouraged by fans, he wanted to expand the team to create a market-ready product. He then met CJ Terral (right), an active athlete and traveler, who immediately loved the idea. CJ took to helping package the brand and market it to other boarding enthusiasts.
 
Fold and Go.

BoardUp is the world's first patented self-folding longboard, requiring no hands to fold. It's easy to fit in your backpack or locker, an airplane compartment, or by your desk. Now, you can longboard anywhere in the world with ease.
 
Featured on:


Main Features:

 
 

 
Sturdy enough for all types of riding.

When it comes to riding, keeping that familiar feel is important to us. More than that, having a longboard made with quality materials creates a feeling of security when bombing down neighborhood hills and cruising on the streets.
Fits easily in your backpack and locker.

Easy to carry and safe on your hands.
Our ergonomic handle is designed to ensure your fingers won't be pinched while folding or unfolding the board. (note: caution is still recommended)

 

Dimensions (when unfolded): 8 1/4" X 33"
Dimensions (when folded): 8 1/2" X 16.5" X 3" (4 5/8" at far end) 
Weight: less than 7.7 pounds 
Wheel Size: 75mm X 50mm (standard for longboards) 
Truck Length: Kingpin 6" Bearings: ABEC 9 
Longboard Material: Canadian maple wood 
Hinge Material: Aluminum alloy 
 

Easy on trip:

 
Travel the world with BoardUp
Imaging that you pull out BoardUp from you backpack while you are visiting Yosemite  national park. and rider next to the river, to the mountain. 

 
Enjoy riding anywhere, anytime.

 


 
Pro skateboarder Aaron Kyro (over 2.8M followers on YouTube) tested BoardUp. Watch the video HERE.


 


 

"It's folds like origami, but sturdy like tree"  -  Kickstarter Backer
"It is a Game Changer"  -  BoardUp Fan on Facebook.com/GoBoardUp
"Bloody Brilliant"  -  BoardUp Fan on Facebook.com/GoBoardUp
"I would use that thing all the time to ride to school. I don't have a locker big enough for my board so my teachers yell at me if i bring my it to class"  -  Youtube Video Comments (click here to watch)
 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET
Letting more folks to know about US patent granted BoardUp, and understand the unique benefit and fun with BoardUp.  You will receive a special bag only for Indiegogo backers.  
BoardUp can’t wait to meet you and make your daily commuting more fun.  
If the goal is not met. We will refund you in full. Of course you are always welcome to order on our website here.
IMPACT
What's benefit to my son Alan Lu, I belive it can also be good to you too.  together, let's make the world a little more fun. make commuters and college students life a little more easier. 
 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
SAFETY
Always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear in case of a fall. Do not ride the board out of your skills and be cautious of your surroundings. Although the hinge design is made with anti-pinch technology, use caution when folding the longboard.
LEGALITY
Laws and regulations regarding longboards vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product before you ride it.
RISKS & CHALLENGES
The BoardUp longboard is more sophisticated than your typical longboard. Getting this product into full scale production is not easy. However, we are working with amazing suppliers and partners to make it work.

Other Ways You Can Help
Any small things can be helpful to bring the benefit to more commuters and college students, please spread out the word by clicking the shared link. 
                          
 
How to contact us:
General inquiries: contact@goboardup.com
Creator: binlu@goboardup.com
 
FAQ:
1. Will this come pre-assembled with trucks, bearings, and wheels?
Each reward (except the "REPLACEMENT WHEELS AND BEARINGS" reward) are pre-assembled with high quality trucks, bearings, and wheels. Once you take it out of the box, it is ready to ride.
2. Can trucks, wheels, and bearings with BoardUp be replaced with parts we buy at a skate shop?
Yes. You can use standard wheels (75mm X 50mm) and bearings. While BoardUp's rear truck is standard, its front truck is unique to this longboard. The good news is that trucks normally last a long time.
3.I don't like the artwork on the back of the longboard. Can you ship me one without the artwork?
For a bolder presence, we refined the artwork to be more aesthetically simple. It was carefully designed by a talented artist we knew through friends in the in Bay Area who has a passion for boarding. Over 80% of the backside surface will be the original Canadian maple color. With the same passion and creativity we put into BoardUp, we think you'll love it as is.
4.The middle of the longboard where the hinge is seems to bow up. Could you change it to be flat like a normal longboard?
We designed it so that, as you ride on campus or through the streets, the hinge won't collide with bumps that you may come across. At 1 1/4" tall, if the board were flat, this may cause a disturbance in your ride as you run over something below the longboard. That's why we slightly bowed the middle. Friends of ours and professional longboarders have tried it out and they prefer how smooth of a ride it becomes with this feature.

story:
The modern bicycle is a true piece of craftsmanship and meets the rider’s expectations in style, functionality and sustainability. The D-RACK matches your bike in all these qualities. It is entirely designed and produced in Germany using high quality materials. Due to its local manufacturing process colors and length can be custom-made. The unique drilling template allows mounting your bike horizontally even though its top tube may not be.

The D-RACK is made of premium-quality and durable materials. Its aluminum body is cut using advanced CNC machining techniques. 

We can anodize your rack so that it's color scheme matches your bike! Current colors are: raw, silver, brushed silver, black and brushed black. Further colors will be introduced as stretch goals. You can choose your color after the kickstarter campaign!

We offer different lengths to make sure that your bike hangs as close to the wall as possible.

In order to protect the frame of your bike when you place it on the rack, we shielded the edges using a silicone strip. We use extra robust and anti-skid silicone and firmly attach it to the aluminum profile.

Currently you can choose between black and red protectors. Further colors will be introduced as stretch goals. You choose your color after the Kickstarter campaign.

We designed a separate mount to securely fasten your D-RACK to the wall. It is precisely CNC-milled and will be anodized in your favored color. The wall mount comes in the same color as the body.

With the included drilling template the angle of the D-RACK can be adjusted based on the angle of the top tube - without using any spirit level! This ensures that the wheels end up even. 

If you order a D-RACK you will get a package including

- a D-RACK in your chosen color and length with edge protection in your favored color
- a wall mount in the same color as the D-RACK
- mounting accessories including screws, screw anchors, offset screwdrivers and torx bit
- a drilling template.

Optional extras are
- a wooden front panel made of olive or Kebony wood
- a leather strap
- a PARAX T-Shirt
- Mini D-RACKs.

We produce the D-RACK exclusively in Germany. Due to its entirely local manufacturing process, its carefully selected and sturdy materials, its modern timeless design and its outstanding durability the D-RACK is a green product. We even rank under the top ten of the GreenTec Awards!

Thanks for reading, you can back us at the top of the page!!!

Another big risk and challenge is being able to fulfill the orders we receive in a timely manner. We spent the last one and a half years making sure that we found the right manufacturing partners. These companies have been in business for decades, providing mass scale manufacturing for thousands of companies. We look forward to adding our company to the list

We spent the last one and a half years making sure that we found the right manufacturing partners. These companies have been in business for decades, providing mass scale manufacturing for thousands of companies. We look forward to adding our company to the list

story:
Was wir benötigen, was Ihr dafür bekommt 

Ab 20 Decks pro DESIGN  werden wir in Produktion gehen 

Jedes Design wird nur einmal in Produktion gehen und ist eine limitierte Edition.

Die Oberseite  wird  mit einer fortlaufenden Nummerierung versehen 1/33,  2/33 usw usw 

ES GIBT MAXIMAL 33 STÜCK PRO DESIGN 

DAS DECK 

*Handmade in Austria

*Medium concave

*Materialien: Glasfaser, Epoxidharz, kanadischer Ahorn und Bambus

*Flexy / biegsam und leicht

*Breite : 8.0

*Inklusive gratis Mob Griptape

G-Flex - Glasfaser und Flexibilität.

Das Kape G-Flex Board wurde für Skater entwickelt, welche den Flex von herkömmlichen Holzdecks lieben, aber dennoch mehr Pop, Stabilität und Performance wollen.

Durch die Verwendung von Glasfasern und Bambus, welches beide sehr stabile und flexible Materialien sind, haben wir ein Skateboard kreiert welches sehr lebhaft, leicht und poppig ist. Es besticht durch seinen weichen Flex und angenehmen Fahrverhaltens. 

Es ist außerdem so konzipiert, dass es ultraleicht ist. Was zu dem leichtesten Board führt, das je hergestellt wurde.

Dieses Board ist ideal für Anfänger, fortgeschrittene Skater und Profis.

story:
How we want to change things as they are:

We are trying to challenge the limitations of the current variety of ride sharing by offering a completely open solution to ride share.

Currently there are many great ride sharing platforms out there which provide several services with many restrictions. We want to offer those services without the restrictions. Give our riders and drivers the freedom to more efficiently handle types of services and charges with one flat fee:




How the app Works

  Ride share that you can pay or barter for

  Verified profiles for riders and drivers

  Choose your ride by feedback rating and rate your drivers

Benefits For Users

  You can choose your driver by feedback rating, price or distance

  Prices up front calculated ahead based on destination

  Any form of payment allowed

  Add your favorite driver to your friends list and ride with them again

Benefits For Drivers

  Flat fee: you only pay 1% of your earnings

  Any mode  of transportation: car, rickshaw, minivan, bike, tuc tuc…

  Pick your fare: charge what you want per Km


One of the limitations we want to challenge is the vehicle limitations. We want to allow drivers to use any transportation means that is best suited for their community.


But let us explain more in details...



RIDE

"Ride" mode: Riders enter their destination and GO-there will show all the available drivers around. As a  rider you can choose a driver on the map by looking at their profile. In list mode you can sort drivers by distance, feedback, price or car type. GO-there will automatically calculate the final price depending on your driver’s fare. You can choose the payment type: by credit card,  PayPal, or cash




HITCH-HIKE

"Hitch-hiking" mode: Good old bartering: you can exchange anything you want for the ride and GO-there will not charge drivers or riders at all. If you want to share your ride on your way to work just enter your destination and GO-there will locate riders looking to go in the same direction. At GO-there we believe that sharing transportation will lead all of us to a better and more sustainable society.




We need an initial amount of $30,000 to get things started.
Your donation will be used for licensing, servers and initial development.

If we are able to reach $60,000 in donations we can then deliver a finished completed app.

If we are able to reach $100,000 in donations we can offer the app in more locations and in many more languages.

Ultimately what we want is for people to be able to more efficiently move about in a more sustainable way. It is important to us to make an impact on environmentally friendly ideas in practices to improve everyday life.

One of the best contribution you make by using this app is to contribute to the community with sharing and bartering with a positive impact on the environment.

Please share our campaign on Facebook, tweet what you think on Twitter, or put us in a circle on the Google+.

There is an Indiegogo share tool on this page.

story:
INTRODUCING CONAN L1

The Conan L1 electric scooter is a compact, efficient solution for urbanites that will allow them to get around town on their own terms, while maintain optimal comfort at the same time. The scooter features an 800 watt motor that's powered by a battery pack that will deliver up to 50 kilometers of range per charge to make it ideal for multi-day inner city commutes. The unit can reach a top speed of 30km/h to ensure it meets the needs of riders in urban areas who want to keep up with other vehicles on the road.

The Conan L1 electric scooter is designed with 10-inch tires and boasts a spring shocker absorber in the rear to keep riders feeling comfortable at all times.

 

An Incredible Riding Experience...

The L1 E-Scooter turns the burden of transportation into a fun and enjoyable activity.

Ultimately, Conan L1 is the perfect choice  for flexibility, allowing you to travel one point to another while enjoying the time you spent. Even with a 10-mile daily commute or a short trip, you wont be exhausted and you don’t have to think about the distance problem. Experience your town and country side in a new way.

 

Conan L1 deals with the manufacturing, distribution and sales of intelligent electric scooter, kickboard electric skateboard and vehicles with well-equpped testing facilities and strong technical support by R&D department.

With a wide range, good quality, reasonable prices and stylish designs,our products are extensively used in personal transportation, metro deployment, airport customs, large venue, tourist resort, golf court, and other industries.

 

SHIPPING 

 

 

THANK YOU FOR BACKING US

story:
Wouldn't it be awesome if a plane flew around with a banner reading Ted Nugent is a Pussy?

Wouldn't it be even more awesome if excess money raised to fund the plane flight went to a good cause?

Well, good news, everybody. Together we can make this happen.

Ted Nugent has long used his position as a mediocre buttrocker to make his outspoken political opinions be known. Despite his very eloquently crafted ideology, word is out that the Motor City Madman dodged the draft by crapping his own pants or something.

Thus, I've found a skywriting service that will fly a banner reading "TED NUGENT IS A PUSSY" through the air over a city. This kickstarter seeks to raise enough funds for a 1-hour flight ($1100), but if we exceed this goal, we can get a longer flight. It's $1750 for 2 hours, and $2400 for 3 hours.

Excess funds will be donated to anti-gun-violence charities.


You're right, man. This would be totally sweet. How can I help?

Well, for starters, you can donate some money. Any little bit helps get this idea off the ground. But spreading the word about this helps, too! This is fixed fund, so if the project doesn't happen, you get your money back.

 

Aren't you worried that Ted Nugent is going to sue you or come after you with a crossbow or something?

No. Because I'm not a pussy.

story:
Accepted

Go anywhere.

The Dual Stripe technology in your Stratos Card works where traditional cards do. Stratos is accepted at stores, coffee shops, ATMs, gas pumps, parking meters, kiosks, and more.

Secure

Safer than the cards in
your wallet

Stratos uses bank-level encryption and never displays your card numbers. And you can set your Stratos Card to lock down if it’s lost or stolen.

Smart

Always remember your gift and loyalty cards.

Double tap your Stratos Card to receive instant location- and history-based card suggestions. The more you use Stratos, the smarter it gets.

*Available with future Stratos App upgrade.

Imperial Guitars

Set up

 

Use

 

Manage

Simple to set up

Plug the included Stratos Reader into your phone and swipe all of your cards into the Stratos App.

You’ll have access to every card whenever and wherever you need it.

story:
RESUMEN

¡Hola a todos!

Somos DEIMOS Perú, un equipo interdisciplinario de estudiantes de diversas regiones del Perú que hemos trabajado durante dos años en la construcción de un vehículo para participar en un concurso de la NASA: Human Nasa Rover Challenge.

La construcción de este vehículo ha implicado muchas horas de investigación, diseño y construcción. ¡Y finalmente lo hemos conseguido!

Sin embargo, para que podamos llegar a representar al Perú por primera vez en el concurso de la NASA nos falta dinero para completar los pasajes y estadía del equipo.

Estamos seguros que con tu apoyo vamos a demostrar al mundo que en el Perú también podemos desarrollar ciencia e innovación de alto impacto.

¡Somos DEIMOS Perú y con tu ayuda llegaremos al Human Nasa Rover Challenge!

 

LO QUE NECESITAMOS Y LO QUE OBTIENES:

A la fecha necesitamos $12000 para costear los pasajes y estadía de los 7 miembros del equipo inscritos en el Challenge de la Nasa, así como para el transporte del vehículo.

Ofrecemos una recompensa simbólica de llevar los nombres de los y las donantes en nuestros polos y equipo durante la competencia. Al mismo tiempo finalizada la competencia elaboraremos un álbum virtual de fotos y vídeos de la competencia donde nuestros donantes tendrán un espacio y agradecimientos especiales.

IMPACTO:

Ayudar a que el primer equipo peruano compita en el Human Nasa Rover Challenge, un concurso internacional de diseño de vehículos que buscan desenvolverse en superficies de cuerpos celestes como la Luna y Marte.

Impulsar la investigación, desarrollo e innovación en el Perú. Queremos mostrar al mundo las cosas geniales que estamos desarrollando en el país. Gracias a tu ayuda el mundo conocerá más de cerca nuestro potencial

Marcar un precedente en campañas crowfounding en Perú para proyectos de investigación aplicada. Así como DEIMOS Perú existen muchos equipos con potencial que necesitan de nuestro apoyo para participar en campañas internacionales.

 

OTRAS FORMAS EN LAS QUE PUEDES AYUDAR:

Difundiendo la convocatoria con personas que puedan sumar a la campaña. Al mismo tiempo poniéndonos en contacto con potenciales auspiciadores: políticos, empresas, filántropos, organizaciones, entre otros. El contacto es deimosperu@pucp.edu.pe
story_txt:
RESUMEN
¡Hola a todos!
Somos DEIMOS Perú, un equipo interdisciplinario de estudiantes de diversas regiones del Perú que hemos trabajado durante dos años en la construcción de un vehículo para participar en un concurso de la NASA: Human Nasa Rover Challenge.
La construcción de este vehículo ha implicado muchas horas de investigación, diseño y construcción. ¡Y finalmente lo hemos conseguido!
Sin embargo, para que podamos llegar a representar al Perú por primera vez en el concurso de la NASA nos falta dinero para completar los pasajes y estadía del equipo.
Estamos seguros que con tu apoyo vamos a demostrar al mundo que en el Perú también podemos desarrollar ciencia e innovación de alto impacto.
¡Somos DEIMOS Perú y con tu ayuda llegaremos al Human Nasa Rover Challenge!
 
LO QUE NECESITAMOS Y LO QUE OBTIENES:
A la fecha necesitamos $12000 para costear los pasajes y estadía de los 7 miembros del equipo inscritos en el Challenge de la Nasa, así como para el transporte del vehículo.
Ofrecemos una recompensa simbólica de llevar los nombres de los y las donantes en nuestros polos y equipo durante la competencia. Al mismo tiempo finalizada la competencia elaboraremos un álbum virtual de fotos y vídeos de la competencia donde nuestros donantes tendrán un espacio y agradecimientos especiales.
IMPACTO:
Ayudar a que el primer equipo peruano compita en el Human Nasa Rover Challenge, un concurso internacional de diseño de vehículos que buscan desenvolverse en superficies de cuerpos celestes como la Luna y Marte.
Impulsar la investigación, desarrollo e innovación en el Perú. Queremos mostrar al mundo las cosas geniales que estamos desarrollando en el país. Gracias a tu ayuda el mundo conocerá más de cerca nuestro potencial
Marcar un precedente en campañas crowfounding en Perú para proyectos de investigación aplicada. Así como DEIMOS Perú existen muchos equipos con potencial que necesitan de nuestro apoyo para participar en campañas internacionales.
 
OTRAS FORMAS EN LAS QUE PUEDES AYUDAR:
Difundiendo la convocatoria con personas que puedan sumar a la campaña. Al mismo tiempo poniéndonos en contacto con potenciales auspiciadores: políticos, empresas, filántropos, organizaciones, entre otros. El contacto es deimosperu@pucp.edu.pe

story:
Op PolCon  delen 250.000 Vlamingen politiecontroles en andere verkeersinfo. Dat levert een schat aan informatie op die tot nu toe enkel op Facebook beschikbaar is. Met een app brengen we die informatie niet alleen naar je auto, we maken het ook makkelijker om een melding te plaatsen. En dat allemaal met maximaal respect voor de verkeersveiligheid. 

Een goeie, bruikbare app (voor iOS en Android) kost geld. En daarom hebben we jou nodig! 

Bijdragen kan vanaf 1 EUR. Vanaf 10 EUR krijg je de app gratis! Levenslang!

story:
Meet the Game-Changing Expresso Scooter

We're excited to bring to Indiegogo our affordable, technology-advanced electric scooter, the Expresso!  With your help, we can begin production and add new features to an already amazing scooter. 

We're a group of designers, engineers and entrepreneurs who have joined together to create the first affordable electric scooter that provides a viable and fun solution for transportation while helping reduce carbon emissions by going 100% green. 

We're dedicated to a long-range plan of creating personal vehicles that are affordable, reliable, meet the needs of consumers, are scaleable sustainable for production. Our first product, the Expresso, is one we've worked hard to create, we've put it through the paces and we believe, you'll love it!  It's Tesla meets Vespa in one affordable two-wheel experience! 

 

What You'll Get with the Expresso

We've provided you with multiple options on this incredible scooter. Let's start with the battery. The basic Expresso comes with a traditional lead-acid battery (to keep the costs low). The second option uses a Titanium battery that is removable and charges in two hours. Your third option is an LTO (Lithium Titanium Oxide battery) that charges in 10 mins! 

We're also providing you with a mind-bending list of color options. Want to support your school or favorite team? We've got colors to inspire and excite!

To get in on the fun, you can snag an Expresso for under $1,000. Yeah, we said that! Check the perks for details on how you can back now!  (Limited inventory for discounted options)

We're using funds from Indiegogo to create our first round of production and create our SmartDash app to provide you with route info, control music and phone calls AND charge your Smartphone - Android or iOS!

 

We're Already Winning Awards!

Last year, we were awarded the coveted Reddot Design Award for best in product design concept for the Expresso. 

 

 

Go Expresso. Go Green!

We're not only excited about the technology and performance we're building into our revolutionary scooter, but we're passionate about saving the planet and creating greener options for both now and the future.  We are looking to partner with schools and universities to help provide solar charging stations for our line of scooters to make our carbon footprint even smaller!

 

We're new but we have experience

Our team may be young (with the exception of a few) but we've had previous experience in design, scaleable production and technology. Our plan is in place to move this company forward and Indiegogo is our launch pad, focus group and our first group to own and enjoy the first product out the door - the Expresso. 

 

The SmartDash 

Our newest feature for the Expresso is the patent-pending SmartDash which charges your smartphone while also providing access to your phone's apps as well as the Expresso's mobile app to monitor travel routes, get directions, check battery levels, plus, control your music and phone calls all from a Bluetooth connection!

 

We've Got Colors!

Choose from a variety of single colors in matte finish or combine color panels to create and showoff your school, sports team or business brand!  Specific color options will be confirmed in the campaign follow up survey prior to shipping. 

 

Advanced Lithium Titanium Oxide (LTO) Battery Technology

LTO batteries have been used in a number of applications around the world. They power buses in Asia and military vehicles in Europe.  We're one of the first to bring the next-generation power supply to consumers with the Expresso. The battery is so advanced, you'll be able to fully charge your scooter in just under 10 minutes!  And, the battery lasts up to 70 years under normal conditions. You can even use it to power other electric devices like laptops, coolers and even portable refrigerators! 

 

Timeline

The Expresso has been a year and a half in the making. From concept to shipping your own game-changing scooter, here's our timeline.

story:
A Stylish, Bold and Foldable

e Fatbike

 

 

 

Shadow : Single Crown Fork with lock out.

 

Striker : Down Hill Dual Crown Fork.

 

 

Powerful Battery Pack max. 840W. High industrial standards with Samsung (48V/11A)) and Panasonic(48V/17.5A) Cells for best reliability and durability.

 

 

Range up to 100 Miles with one single charge.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The 26 -inch all terrain fat tire is perfect for Road and also soft grounds like sand or snow.

 

Foldable and easy transportation in Car or Train.

 

 

Easy Riding like a normal Bicycle even battery is dead.

 

 

High Performance Hydraulic Brake.

 

 

 

For comfortable riding on any terrain.

 

 

Twist Throttle for 750W and 1000W versions. (250W optional)

 

 

 

 

 

Never miss your phone again for reading map or listening music.

 

 

Two Colors available : Black or White

 

 

 

Specification

 

 

Nothbike, a bike unlike anything else.

North Bike, a really cool bike in bold stylish design . For people who lives in adventurous lifestyle, Northbike fulfills all the benefits that come from owning an e-bike and meets all situations and personal needs.  Great bike for every one for city cruising or off-road hiking. 

 

Bold, fast and Stylish : A Bike to Make Everybody Happy

This is my ethos for Northbike. We promise once you starts to ride this bike you ll never stop to smile. It s a bike e to make you and everyone happy.  Northbike is different to the most ebike on the market. It s stylish, compact, fits all situations and your personal needs.

 

All Terrain

Northbike isn’t best suited to just one terrain; it’s perfect for all and yes, that includes soft, unstable surfaces like sand and snow. 

 

Easy Moving and compact

We didn’t just make Northbike stylish, we made it foldable and compact  - making it transportable if you’re carry it in car or train. Northbike was designed with varying lifestyle possibilities in mind; yours is just one of many.

 

Mobile Phone holder with USB Charging

Charging  your smart phone and playing music or watching map whilst riding your eBike. With Northbike you’ll never miss your phone at riding or need to worry about your phone dying prematurely again. Charge it on your journies and never be without it.

 

Quality & Production

Service and satisfaction are at the core of what we do and it’s therefore important to us that we reflect this in the production process by ensuring we always produce quality eBikes. Everything down to the screws has been carefully selected to make sure you’re getting value for money.

 

Coming to Market

We need your help to bring Northbike to the marketplace. Pledge today and help us to push our unique range of eBikes to a whole new audience. Thank you for reading and I hope to see your name in the pledge section below.

 

ADD-ON / UPGRADES:

For any upgrade please send us an email : upg@northbike.de

 

 

 

Free Shipping & Tax included :

1 . Free Shipping Door to Door Service.

2.  No TAX Charge for You.

3. All inclusive Price. No additional charge. Our selling price is 100% the final price.

4. Only for Backers in USA, European Union, Thailand, Taiwan, China and Hongkong.

 

Pay Only Deposit Amount to order:

Pay only a deposit amount to order your bike. We will inform you about the shipping schedule and pay the rest amount when we are ready to send out your bike.

 

The Pre Production has been started:

We have already started the production. Our backers will get the bikes right in time. The first bikes will send out in February/March 2020.

No matter how high the Indiegogo funding result will be, we definitely ship out every bike to our backers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Founder - Steven Wu ( Tao Wu) :

Steven is German with taiwanese root and works in the eBike industry since 2012. 

               -  I like Ebike and specially e-Fatbikes, Northbike is unlike anything else. It’s stylish, affordable and meets the requirements of the adventurous biker and city cruiser. North Bike is my first start up project on Indiegogo. Please support us and let me show you more cool bikes in the future. -

 

The North Bike Team:

 

Have any Question?

 

Please see FAQ

or

send us an Email :

Support@northbike.de

story:
Shipping begins December 2021 and will be sequenced based on when the order is placed.
 
 

 

It's hard to find a bike that looks good and takes you far. Not anymore. Get the ultimate in style and substance with an ONTRO e-bike.

Our signature frame design is inspired by the form of a crane for an elegant and minimalist vibe.

 

 

 

 

The small-but-mighty 48-volt system, 670-watt-hour battery rotates into the frame with a handle that makes charging effortless. It comes with a lock, BMS, and Samsung-SDI cells.

 

 

 

 

Just click a button to set off. Get a clear view under sunlight and use the LED backlight for safety at night.

 

 

 

 

 

ONTRO's proprietary pedal technology, NEAT Hybrid Drive System, monitors the rider's pedal behavior through the bottom bracket torque sensor. It constantly calculates power output to give you the right amount of thrust at all times.

 

 

 

Reach speeds of up to 28mph(45km/h)* as you soar past the traffic jams. ONTRO e-bikes pair aerodynamic engineering with full throttle mode.** Reach your destination fast and sweat-free.

*Top speed of 28mph applies to models of P1 and A1. 28mph reaches in pedal-assist mode.

**Full throttle mode exclusive to A1 and G1 models.

 

 

 

 

 

*Ranges results based on actual test results with riding in city area, 150lb body weight.

 

 

 

The speed of the subway meets the freedom of the saddle. Conquer your commute* on just one charge and get around in style and comfort.

View the A1's full list of features below!

 

 

 

Whether you're grabbing groceries or going on an urban adventure, the G1 lets you carry everything you need. Its high torque brings huge speed, even when tackling torturous hills.

View the G1's full list of features below!

 

 

 

​

 

 

Zoom through the streets at exhilarating speeds up to 45km/h. Aerodynamic efficiency brings you a full-powered ride, all while using less power. This is a lean, mean, excitement machine.

View the P1's full list of features below!

 

 

 


 

 

Real product Comparison

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping begins December 2021 and will be sequenced based on when the order is placed.

 

 

 

 

 

Commuting Matters!

We say "Commuting Matters" because we believe people deserve more than a mountain bike or road bike for their commute. 

 

Our goal

Our philosophy is that a commuter bike is more than a way to get from A to B. It should also complement your style. 

ONTRO bikes have a unique structure that looks sleek without any compromise to practicalities like luggage space, mud-guards, lights, suspension, transmissions, powerful performance, and battery capacity. Many designer bikes sacrifice this level of functionality for style.

 

Why Crowdfunding?

We need your support to overcome the MOQ (Minimum Ordering Quantity) required by factories.  We are a small team with limited resources. Without your support, we won't survive against competition, and ONTRO won't exist.

 

Pricing

ONTRO e-bikes have a premium design and are high-quality. Feel free to compare the specifications and price with any other bikes on the market.

We are offering the lowest possible price to Indiegogo backers to get the high volume of orders required to kick-start our business. We guarantee you this unbelievably low price will only be available for a short time.

 

Is ONTRO worth the few months-long wait?

An e-bike will accompany you for MANY YEARS. Good things come to those who wait, and your e-bike will bring you delightful experiences. 

By supporting ONTRO, you do the following:

  1. Receive an excellent craftsmanship bike that exceeds your expectations
  2. Help an excellent team survive
  3. Drive innovation in the industry

Your action is of huge value to us!

 

Join Us Now!

Join our campaign, and we'll bring ONTRO into this world TOGETHER.

Customer satisfaction is of great importance to us and is even the driving force behind the creation of ONTRO.  We guarantee quality, delivery, and service in the future.

Thank you so much,

ONTRO Team

 

 

 

Hi, we’re ONTRO. As a team of young entrepreneurs and engineers, we’ve been working together since 2015, released our first prototype bike in 2017, and started planning our business launch in 2020. 

Our goal has always been to build the ultimate collection of commuter bikes. We saw so many commuter bikes that focused only on style, and sports bikes that focused only on performance. There seemed to be no in between. So we made it our mission to create an e-bike that's strong, stylish, and offers an incredible commuting experience - all at an affordable price. 

To make this happen, we tested around 100 bikes with a sample group. We listened to their feedback and continuously made changes until we had an e-bike that lived up to our high standards. 

Our philosophy is that a commuter bike is more than a way to get from A to B. It should also complement your style. 

That’s why we worked endlessly to perfect the design. ONTRO bikes have a unique structure that looks sleek without any compromise to practicalities like luggage space, mud-guards, lights, suspension, transmissions, powerful performance, and battery capacity. Many designer bikes sacrifice this level of functionality for style.

We often say "Commuting Matters" because we feel people deserve more than a mountain bike or road bike for their commute. 

Given that commuters make up the majority of cyclists, their needs should be taken more seriously. We want to finally give them the excellent commuting bikes they've been waiting for. 

We’re excited to launch our revolutionary lineup of e-bikes on Indiegogo. 

Your support will help us overcome mass production barriers, and build the foundation of ONTRO’s future. 

We hope you can join us so we can continue innovating the safe and stylish e-bikes commuters deserve. 

 

Hugo Z. Xu, CEO + The ONTRO Team!

ONTRO LLC San Francisco, CA, U.S.

ONTRO Co.,ltd. Shanghai, China.


 

This project is managed and promoted by Agency 2.0, the #1 Product Launch Company.

Hugo Z. Xu, CEO + The ONTRO Team!
ONTRO LLC San Francisco, CA, U.S.
ONTRO Co.,ltd. Shanghai, China.
 
This project is managed and promoted by Agency 2.0, the #1 Product Launch Company.

story:
Dear supporters,

While this campaign has ended, our mission continues to replace car trips with healthy and fun bike trips. Thank you for being a passionate supporter of Ridekick.

Our campaign didn’t get enough visitors to meet our expectations, but those that visited showed a good pledge rate. We feel encouraged by the feedback we received and plan to refine our strategy for even better traction in our next campaign.

We’re excited to bring the Ridekick Child Trailer to the market and appreciate that you shared the vision with your pledge.

If you are here after the campaign is expired, please send us a note at info@Ridekick.com to let us know if you are interested in purchasing your very own Ridekick child trailer, or if you want to give one as a present, or just offer a “thumbs up” to our team here in Colorado.

Keep riding!

  Mark Wanger - founder

Ridekick powered Child Trailer

  A trailer for your bike that
  has an electric motor
  and makes pedaling easy.

Carry your kids and their cargo and don't sweat it.  

 

The child trailer that pushes you!

When kids grow, bicycling with them is hard ...

    • Kids weigh you down,
    • inclines are hard,
    • and headwinds take the fun out of the ride.

Choose a normal trailer, OR upgrade to the Ridekick  power trailer to make your rides as fun as you imagined.

 

Helps you pedal up to 19 mph.

    Cycle around town for 15 miles
  (or up to 45 with additional battery packs.)

   Attaches to any bike.      (No need to buy an electric bike!)   

 

Don't wait for the weekend to ride ...

 

  • Cycle the kids to school.

  • Take two kids to the park. 

  • Stop at the store on the way, there's room for groceries.

             In 8 minutes you can go 2 miles. 

Go faster.  Carry the kid's gear.  Don’t sweat or strain.

Grandparents can easily take the kids, too.

 

Simple throttle

Push a little for slow speed.   
Push a lot for higher speed.
Let go, no power.

Safe control at your fingertips.

 

 

 

Got HILLS?

         Go outdoors and don't mind the extra weight.

       Leave the car in the garage.

     Get there without sweat or strain.

                                   SMILE and be Happy!

 

 

The Ridekick Team

Fort Collins,  Colorado

     Interbike Exhibitors 2010, 2011, 2012

Experience

Our team has decades of experience designing and manufacturing products for high quality companies; our marketing expertise has keen focus on your needs and desires, and our post-sales product support has earned accolades from our customers. 

Track record of success

Our first product is the revolutionary Ridekick trailer for commuters and recreational riding. It's sold in bicycle stores across the USA and to customers in 8 countries.       www.Ridekick.com

The new Ridekick child trailer is built on this success and is now we're ready for you, our customers. When enough pre-orders are entered, the product launch will begin!

Why do we create Ridekick trailers?

Our mission is to enable more people to cycle instead of drive because it’s more fun, and healthier for people and the planet.

Over 100 million short car trips occur daily in the US.  Imagine millions of 4 mile trips taken by bike instead of driving!

  • Every bicycling mile saves a pound of CO2.
  • It’s more FUN to cycle through neighborhood streets rather than fight traffic in a car. 
  • Even with a power assist, your heart rate comfortably reaches 70 to 100.  Get healthier.

There are barriers to bicycling: hills are difficult, it's hard to carry the things we need, and we often don't have time for a shower.  Ridekick power assist gets you over the hurdles to a the fun of cycling. 

 

What does the funding enable?

Product design has been tested to engineering standards and performance is stellar. It’s been tested by focus groups and people at various locations from the hills of San Francisco to the great outdoors of Colorado.

"Wow, what a ride. Going up hills is amazing."

"Too fun! I think I am in love."

Next we’re ready to complete all the design details and part specifications, and validate suppliers and part specs.  Your pre-payments enable us to order parts in bulk and create the assembly line to inspect parts and assemble the product to our high standards.  

 

Reserve your Ridekick power child trailer:

Two discount levels.

$699 entitles you to a Ridekick child trailer at a $200 discount from the retail price AND first delivery priority. $699 is your entire price.

$249 reserves a unit at $749 (the balance will be due when your Ridekick child trailer is shipped.) This is a $150 discount from full retail.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Will you support the idea of more bicycling and less driving? 
      Share this campaign with your friends and family.
  • Post this idea on your favoriteblogs, tweet us, or like us on Facebook.com/ridekick 
  • Got ideas for features and products?  email us at info@ridekick.com

Ridekick has shipping certification for lithium batteries; safety is highly valued. Domestic shipping costs of $45 covers shipping with the continental US.  Please inquire for internation rates. International duties and regulations vary by country. 

 

 

Interested in investing in Ridekick International?

Go to our investment bankers website for opportunities. 

  • blossomventures.com

=====================================

 Want even more information?

  Check out the gallery tab at the top of this Indiegogo page for:

  • Product Specifications.
  • Lowering your carbon footprint  (infographic).

 Add your question or ideas to the comments tab.

story:
JACK is a universal-fit front bicycle rack that securely straps to almost any bike, offering a straight forward solution to carrying your things while you ride.  A ‘Rack of all Trades’, JACK fits to your bike with a tool-free strap system, requiring no special bicycle frame or fork, no specialist equipment, and no bike maintenance skills. 

 

FAST, TOOL-FREE INSTALL

JACK can be attached to or removed from your bike in less than a minute and in 3 simple steps:

1. Clip JACK onto your bars

2. Hook the load strap

3. Tighten the retention strap

 

 

 

MADE FROM HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS

 

JACK’s frame is made from a single piece of cold formed 304 Stainless Steel rod. 304 Stainless is stronger and more durable than regular steel or aluminium. It's also rust resistant, so your JACK will go as long as you do!

 

JACK’s fabric base is sewn from a heavyweight military grade fabric that compliments the tough Stainless frame.

 

JACK’s load straps are total overkill! Modelled on a ‘Dog-bone’ safety harness strap we use climbing grade webbing and construction. JACK’s load straps can take in excess of 300KG dynamic loading. See, overkill!

 

To fix JACK securely in position, the Retention Strap fits around the back of your bikes stem spacers and secures with a Stainless Steel cam-lock buckle.

 

 

FOR ALL TYPES OF RIDING

Commuting  |  Bikepacking  |  Leisure  |  Touring  |  JACK-Packing!!

 

 

 

JACK can fit most handlebar and stem sizes. See the illustrations above to see that JACK can fit your bike. If you're not sure, message us!

 

 

PERKS

Make JACK your rack! and follow the checkout steps to pre-order your selected reward*

*All prices are excluding shipping but include common duties and taxes. See further information in the 'Shipping' section.

 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Weight (including retention strap, 'M' load strap, material base and 31.8mm spacers)

700g

Overall Dimensions

Height 230mm, Width 225mm, Length, 280mm

 

REAL-WORLD TESTING

There aren’t any international standards that apply to JACK, but that hasn’t stopped us testing JACK to destruction: We’ve taken JACK on rough roads and singletrack with extremely heavy loads. We’ve also put JACK through his paces in the lab, with our own tests that we’ve created based on JACKs extreme use-cases.

 

 

WARRANTY

And because we're so confident in JACK's quality and durability, we'll be offering everyone a 2 year warranty (not usual for a crowdfunded product). We still need to iron out the details of this, but effectively it will meant that any part of JACK that fails or becomes damaged due to manufacture faults will be replaced, free of charge.

We'll update you more on this as we near the delivery date of your rack.

 

 

PRODUCTION

We spent a full year searching for the right factory, to make sure we get JACK to you reliably and at the best quality. We found a brilliant factory partner, with years of experience building and shipping high quality bike racks.

It's not easy to create a totally new supply chain, but we decided to do it ourselves, with no agents or middle men, so we understand everything thats going on 'behind the scenes'.

JACKs last 'lip' bend in process:

Welding gigs in the making:

Lugs in production:

 

This is what JACK looks like before heading to the cleaners:

 

 

SHIPPING AND TAXES

All backers will be responsible for any unforeseen import duties, taxes and customs fees after the shipment arrives in their country.

 

TIMELINE

 

 

ABOUT US - WholeGrain Cycles

 

We’re a bike component and accessories startup founded by a group of bike lovers and adventurers with years of industry experience. Dedicated to simplifying an arena plagued by daunting tools and over-engineered accessories; We’re on a mission to create versatile, thoughtfully produced, easy-to-use accessories that anyone can install and enjoy.

Human solutions for humans who ride bikes!

 

 

PRESS & SOCIALS

Need the Press Pack? Access it here:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/l3g4gc4o5rcm6my/AADS...

Password: wholegrain

 

Check out our Instagram too:

https://www.instagram.com/jackthebikerack/

And our Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/Jackthebikerack

 

And last but not least, our website:

www.wholegraincycles.com

story:
The Firetower is a lightweight foldable rocket stove designed to be very compact and easy to set up.

 

Compact and lightweight

The Firetower in its cover bag is no bigger than a small book. Being so compact it is easy to take this stove everywhere you wish to go. 

With this campaign, we hope to launch the sturdy stainless steel version of this stove but also the very lightweight titanium version. 

 

Easy assembly

 

To set up this stove, you start by unfolding the base of the stove and securing it by inserting the side pin. Once secured you can let the ash plate drop in its place.

With the base set up, you can slide on the side pipe and insert the side ash plate in the stove. 

To keep the fire safe off the ground, place the stove on the ashtray and place the pot stand on top of the stove to start cooking.

 

Works efficiently

The design and shape of the stove create a natural airflow in the stove. This means there is no need for batteries or fans to make the fire burn well.

The airflow which is generated flows under the burning wood so it has more oxygen, burns hotter, and with less smoke.

 

Easy to fuel and refuel

 

As fuel for the stove you use sticks, twigs and other biofuels you find in nature. 

The access on the side of the stove makes it very easy to fuel and refuel the stove, even when you are cooking. 

The angel of the side pipe makes fueling the stove even easier as it works self-feeding.

 

Specifications of the set

 Material: 304 stainless steel

 Weight:  500 g ( 1.1 lb )

 Dimensions: (Assembled):  20cm X 17cm x 10cm   or   8 inch x 6.7 inch x 4 inch

 Packing size: 22cm X 12cm x 2cm   or   8.5 inch x 5 inch x 0.8 inch

 

Timing

story:
With 360 super-bright LEDs embedded around our Disc, you'll be mesmerized by the incredible light effects it creates. Does it qualify for the world's Brightest Flying Disc? We certainly think so!

 

 

 The TOSY Flying Disc is designed to suit your preference with 6 different Timer modes: 

 

Two Professional Game Modes: Ultimate 10" and Ultimate 7". 

Modes 3, 4, & 5: these modes determine how long the light stays on after a throw (from 0 seconds to 10 minutes). 

You can also adjust the 6 Brightness levels to match whatever environment you are in! Just make sure you can handle the "Extreme" level ;).

Well, why not a little bit of both? ?

Impress everyone around you as you throw these dazzling Discs to each other for fun, or you can get moving and organize a game of nighttime Ultimate. 

 

 

 

Once you have mastered the basic skills with our Duo, why not level up your game and challenge your friends to a trick shot play-off?  Perhaps these tricks can be an inspiration for you if you ever want to become the next Dude Perfect! 

This is how we test our products for their waterproof capability. Prior to shipping, we will keep you up to date with the exact waterproof rating of our products.

A utility patent is the highest form of intellectual property that protects an invention.

The TOSY Smart Golf Disc and Flying Disc have utility patents in review in the US, and international applications will follow soon.

 

The shipping rates listed below are rough estimates and should be used for reference only. After the campaign has been successfully funded, exact shipping fees will be calculated based on your country and charged via the pledge manager. 

* Duties and taxes are NOT included. 

* Europe Zone 1 includes The UK, France, Germany, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Netherlands, Turkey, Estonia, Iceland, Latvia, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Belarus, Hungary, Poland, Russian Federation, Ukraine, Albania, Andorra, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Malta, Croatia, Serbia. 

* Europe Zone 2 includes Norway, Liechtenstein, Denmark, Finland, Ireland, Monaco, Sweden, Greece, Portugal, Austria, Luxembourg, Switzerland. 

*South Asia countries may have slightly higher rates.

Here is a quick look at our manufacturing site. We will keep updating this section to give you more insights into our production process.

story:
Customize your set up to fit your gear perfectly!

Not a photographer? The backpack also works great as an everyday bag!

 

Peter McKinnon Himself:

 

Chris Hau:

 

Cody Wanner:

 

Armando Ferreira:

 

Matti Haapoja

 

Tyler Babin:

 

Dan and Chelle:

 

Jesse Driftwood:

 

Ryan Kao:

 

Excerssorize me:

 

 

We have been developing bags with Peter McKinnon since early 2018 when we started working on the PM X NOMATIC Travel Pack that we launched in 2019.  With such a positive response from our backers on that campaign, when the campaign ended we immediately started working on this everyday line.  So now after another 18 months of working on 20+ prototypes and dialing in every last inch of these bags, we are thrilled with where the product ended up!  We are extremely grateful for the valuable insights we received from Peter as we collaborated on the function and feature set of these products.  After all the hard work we put into them, we can't wait to get these bags into your hands!

 

 

 ABOUT PETER MCKINNON

 

 

Peter McKinnon is a Toronto based photographer & filmmaker. Peter is a coffee addict and has amassed a loyal following of creators on YouTube and Instagram. He has a passion for gear and is obsessed with things that work well to help him create better content every day.

 

ABOUT THE NOMATIC TEAM

Nomatic is a Kickstarter born company. This is our 11th Kickstarter campaign, we love it here, and we plan to keep coming back. Kickstarter allows us to receive real feedback from real customers before we even manufacture our products. This way, we are able to deliver a product we are sure you will love. We design products that help you have confidence as you live life on the move. Thank you for believing in us!

PRODUCT WARRANTY

Here at NOMATIC, we stand behind all of our products. Just register your product to activate your product's Lifetime Warranty. If we can't fix or repair a manufacture defect, we will replace the product, no questions asked.

Please note that scratches, scuffs, dents, and other blemishes that occur due to normal wear and tear of travels will not fall under the product warranty.  These marks are like badges of honor and should be something you are proud of.  Something that helps tell your travel stories.

 

RETURN POLICY

We offer a 30 day no risk return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 30 days of receiving your order, simply send it back and we will refund you the product cost, no questions asked. But don't worry, we know you are going to love it!

 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

DOMESTIC SHIPPING -

Backers with a shipping address in the US and Canada will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - Rest of the World:

Backers with shipping addresses outside of the US and Canada may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

Unfortunately, we do not ship to every country in the world. Due to logistical reasons we are unable to efficiently ship to every country. If your country is not listed as a country that we ship to, we suggest you find a freight forwarder or freight consolidator that specializes in shipping to your country. If you have any questions about this process, feel free to reach out to us.

 

SHIPPING POLICY

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you’re not there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us), it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

Risks and challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. However, this is our 11th product launch, so we can confidently say we are experienced in this process and have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. We will work hard to ensure we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever possible. Thanks for believing in us!

The backpack also works great as an everyday bag! Peter McKinnon Himself: Chris Hau: Cody Wanner: Armando Ferreira: Matti Haapoja Tyler Babin: Dan and Chelle: Jesse Driftwood: Ryan Kao: Excerssorize me:  We have been developing bags with Peter McKinnon since early 2018 when we started working on the PM X NOMATIC Travel Pack that we launched in 2019.  With such a positive response from our backers on that campaign, when the campaign ended we immediately started working on this everyday line.  So now after another 18 months of working on 20+ prototypes and dialing in every last inch of these bags, we are thrilled with where the product ended up!  We are extremely grateful for the valuable insights we received from Peter as we collaborated on the function and feature set of these products.  After all the hard work we put into them, we can't wait to get these bags into your hands!   ABOUT PETER MCKINNON  Peter McKinnon is a Toronto based photographer & filmmaker. Peter is a coffee addict and has amassed a loyal following of creators on YouTube and Instagram. He has a passion for gear and is obsessed with things that work well to help him create better content every day. ABOUT THE NOMATIC TEAMNomatic is a Kickstarter born company. This is our 11th Kickstarter campaign, we love it here, and we plan to keep coming back. Kickstarter allows us to receive real feedback from real customers before we even manufacture our products. This way, we are able to deliver a product we are sure you will love. We design products that help you have confidence as you live life on the move. Thank you for believing in us!PRODUCT WARRANTYHere at NOMATIC, we stand behind all of our products. Just register your product to activate your product's Lifetime Warranty. If we can't fix or repair a manufacture defect, we will replace the product, no questions asked.Please note that scratches, scuffs, dents, and other blemishes that occur due to normal wear and tear of travels will not fall under the product warranty.  These marks are like badges of honor and should be something you are proud of.  Something that helps tell your travel stories. RETURN POLICYWe offer a 30 day no risk return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 30 days of receiving your order, simply send it back and we will refund you the product cost, no questions asked. story:
Dressing in multilayers is how we keep ourselves warm—a thin base layer, a sweater, and a jacket, and we’re all good for the crisp and chill. However, when we enter an indoor space or sweat during exercise, we started to feel too warm, damp, and stuffy. When this happens, it is not so convenient to take the long underwear off in public or to move around with heavy outerwear in hand. 

We're here to make things easier. 

We created BASE+ with the vision to revolutionize the concept of everyday wear and layering clothing. Unlike conventional thermals, BASE+ can cut down your apparel, keeping you comfy and active from fall to spring, from outdoor to indoor.

We took inspiration from the concept of mountaineering layering and assembled the key elements—moisture wicking, heat regulating, and outer protection—into one design, using the double layer structure to leverage the strength of each textile.

HOMI BASE+’s double layer design integrates various features into one piece. The outer layer gives your body the basic protection against the outside world; the inner layer provides everything you want from next to skin clothing; the additional far infrared fabric used in highlighted areas helps improve blood circulation.

Taking Thermal Experience to the Next Level

As shoulders and elbow joints get cold the fastest and heat up the slowest in our upper body, we add an additional far infrared layer to these parts to provide extra protection. It helps strengthen your overall circulation and relax tight shoulder muscles.

The far infrared fabric can absorb, emit, and reflect far infrared rays from the human body. The ray can go through the skin to resonate and generate heat, which boosts blood flow and relieves muscle pain. 

This additional fabric provides extra warmth, optimum thermal performance, and muscle relaxation without disturbing the other features provided by the base layer fabric.

Zippered Sleeve Pocket

Keep your valuable necessities at hand

BASE+ brings you not only comfort but also convenience. Without disturbing the shirt's silhouette, we added a hidden pocket with YKK zippers to the left sleeve. This tiny pocket is ideal for your essential items, such as cards, wireless earbuds, or bills. It can be very handy when you are on the move!

 

Moisture Wicking & Breathable

Feel fresh and clean at all times

Does your long underwear make you feel stifling and constrictive sometimes? Then try HOMI BASE+. The special fabric used for its inner layer has a similar fiber structure to Merino wool, which performs superbly in moisture wicking and breathability. 

Our fabric is excellent in dispersing and spreading the moisture out, transporting moisture away and activating evaporative cooling. So when your body releases moisture or perspiration, they will be transported away as vapors immediately, keeping you cool and dry.

Thermal Insulating & Regulating

Retaining heat the professional way

Our body temperature changes during and after we exercise, and usually we have to adjust ourselves to feel comfortable by constantly taking off or putting on clothes. Now, BASE+ is here to handle all the work with SUSTAIN THERMO TECH. 

 

Preventing the heat from escaping is the core of SUSTAIN THERMO TECH. In addition to the fine fibers that trap body heat, the double layer structure creates an in-shirt insulation space that retains the warm air, keeping you snug and flexible. 

Hypoallergenic & Soft Texture

No pesky pilling after washing

We make sure that the inner layer of BASE+ is smooth and sleek, touching your skin gently enough just like your favorite undershirt. The skin-friendly fabric is soft, stretchy, and doesn’t pill. It remains smooth after the wash, causing no itchy feelings.

Antimicrobial & Anti-Odor

Silver Nano fights against the unpleasant

The excellent wicking ability of the base layer keeps the fabric dry, which already stops the odor-causing factors from thriving. In addition to that, we apply the Silver Nano clothing technology to the outer fabric.

Silver nanoparticles reduce the factors that cause undesirable smells by penetrating their cell wall. With this antimicrobial shield, you can walk around feeling jaunty and clean.

 

Wind & Sun Resistant UPF 50+

Fewer worries on the road

No matter if you are biking in the city, running in the evening, or hiking on a sunny day, BASE+ protects your skin from chills and ultraviolet rays. The double layer structure not only provides UPF 50+ sun protection but also blocks mild winds. 

Quick Drying & Wrinkle Free

Your new favorite daily wear

Now you can complete your winter outerwear with the HOMI Heated Jacket!

 

Base+ for your training

The special diamond lattice knitted fabric is quick drying, wrinkle free, and won’t shrink or stretch after washing. It will always be sleek and ready for you to put on and head out.

BASE+ is a T-shirt that you can wear comfortably from day to night, from fall to spring. And it is durable and easy to take care of! 

Reflective Stripes

Functional adornment for your safety

When jogging or biking during nighttime, we often need to pay close attention to vehicles coming from our side. To improve the wearers’ safety, we added reflective stripes to the cuff. The reflection will move along with your swinging arms to increase your visibility from various angles.

 

365CAP: Triple Layer Cap to Protect Your Head All Year Round

Do you also feel stuffy and sweaty when wearing a hat for a long time? As our head is what we need to protect first when confronting the freezing wind or burning sun, we created a hat that gives you optimum comfort and protection in all kinds of weather conditions.

Similar to the design concept of BASE+, 365CAP uses the triple layer structure to insulate the heat and regulate your head temperature, keeping your head sung in winter and cool in summer. This is a hat that you can wear all year round!

 

 

 

We are here to help you keep life as simple as possible. Designed with the multilayer concept, HOMI BASE+ and 365CAP provide excellent features that help you wear smarter and say goodbye to stuffy garment. While BASE+ can be worn all day in fall, winter, and spring, 365CAP can accompany you in all seasons. 

Versatile in style, these two everyday wear can accompany you when you are moving around in the city, venture into the great outdoors, or even chilling at home. Designed for urbanites and adventurers, HOMI BASE+ and 365CAP keep you sharp, fresh, and active at the most comfortable temperature all the time!

 

HOMI BASE+ and 365CAP accompanied award winning traceur Yoann Leroux to overcome all the complex environments—from the ground to the top, and from the labyrinthine backstreets in Paris to the great outdoors. 

During his parkour and free running sessions, the highly breathable, moisture wicking, and heat regulating features of BASE+ continually kept his body at the most comfortable state, and the sun and wind resistant feature saved him from wearing another extra layer of cloth. Plus the head protection provided by 365CAP, HOMI’s optimized activewear helped Yoann stay comfy, light, and sharp in his daily training and extreme sports activities.

 

 

 

 

  • Unisex design with a hidden pocket on the left sleeve.

    For regular fit, it’s recommended to choose one size bigger than what you normally wear. If you prefer slim fit, you may choose the size you usually wear. 

    Laundry Care: Machine Washable / Dry Normal Low Heat / Do Not Bleach

 

 

 

365CAP

 

 

  • One size design with adjustable back strap

    Laundry care: Machine washable / Do Not Dry / Do Not Bleach

 

 

 

BASE+

  • Base Layer - SUSTAIN THERMO TECH polyester (OEKO-TEX® Certificate)
  • Far Infrared Fabric (Far Infrared Emission Value Report)
  • Soft Shell - Silver Nano polyester (Antibacterial Test Report)

365CAP

  • Outer Layer - Water Repellent Nylon (OEKO-TEX® Certificate, bluesign® Certificate, Water Repellent Test Report)
  • Middle Layer - SUSTAIN THERMO TECH polyester (OEKO-TEX® Certificate)
  • Inner Layer - Silver Nano cooling polyester (UPF Protection Test Report, Antibacterial Test Report, Heat Insulation Test Report)

Click here to view all the test reports.      

 

After creating a series of optimized thermal outerwear, we wanted to focus on next-to-skin apparel. We were picturing a design that can be an alternative to multilayer clothing and can be worn every day on various occasions. To bring this idea to life, we brainstormed on all the features to put on one T-shirt and researched the fabrics and structure. From selecting the fabrics to testing, producing the prototypes, and finalizing the design, we paid attention to every detail and aimed to generate the best outcome. 

Our products are 100% made in Taiwan. We use high quality materials and work with established local manufacturers. We also produce the products according to bluesign® and OEKO-TEX® standards, making sure that our production is sustainable and energy-efficient. After all the planning, testing, and prototypes, we are now proud to present our design and are ready for mass production.

 

 

 

Founded in 2013 and based in Taiwan, HOMI CREATIONS combines technology and modern aesthetics to create products that align with the ideal lifestyle we envision—smart, stylish, and minimal.

For our SUSTAIN collection featuring thermal apparel, we leverage the advanced technologies and resources we have in Taiwan to create professional, functional clothes that are in style. Our previous projects include HOMI Heated Scarf, HOMI Jacket, and HOMI Vest.

story:
You can check LITO at the airport with no problem - or also jump on it

LITO's patent-pending internal folding mechanism showcase

Traveling with the first LITO in the world in July 2021 - Tuscany, Italy.

 


LITO is the foldable suitcase that helps you save 2.5x storage space, made from 50 plastic bottles. Less space, less waste. 

 

We aim to reach carbon neutrality by 2024.

With every LITO you prevent 5.1 lbs (2.3 kg) of PET plastic ending up in the ocean.

"The first suitcase brand that helps save space in everyone’s closet" MarketWatch AB Digital

 

 

  • Resistance to pressure
  • Internal panels folding system
     

Wondering where to store your bulky suitcase?

Stay organized with LITO – the revolutionary suitcase with a patent pending folding mechanism to save you 2.5x more storage space.

We developed LITO’s unique folding mechanism to be durable, lightweight and simple to use thanks to its 4 internal folding panels. The unique mix of hard and soft shell allow LITO to resist high pressure when checked-in at the airport. 



 
Leave your heavy goods at the hotel and use LITO for your daily trips while still packing your laptop and smaller items!




Ride smoothly thanks to four 360″ wheels designed to resist impact.

 

Worried to lose your investment in LITO due to breakage? LITO comes with a lifetime warranty to protect your investment. This is how much we trust our product. Our warranty is valid in the following cases:

  • Cracks or breaks in the shell
  • Wheels, handles, or telescoping handles that break off and are no longer usable
  • Zippers that can no longer be opened or closed

Fabric tears that render front pocket or side fabric non-functional

If eligible you will get LITO 100% repaired or replaced + a 10% OFF your next purchase on our e-commerce store.


LITO's pre-launch campaign in February 2021 - London, United Kingdom

 

 

  • High carry-on capacity (40Liters - 8.8 Gallons)
  • Sleek design
     

Do you have everything you need for your next trip?

We designed LITO to be slim, yet spacious – optimizing available space in everything we do. 

You can pack up to 40 Liters in LITO carry-on and 70 Liters in LITO check-in, plus the extra front pocket.

 

 

  • 15.6" Laptop pocket
  • 1-click TSA omni opening
     

Struggling to access your items while traveling?

Thanks to the wide front pocket, LITO fits up to 15.6″ laptops. Get easy access to your personal items whenever you need with a TSA lock securing both the front and the main pocket.

 

 


NFC Smart Features

For every LITO pledged on Indiegogo can add an NFC tag to make you pioneer LITO's smart features and connect to our digital ecosystem. Smart feature developed may include:  

1)Flight finder  

2)Smart instructions  

3)CO2 offset tracker  

4)Suitcase tracker 

5)Special offers for LITO owners 

6)Unique product identification 

7)...and more - let us surprise you!

 

FULL SPECS

  • Narrow space storage
  • Internal panels folding system
  • Reflective anthracite texture easy to spot at the airport
  • High carry-on capacity when expanded (40Liters - 8.8 Gallons)
  • 360' Reinforced wheels
  • 15.6" Laptop pocket
  • 1-click TSA omni opening​
  • 100% recycled PET plastic shell
  • Dimensions Carry-on: 21.3” x 14.6” x 5.9" [9.8" unfolded] /  54 cm x 37 cm x 15 cm [25 cm unfolded]
  • Dimensions Check-in: 25.2” x 17.3” x 5.9” [11" unfolded]  / 64 cm x 44 cm x 15 cm [28 cm unfolded]
  • Weight Carry-on: 7.7 lbs (3.4 kg)
  • Weight Check-in: 9.7 lbs (4.3 kg)
  • Waterproof, YKK Zippers
  • 110% limited lifetime guarantee

 

 

Should you buy a suitcase of a duffle bag? We have reinvented the rules of the game by bringing to you the best of both worlds.

 

 


 

 

 

How did we come up with the final design? Simple! We believe in democratic designing. We went through hundreds of video calls, surveys and polls among LITO's community to craft the ultimate suitcase to save space. 

 

100+ LITOers helped us in the creative process on founder calls

When facing product development decisions we asked LITO's community to vote for the best option to co-create LITO together.

 

 

Hey, this is Marco! I created LITO while struggling with personal space while working from home during the pandemic.

My suitcases were all over my studio and I could never find the right place for them.

 

After years of working for global brands such as adidas and Reebok I have now decided to follow my passion. Suitcases are stored 95% of the time and occupy a lot of space in our closets, as the average person owns 3 suitcases. I founded LITO to help travelers save space and enjoy their living spaces.

 

Downsizing will be one of the most important trends of the 21st century. Downsizing also allows you to waste less and be more planet-friendly. It also makes people more relaxed and it is good for mental health. This is why we're on a mission to help travelers save space.

 

Thanks to experts in product design and the help of EC/Brinc start-up accelerators my team was able to create a unique foldable design that is user-friendly, durable and looks great. LITO is the first travel brand that improves not only your travel, but also your stay.

 

Your support on Kickstarter-launch will help us design the first production run efficiently and will be the best way to ensure you'll get LITO among the very first people in the world!

 

Thanks for being part of our story!

Marco Fazio - Founder of LITO

 

Founder shot in the canals near LITO's HQs in September 2021 - Amsterdam, Netherlands

 

Founder contact: marco@litocase.com



Hear it from our fans:

Watch LITO's early adopters testimonials
