story:
Taskin is a young, San Francisco-based startup and there is nothing we love more than create amazing travel gear. We are super amped to introduce you to our two latest creations! The all-new Taskin Xplorer wheeled convertible & expandable backpack and and the second generation Taskin ONE expandable 9-in-1 backpack.

Lets start with the all new Xplorer - A Wheeled Carry-on Travel Bag Without Equals

Last year we launched our first travel backpack and we got a lot of requests for a wheeled version that offered the same style and versatility. Now, after almost a year of prototyping and incorporating all the feedback we received on our original ONE, it’s incredible exciting to roll out the all-new Taskin Xplorer.

Well, it is a Taskin.. so it what else can you expect? Taskin's design principles are anchored in combining style and quality with innovative function. And the Taskin Xplorer delivers on all three in spades.

 

 

Taskin Xplorer features sturdy wheels and a premium-quality trolley system made of lightweight aluminum, with a telescoping handle that can be set to three positions: 37, 34 or 31 inches from ground.

Xplorer is also equipped with a wheel cover, to keep them from touching your clothes when you are carrying it. Because that's never a good look.  

Ready to go jet-setting again? Can't wait to get on plane and get away.. we are with you. At 20"/13"/9" Xplorer is compatible with carry-on size specs for most airlines we know of and the Xplorer should comfortably fit in overhead bins. Even when expanded at 20"/13"/12" most airlines won't object, especially with the compression straps to hold things tight. So we are ready when you are!

Our unique patent-pending backpack straps system allows you to easily and securely store or retrieve the straps within seconds. No need to unhook the straps and push them behind awkward pockets. 

Did some shopping during your travels? Couldn't resist that navy blue sweatshirt? No worries, you can expand your Xplorer to add another 15 liters and go from having a 30 liter bag to one that can hold 45 liters.

 Xplorer lets you can fit a lot more than regular carry-on luggage, while staying far more organized.

 

 

Carry-on Like Packing

Opens wide to make your packing a breeze.

 

4-Point, Self-Balancing Shoulder Straps

Extra wide shoulder straps that with honeycomb mesh padding featuring our unique self balancing 4 point anchor system. No matter how you like to wear your shoulder bag the straps will re-balance to keep your bag in a comfortable-balanced position.

Detachable Hip Belt

Lugging a lot on your back? Get an assist from your hips with the included hip belt at no extra cost!

The hip belt can easily be detached when not in use.. alternatively, it can also be tucked away in back if you think you’ll need them again soon.
 

TSA Friendly Laptop Sleeve

The dedicated laptop section features one larger pocket for your laptop and a smaller one for your tablet or notepad. The laptop pocket is 11 x 14 inches and the smaller pocket is 11 x 12 inches in size. The inside of both these pockets are lined with soft velvet to protect your laptop/tablet.

TSA/Checkpoint-friendly, 180° lay-flat design allows you to breeze through airport security … well at least compared to most other backpacks.

Stove-away Large Water Bottle Pockets

Now you see it, now you don't. A neat hide-able mesh water bottle pocket when you need one. 

Easy-hide Compression Straps Pockets

Hidden pockets to store away those compressions straps when not in use. No one likes dangling straps.

Adjustable Sternum Straps

Easily adjustable sternum straps ensure maximum comfort, no matter your chest size.

Front Easy Access Pocket w/ Velvet Lining

Velvet-lined, easy-access pocket stores your sunglasses or other essentials.

Backpack Strap Easy Access Pocket 

Easy-access pocket on the backpack strap for tokens, access cards etc.

Waterproof External Zippers

Custom, easy-slide waterproof zippers help keep the water out (while ONE is water resistant, it's not waterproof—no bag with stitches are) while being easier to pull open.

Neoprene Cushioned Top Handle 

The top handle is made of neoprene so it’s easy on your hands and stays clean. Neoprene is also very durable. We love neoprene.

Unisex Design

Will look great on you and your significant other, so make sure you get one for your travel partner, too.


 

 

Now let's look at the significantly improved, second generation of Taskin ONE, 9-in-1 backpack.

Our backers rated the original Taskin ONE 4.4/5. And most would be happy with that score for a  new product, right? Well not us. After analyzing the missing 0.6 and poring through tons of ideas and feedback, we set out to perfect this most versatile of backpacks with over a dozen new enhancements.

Taskin design principles are anchored in combining style and quality with innovative function. And the Taskin ONE delivers on all three room to spare.

Let's look at the many key improvements we made to the original design


Easy-Gone Backpack Straps

A last minute design change to the straps plus the challenge of collaborating live caused by Covid19 resulted in the original butterfly straps being too unreliable for our standards. So we set out to design a solution that preserved the ease of storing the straps quickly, but in a way that’s far more durable under heavy strain.

After evaluating and discarding many design options, we engineered a new, now patent-pending design that allows you to easily and securely hide/un-hide the straps within seconds. No need to unhook the straps and push them back into awkward pockets like most current designs. And no risk of a strap coming loose or being exposed when not in use. Yeah, we’re kinda proud of that one, and we know you’ll love it, too.

Hip Belt

Lugging a lot on your back? Get an assist from your hips with the included hip belt at no extra cost!     Now the ONE features a detachable hip belt that would come very handy, especially when the ONE is expanded and fully loaded up. The hip belt can be attached at two different anchor points to adjust its vertical position depending on your preference.

The hip belt can easily be detached when not in use.. alternative it can also be tucked away at the back if you think you will need them soon.

TSA Friendly Laptop Sleeve

TSA/Checkpoint-friendly, 180° lay-flat design allows you to breeze through airport security … well at least compared to most other backpacks.

No Loose Straps

We love dangling straps…said no one ever. The compression straps can now be securely stored in hidden pockets. Every other strap can be secured in their respective pockets/sleeves. Which means when you don't need them, they are out of sight.

Stove-away Large Water Bottle Pockets

Now you see it, now you don't. A neat hideable mesh water bottle pocket when you need one. Improved design now makes the pocket far studier.

Improved Side-Handle

When you are using the bag in the briefcase mode.. you will appreciate the new improved side handles. The hooks have been redesigned to ensure the straps don't accidently slip out. All hardware is made of new lightweight alloys to reduce weight.

Below are just the big ticket items, in addition we made many small improves from new and improved organization pockets, reinforced stitching etc. to truly take ONE from a great backpack to a exceptional one.

 

Backpack Strap Easy Access Pocket 

Easy-access pocket on the backpack strap for tokens, access cards etc.

The 9-in-1 Bag

3 sizes x 3 configurations = 9 practical variations for infinite possibilities. Each variation is designed to meet a specific, real-world use case. Spoiler alert: It’s also far more practical than buying a different bag for each. Especially when you get it all with Taskin quality and style.

Carry-on Size

In Everyday and Weekender sizes, the ONE easily passes carry-on size requirements for most airlines. We have travelled multiple times with the bag fully expanded in Voyager and haven't gotten any looks from airline crew yet.

 

Carry-on Like Packing

But you can fit a lot more while staying far more organized.

Organization

Bet the Taskin One has more organization options then all the backpacks you own combined :).  Just having more pockets is obviously not enough, so we put in a lot of thought and experimentation into designing the most optimal configuration that will get you the most use out of these pockets.

4-Point, Self-Balancing Shoulder Straps

Extra wide shoulder straps that with honeycomb mesh padding featuring our unique self balancing 4 point anchor system. No matter how you like to wear your shoulder bag the straps will re-balance to keep your bag in a comfortable-balanced position.

 Carry-on Attachment

Lugging around a carry-on, well then let it do the heavy lifting with this special carry-on attachment, which secures the One to most standard carry-on handles.

Adjustable Sternum Straps

Easily adjustable sternum straps ensure maximum comfort, no matter your chest size.

Easy Access Pocket w/ Velvet Lining

Velvet lined easy access pocket to store you sunglasses or other essentials.  

Waterproof External Zippers

Custom, easy-slide waterproof zippers help keep the water out (while ONE is water resistant, it's not waterproof—no bag with stitches are) while being easier to pull open.

Neoprene Cushioned Top Handle 

The top handle is made of neoprene so it’s easy on your hands and stays clean. Neoprene is also very durable. We love neoprene.

Unisex Design

Will look great on you and your significant other, so make sure you get one for your travel partner, too.

 

Deciding which one to get…here’s a side-by-side comparison of the two.

Still can't decide? Can't blame you, they are both awesome. Best get the bundle with both at an unbeatable value.

Neoprene is also very durable. We love neoprene.Unisex DesignWill look great on you and your significant other, so make sure you get one for your travel partner, too. Deciding which one to get…here’s a side-by-side comparison of the two.Still can't decide? Can't blame you, they are both awesome. Best get the bundle with both at an unbeatable value.

story:
US Backers, please go to our Amazon store to purchase

 

OVERVIEW

GIGA Pump was launched at MicroNovelty website 2 years ago，it  is a multifunctional and portable air pump for both your outdoor activities and your daily life. 
Now the GIGA Pump 2.0 is launching and it will provide you more surprise with its ultra design of air Pump, vacuum pump and Lantern 3 in 1, and it is also the most portable but powerful pump in the world. GIGA Pump 2.0 is the new generation of portable pumps.

Check what others say about GIGA Pump 2.0

 


Air Pump for All Your Inflatables

The flow rate of GIGA PUMP 2.0 can reach 180L/min and the pressure can reach 3.5KPa. It is the perfect tool to bring along when going to the beach in summer; it can quickly inflate your swimming tube, air mattress, and any other inflatables.

 

Not Only for Inflatables

 

Vacuum Pump for Saving More Than 50% Space

GIGA PUMP 2.0 is not limited to outdoor use, but also perfect for household use. It could work with vacuum bag to store spare comforter and out of season clothes. Turn on the deflation switch, it will suck up all the excess air within the vacuum bag quickly.

 

Lantern for All Your Night Needs

The biggest advancement is that GIGA Pump 2.0 comes with an ultra-bright lantern with a brightness of 40lm to up to 400 lm. It has 3 levels of lighting. With up to 10 hours of battery life, GIGA Pump 2.0 provides you more convenience both in your outdoor and daily life.

Every night with GIGA Pump 2.0

 

Super Small Size

With its ultra portable design, GIGA Pump 2.0 is only 89g and the size is as small as a key. It is suitable for most of the context in your life and you could take it with you anywhere at any time. 

 

5 nozzles

It comes with 4 different nozzles to fit most air mattresses, inflatable pool floats, swimming rings,  yoga ball and kid’s toys. 1 nozzle for vacuum bag to save you more than 50% of space.

Fast Inflate Speed

With a 180L/min flow rate and 3.5kpa high pressure, GIGA Pump 2.0 could fully fast inflate a single air mattress in just 30 seconds. 

Powered by a rechargeable 1300mAh lithium-ion battery, one charge lasts long enough to inflate more than 10 single air mattress, or vacuum more than 20 large vacuum bags, or last up to 10 hours of illumination.

GIGA Pump 2.0 can be charged by a fast Type C port, you could charge it by a powerbank, a normal wall charger, or a PC computer. It is super convenient in all your life.

GIGA Pump 2.0 is completely suitable for outdoor life because of its water-resistant design.  You could use it in any context.

 

Add Ons

 

Here is the list of winning an M size vacuum bag.

story:
What is the Stac Pac?

The Stac Pac is an all weather 5-in-1 adventure pack designed to help you carry everything you need for the day and nothing that you don't.  It can be expanded depending on what you need for the trip and then fully packed into its pocket.

 

Stac Pac: 5-in-1 All Weather Adventure Pack

5 variations in one pack - 1 litre to 6 litres of volume.

4 ways to wear it - chest, back, waist front or waist back.

An internal drinks holder - 500ml bottle or 2 x 330ml cans.

Can hold a 13inch laptop when fully expanded.

Loops to carry things externally using carabiners.

Waterproof and very durable fabric.

Packs into pocket when not in use.

 As seen on:

Why the Stac Pac?

We're two friends that have worked together at various companies and projects over the last decade.  We've travelled to many countries and done all kinds of adventures, but we're minimalists at heart.  This led to a few realisations that we felt needed to be solved:

1) We got fed up of carrying too much stuff in backpacks.

2) We were frustrated at losing things from our pockets.

3) We wanted to remember our reusable water bottles.

4) We were becoming obsessed with our smartphones.

5) We wanted to carry only what we needed for the day.

Our goal is to carry only what we actually need. Surprisingly this isn't a huge amount for most trips: drinks; a layer; snacks; a few tools; sunscreen (or rain gear).  So, we decided to create the ultimate day pack for adventures.  It took way longer than we planned (COVID didn't help), but from every delay came a key learning, new feature or a better way of making it - the journey truly refined the pack.

We're super happy with how it turned out and really hope you are too.

What are the 5 packs?

1) Money Belt

A Money Belt at its smallest to carry phone, money, keys when you're travelling.

2) Waist Pack

A Waist Pack that can carry up to 3 litres or an iPad when fully expanded.

3) Sling

A Sling with a drinks holder that holds 2.5 litres + 0.5 litre bottle (or 2 cans).

4) Musette / Messenger Pack

The drinks holder doubles up to create a Musette or Messenger that holds 6 litres.

5) Packed

When not in use or travelling, it can be packed into its pocket.

The Key Features:

Made from durable and waterproof fabric with waterproof zips.

Internal drinks holder that holds a 500ml water bottle or two 330ml cans.

A smart pocket to protect your smartphone (and protect you from your smartphone).

Loops to carry things externally - shoes, layers or even the dog on a leash.

It can carry a 13 inch laptop when fully extended, perfect for meetings or commutes.

Heavyweight Organic Cotton Tee Shirt

We have created some awesome Stac tee shirts for the kind of people that love to get out there, rain or shine.  Coming from Scotland, this has always been our ethos and now we're excited to create products that help others do the same. 

Organic Cotton Stac T-Shirt

 *We'll offer further colours and sizes as part of the backer survey.

The Stac Team

Stac was started by Charlie and Hamish, who have worked together at various companies and projects over the last decade.  Seyi started as an intern after graduating from the University of Edinburgh and now leads on growth.  Charlie lives in Austin, Texas and Hamish lives in Ericeira, Portugal so the team are fully remote.  Hamish ran his first Kickstarter nearly ten years ago, so as a team have the necessary skills and experience to deliver successfully.  We hope you will join us for the journey.

Waistband Sizes

Some people will need two waistbands to comfortably wear the pack both on the waist and chest or back.  We tried many different ways to avoid this, but ultimately to provide the flexibility, size and volume this was a small sacrifice we had to make.  The following chart shows the rough size chart - if your waist is bigger than the minimum waist size and your chest is smaller than the maximum chest size, you can use one waistband.  Otherwise, we recommend two, you can add an extra one at the end.

Timelines

These timelines are based on our agreement with manufacturers.  We have produced various products so have experience in working with manufacturers to timelines.

if your waist is bigger than the minimum waist size and your chest is smaller than the maximum chest size, you can use one waistband.  Otherwise, we recommend two, you can add an extra one at the end.TimelinesThese timelines are based on our agreement with manufacturers.  We have produced various products so have experience in working with manufacturers to timelines. Get Your Project Funded Today!

story:
The short answer: It’s been good to us and we have fun with it!

After a bag designed by our founder, Malcolm Fontier’s, previous company appeared in the popular documentary, Minimalism, he and The Minimalists received thousands of requests to bring the bag back. To respond to the requests, we launched a crowdfunding campaign here on Indiegogo in 2017 that raised more than $2 million with the support of nearly 7,000 backers. Clearly, crowdfunding launched our brand. 

Those early backers made it clear that they enjoyed our transparent approach to business and being a part of the process of bringing products to market. We believe that the incredibly vibrant and engaged community that supports us is only possible through the collaborative nature of crowdfunding. 

Another benefit is improved inventory management which has huge environmental benefits.

So, it makes sense that we return to the crowd and all of you for most of our product launches. This is our 4th crowdfunding campaign, and we don’t plan to slow down.

 

We design all Pakt products to last you many years of adventures. To back that up, we stand behind all our bags, including The Anywhere Collection, with a lifetime warranty. This covers manufacturing defects and excessive damage occurring during normal use. Normal wear and tear from everyday use is not covered. We hope your bag is perfect, but if you notice a problem, just let us know and we will work with you to make things right.

 

Manufacturing products is tricky business. We have many years of product development experience and years of business history with the suppliers we currently use. So, we’re pretty good at accurately estimating timelines. That said, there is always the possibility of unexpected delays to any production timeline. If a delay were to arise, we pride ourselves on transparency and quickly updating our customers.

The products used in the photos and videos you see on the campaign are our pre-production samples. We produce a small batch to thoroughly test and launch the crowdfunding campaign. The products you receive will likely have slight changes–hopefully all for the better! We gather feedback from everyone on our team and our collaborators that test these products and then make improvements before starting the full production run.

All manufacturing partners and suppliers, including ours, have minimum order quantities that they will accept. If a product or color doesn’t sell enough units during crowdfunding, we may not be able to produce it. If that were to happen, you will have the option to get a refund or choose a different product or color.

story:
Light Where you Need It

  1. 350 lumens of bright light at the tips of your fingers!  Torch Ring is a unique wearable LED light. Wear it like a ring on your finger. 
  2. IPX4 water proof, adjustable, USB rechargeable and extremely light-weight at 70 grams.
  3. Get the best of both worlds! Torch Ring balances the best functions of headlamps and flashlights. Gain the versatility of a flashlight, but with the grip-free convenience of a headlamp.

Meet Torch Ring

A Powerful LED Light For Runners

If you see better, then you will run better. Designed with runners in mind, this light will give you improved depth perception and freedom of control.

With its ergonomic and compact design, Torch Ring slides right on your finger for grip-free comfort and uses state-of-the-art LEDs that brighten your path with 350 lumens of bright light.

Silicone adjusters allow for a tight fit on your finger. You don't hold Torch Ring. You wear it. 

Why Torch Ring?

Have you ever wanted to go for a quick run at night or in the early morning?

However, your running path is dark and drivers and bikers are busy trying to get where they are going.

You need to light up the path ahead and alert others of your presence.

Torch Ring is perfect for you.

You Just Wear it on Your Finger

Torch Ring is wearable. (You don't hold it!)

Torch Ring is Head-Free. ( Torch Ring illuminates where you point it, not where you are looking. Enjoy your freedom of control. Combine with a headlamp for added brightness)

And best of all,  Torch Ring is super easy to use. 

You just wear it on your finger. That's it.

Imagine that you can achieve your exercise goal even when you are being busy at work.

Imagine that you can always go get some fresh air before bedtime.

 

The Torch Ring makes your night time activities more enjoyable and more comfortable.

Towards a great sense of accomplishment that awaits you ...

May the Torch Ring be with you for your adventure.

 

 Light up any trail - TorchRing uses a single powerful LED for optimal brightness and battery efficiency. Reach up to 150 feet with up to 350 lumens of bright light!

You choose where to light up with the simple movement of your hand. Illuminate the tree root on the trail ahead, alert the distracted driver on your left or simply be seen by others. The movement of your arms creates visibility and alerts cars and others of your presence.

Alert cars before you cross the street. 

Light up and avoid tree roots on your path. 

 

Wide & Spot Beam

Torch Ring creates an illumination tunnel.

You can see both of your sides and front.  People or drivers can't miss you even from your behind.

Torch Ring brightness reaches up to 150 feet ahead at maximum brightness.

 

●

Our hybrid lens uses a reflector and collimator lens to achieve a wide irradiation angle in combination with a spot beam to give you the best of both wide and focused beams. 

 

 Our durable and tough body is water resistant withstanding sweat and rain so that you can enjoy your Torch Ring in the rain or shine.   

Torch Ring has been third party tested and is IPX4 water proof. Use Torch Ring with confidence!

Have you ever run with a friend only to blind them with your head lamp? Light up the exact spot you desire and save your friend's eyes. The power button is always within reach to dim or turn off as needed. 

Wear Torch Ring like a championship ring. Hold out your hand for all to see - a simple ring with a light on top. The battery is hidden in the palm of your hand in an ergonomic shape that fits the curvature of your fingers. Designed large enough to pack serious juice, but small enough to disappear.

Let’s face it! Headlamps are limited to illuminating the path in front of you and only at a predetermined fixed angle. However, runners also need to illuminate side streets and alert cars without necessarily turning your head.

Torch Ring is the solution. It gives you the versatility to illuminate the exact spot you desire leading to a better quality run. 

 

Easy-to-press Button

Torch Ring is compact yet designed with a big & easy-to-press button. 

Four Simple Settings

 350 lumens - the brightness you want for any situation

 175 lumens - brighten up your camp and tent

 80 lumens - extend your outdoor adventure

 Strobe - gain attention and be seen even in the daytime 

 

Efficient Design

Torch Ring uses a constant current driver which pulls current at a constant rate from the battery to power the LED. More current means a brighter light. An LED flashlight without a constant current driver has variable current as the LED heats up and current begins to drop. Lower current means the LED dims with the flip side of increased run times. 

The graphic below illustrates Torch Ring versus two competitor flashlights. Competitor 1 drops off quickly, but maintains a long runtime. Competitor 2 drops off slowly with time and has a middle ground run time. 

As a passionate user of our own products, we have aimed to cut through the BS and provide a constantly bright flashlight that does what it says it does. Our time lapse tests confirm Torch Ring is delivering constant brightness. 

 

Four silicone rings allow adjustment to optimize the fit of Torch Ring to your fingers. With an over sized main ring, Torch Ring downsizes with silicone inserts to fit your finger size. For winter running remove the inserts and Torch Ring will still fit with your winter running gloves.

Use on your left or right hand. Torch Ring fits both hands equally well.

 

Ergonomic weight distribution design

The torch ring is super lightweight. It's as light as 70g.

The light part fits comfortably on your fingers and the battery part fits comfortably in your palm, making it feel lighter than it really is .

 

 

Torch Ring uses USB Type C technology and includes a  power cable to charge your light quickly. 

One of our core principles is to minimize resources and maximize use in a strive towards sustainable product design. Our rechargeable batteries last for approximately 1000 cycles. A single non-rechargeable batteries (an equivalent CR123A) costs approximately $2 and ends up in the garbage after use. Over the life-cycle of our product you’ll save over $1300 and keep more than 650 batteries out of landfills. Multiply this number by the number of Torch Ring customers and we can make a significant environmental contribution.

 

Torch Ring / USB cable (type C) / Four silicon adjuster

 

In Production

Torch Ring is currently in the final stages of production. We have signed off on the mass production sample. Toolings and molds are complete. LEDs are ordered. Packaging design is complete. Our special Indiegogo price will not last much longer!

 

MEDIA

The successful Torch Ring on the US crowdfunding Kickstarter has been featured in various media outlets.

 

Special Price Only for INDIEGOGO

Thank you for reading all the way down here! 

We have a limited special offer only for awesome INDIEGOGO backers. Please take this chance and enjoy your night time activity!

 

 We spent two years developing our concept for Torch Ring, searching for manufacturing partners, optimizing the battery size with LED output, and then adapting our design for mass production. 

A look at the images below gives an idea of where we started (big and ugly) to where we ended up (compact and stylish). 3D printing services such as Shapeways has been hugely valuable for us to test and tweak our design. 

 Ever since the birth of his first son (already nine years ago!) Kevin has been a run commuter as he balances work and family. 

Tomoko is a mother of two children who never wants to give up on running and she finally qualified for the 2021 Boston Marathon. 

The two of us launched Runbell - a bike bell for runners - on Kickstarter in May of 2014. We met—and then exceeded—our goal, raising $25,000 and attracting almost 700 supporters. Since then, numerous magazines and television shows have run feature stories on Runbell, including the Today Show and The Gadget Man.

We are excited to introduce our second invention.

Runbell LLC

Runbell is a small startup company  based in Oregon, USA.

We plan and manufacture unique and affectionate products with the aim of making driving more enjoyable.

"Torch Ring" is our second and latest project.

Living in the northwestern United States, where nature is abundant, we utilize the spirit of "knowing enough" in our manufacturing. A design that incorporates the functions that are really required as simply as possible. There is honesty and honesty that is not greedy over-engineering.

We will earnestly strive to make things, thinking of the days when our products cross the sea far and run through the beautiful cities, mountains, beaches, and bring a joy to you.

If you have any opinions or requests, please feel free to let us know.

Thank you for your support.

The battery is hidden in the palm of your hand in an ergonomic shape that fits the curvature of your fingers. Designed large enough to pack serious juice, but small enough to disappear.Let’s face it! Headlamps are limited to illuminating the path in front of you and only at a predetermined fixed angle. However, runners also need to illuminate side streets and alert cars without necessarily turning your head.Torch Ring is the solution. It gives you the versatility to illuminate the exact spot you desire leading to a better quality run.  Easy-to-press ButtonTorch Ring is compact yet designed with a big & easy-to-press button. Four Simple Settings 350 lumens - the brightness you want for any situation 175 lumens - brighten up your camp and tent 80 lumens - extend your outdoor adventure Strobe - gain attention and be seen even in the daytime  Efficient DesignTorch Ring uses a constant current driver which pulls current at a constant rate from the battery to power the LED. More current means a brighter light. An LED flashlight without a constant current driver has variable current as the LED heats up and current begins to drop. Lower current means the LED dims with the flip side of increased run times. The graphic below illustrates Torch Ring versus two competitor flashlights. Competitor 1 drops off quickly, but maintains a long runtime. Competitor 2 drops off slowly with time and has a middle ground run time. As a passionate user of our own products, we have aimed to cut through the BS and provide a constantly bright flashlight that does what it says it does. Our time lapse tests confirm Torch Ring is delivering constant brightness.  
Four silicone rings allow adjustment to optimize the fit of Torch Ring to your fingers. With an over sized main ring, Torch Ring downsizes with silicone inserts to fit your finger size. For winter running remove the inserts and Torch Ring will still fit with your winter running gloves.
Use on your left or right hand. Torch Ring fits both hands equally well.
 
Ergonomic weight distribution design
The torch ring is super lightweight. It's as light as 70g.
The light part fits comfortably on your fingers and the battery part fits comfortably in your palm, making it feel lighter than it really is .

 
 

Torch Ring uses USB Type C technology and includes a  power cable to charge your light quickly. 
One of our core principles is to minimize resources and maximize use in a strive towards sustainable product design. Our rechargeable batteries last for approximately 1000 cycles. A single non-rechargeable batteries (an equivalent CR123A) costs approximately $2 and ends up in the garbage after use. Over the life-cycle of our product you’ll save over $1300 and keep more than 650 batteries out of landfills. Multiply this number by the number of Torch Ring customers and we can make a significant environmental contribution.


 

Torch Ring / USB cable (type C) / Four silicon adjuster
 
In Production
Torch Ring is currently in the final stages of production. We have signed off on the mass production sample. Toolings and molds are complete. LEDs are ordered. Packaging design is complete. Our special Indiegogo price will not last much longer!


 
MEDIA
The successful Torch Ring on the US crowdfunding Kickstarter has been featured in various media outlets.



 
Special Price Only for INDIEGOGO
Thank you for reading all the way down here! We have a limited special offer only for awesome INDIEGOGO backers. Please take this chance and enjoy your night time activity!  We spent two years developing our concept for Torch Ring, searching for manufacturing partners, optimizing the battery size with LED output, and then adapting our design for mass production. A look at the images below gives an idea of where we started (big and ugly) to where we ended up (compact and stylish). 3D printing services such as Shapeways has been hugely valuable for us to test and tweak our design.  Ever since the birth of his first son (already nine years ago!) Kevin has been a run commuter as he balances work and family. Tomoko is a mother of two children who never wants to give up on running and she finally qualified for the 2021 Boston Marathon. The two of us launched Runbell - a bike bell for runners - on Kickstarter in May of 2014. We met—and then exceeded—our goal, raising $25,000 and attracting almost 700 supporters. Since then, numerous magazines and television shows have run feature stories on Runbell, including the Today Show and The Gadget Man.We are excited to introduce our second invention.Runbell LLCRunbell is a small startup company  based in Oregon, USA.We plan and manufacture unique and affectionate products with the aim of making driving more enjoyable."Torch Ring" is our second and latest project.Living in the northwestern United States, where nature is abundant, we utilize the spirit of "knowing enough" in our manufacturing. A design that incorporates the functions that are really required as simply as possible. There is honesty and honesty that is not greedy over-engineering.We will earnestly strive to make things, thinking of the days when our products cross the sea far and run through the beautiful cities, mountains, beaches, and bring a joy to you.If you have any opinions or requests, please feel free to let us know.Thank you for your support.

story:
Too heavy to carry a 12V refrigerator when you out in the travel? Want a versatile refrigerator at a more affordable price? ICECO introduces the new and upgraded iCooler, 62 quart, packed with the features you've never seen before. This is a complete upgrade of the JP42 iCooler with more built-in functions to make your journey more comfortable and convenient.

As an outdoor enthusiast, ICECO knows the importance of a well-bulit eletric cooler. Get this mobile iCooler and say good bye to the messy cooler with soggy food and the continuous need to purchase ice.

Be ready to walk on a rough road and easily pull the refrigerator despite the fact that it weighs 100lbs. You can open up the table board that is attached on the fridge and enjoy the great outdoor lifestyle with friends and family. This was the original idea for the ICECO’s mobile iCooler and now it’s finally coming out!

Overview

✅ 3 in 1 Mobile Refrigerator. Fridge/Freezer/Cooler
✅ PreciseTemperature Control : 0℉-50℉ (-18℃~+10℃)
✅ Car & Home Use: 12V/24V/110V/220V
✅ Keep Ice Cold for 90+ hours Even when Power Off
✅ Safety: 40° Anti-Shake, Energy Saving, Car Battery Protection, Rotomolding Design
✅ Mulitifunctional: Detachable wheels, removable table

The mobile iCooler is designed to solve the problem of constant melting ice and soggy  food when using a traditional cooler while on the road. You can now fill up with your refrigerator up to 100lbs and move it at ease without any worry. So, what are you waiting for? Pick an ICECO mobile iCooler for your next trip.

 

Freezer or Fridge

Set the iCooler to 32F or higher to use it as a fridge. You can adjust temperature levels upon your preference to keep your food fresh. Deep cooling to 0F will turn your iCooler into a freezer. The JP60 mobile refrigerator is the answer to keep your food stored for longer trips, make your drinks ice cold during hot weathers and even to make ice.

Cooler Box

Unlike other coolers and fridges, mobile iCooler is a refrigerator using the rolling molding process, one-step forming, with less gap and thickened foam to achieve excellent heat, preservation effect that ensure ice keep icey.

Construction

Virtually indestructible roto-molded construction. there are ventilation on three sides of the refrigerator to help ventilate and dissipate heat.

Cup Holder

Attached cup holder that maximizes the use of the space for easily-accessible beverage handling.

 

Removable Cutting Board

A preparing board to cut fresh fruits and vegetables for kids and adults, it can be connected to refrigerator tightly and holds in place for you to use this board steadily.  A mobile station in outdoors that you can use anytime and anywhere.

Detachable wheels

Detachable wheels make moving easy.You can install the wheels when you load a lot of stuff in refrigerator, just need to pull the prepared rope handle to move it easily. 

Detachable wheels make moving easy. You can install the wheels when you load a lot of stuff in refrigerator, just need to pull the prepared rope handle to move it easily. 

 

Bottle Opener/Fish Measuring Ruler

The built-in bottle opener can help you open your drinks anytime and anywhere. The thoughtful design of the fish measuring ruler makes it more convenient for measuring the length of fish in the field.

 

The insulation of iCooler is up to 2 inches, improving its ability to hold ice ice-y when using it as a cooler. From 50 to 0, it takes 110 hours. (no-load state, ambient temperature 77F).

 

Dimension

 

 

Power Source

JP60P mobile refrigerator can plug into 12/24V DC power directly, and connect to the 110/240V AC via AC adapter, you can also plug it into portable battery or any other similar power stations.

Operating Temperature

 

 

 

There are two choices for you to select JP60P:

1. Basic version without wheel: JP60P with all accessories

 

 2. JP60P with Wheel (include all accessories)

 

We will make our best to promptly deliver the JP60P to you, here is our shipping time:

Pursue progress and achieve results: ICECO have been committed to the research and development of portable fridge, seeking to provide better solutions for those who are want to keep their daily food fresh and drinks cold on the move. 

Frank (Founder): ICECO is inspired by Frank, an expert in developing  refrigeration and road life with more than 15 years, he seeks to provide more cooling and preservation solutions for those who on the move.

Benny (Chief Product Officer): When you add an extra machine in car, you need to make sure everything goes well. Benny's consideration is to ensure that the fridge are not interfered with the operation of vehicle.

Rain (Product Manager):  ICECO iCooler was designed by the winner of Reddot Award and IDEA Award, Rain, who has over 10 years working on production and test for the portable fridge.

ICECO team is formed with decades of experience in developing, manufacturing and distributing portable freezers. ICECO performs their duties in a professional manner. we have a professional after-sales team in the US devoting to provide the best service to our customers.

 

 

Help us spread around the world

story:
The original PANGEA BAMBOO TRAVEL TOWEL was a great success — but we wanted to make it better. We listened to your feedback and improved it to create The BEST Outdoor Towel on the Planet.
 


 

NEW FUNCTIONS!

We added reinforced slits on the corners. Now you can use your towel as a sunshade or cloak to prevent sunburns! Created by the PANGEA Backers Club
 


 

 



 

 



5 Pouch Bag options. 4 towel color options. Creating 20 different combinations. Mix and Match however you want! 
 


 

​

 



 

 


 

 


 


 

Just cleaning up trash by hand isn’t enough to solve the problem.

We need an innovative solution — and we found one that works.

The Sungai Watch barriers were developed by a team of European environmentalists and engineers based in Bali. These wildlife-safe devices continuously block and remove trash from rivers, preventing it from washing into the ocean. Each barrier blocks an average of 20t of trash per year!


Sungai Watch is a cleanup organization founded by Gary Bencheghib. Their mission is to protect waterways and prevent trash from entering our oceans by placing trash barriers.

They include the participation of local children to maintain the trash removal of the barriers. This empowers the next generation to help fight the plastic epidemic and spread sustainability within communities. 



If this campaign reaches $100,000, you will help us build and place a trash barrier in the most polluted river in Bali. If together we raise $200,000 we can start placing barriers in the Citarum river, the most polluted river in the world!



 


All the trash collected will be classified and audited by Sungai Watch. The data will be presented to corporations, consumers, and the Indonesian government to facilitate political changes against the greatest polluters.

All trash will be sent afterward to recycling facilities to be repurposed or composted when possible.


Indonesia is the second-largest ocean polluter in the world and the largest contributor to ocean waste per capita.

 

DID YOU KNOW?

By tackling the rivers in Indonesia, we make the most effective contribution to prevent ocean waste around the world. 


 





We are an eco-brand and movement founded by Marcos, William, and Juan, three travelers that met backpacking in Mexico in 2018. We teamed up to explore the world together, and after seeing so much pollution on our planet, we decided to start organizing cleanups and use business as a force for good to fight the problem.

That’s why we created PANGEA, a brand for other nature lovers like us. Our mission is to develop unique ecological products for the outdoors, and use the funds to clean the world!

We launched our first Kickstarter campaign in December 2019, and thanks to your support we were able to expand our cleanups worldwide during 2020!

 



 


 


 


Microfibers are the #1 contributor to microplastics in our oceans.

story:
Video From Happy Backer Using His HoverGlide While Hiking the Austrian Alps!

   

As a biology professor at the University of Pennsylvania and expert in muscle function and biomechanics, Dr. Lawrence Rome, the inventor of HoverGlide was asked by the Office of Naval Research to try to reduce the large loads Special Operation Forces have to carry. The solution was his patented Suspended Load Technology (SLT), which allows the carried load to seamlessly move up and down with respect to the person walking or running. This keeps the load at a constant height with respect to the ground. It looks like magic or computer generated imagery, but it’s science.

How does it work?

While standing still, a 50 lb load in your backpack exerts 50 lbs of force (static weight). This changes when you walk or run, where the peak force exerted on you can be up to 3x the weight you are carrying.  Suddenly a 50lb pack can put as much force on the body and joints as if it weighed 150 lbs. With the movement of SLT, this additional force over and above the static weight can be reduced by as much as 86%! For more details, watch the video above. 

 For those who need more space so they can carry more. This pack is on a larger 24” frame. 

The “Trekker” is our largest model and holds a capacity of up to a whopping 55 liters. Rugged, tough, and ready for the challenge of carrying your gear, this pack is primed and ready for backcountry adventures and  securely holds enough equipment and food for two to three-day trips. Featuring a sleeve that works as a hydration reservoir, as well as thoughtfully designed pockets and zippers, your gear and travel essentials will not only be secure, they will be easy to access no matter where you may roam.

  • Permits you to suspend up to 50 lbs (more weight can be carried but the pack must be locked)
  • Hipbelt pockets keep digital devices, snacks, and maps secure and easy to locate
  • Pockets in the lid keep an insulation layer and other light item organized and accessible
  • Internal sleeve holds a two-liter reservoir for hydration on the move
  • Dedicated bottom compartment holds and protects sleeping bag
  • Harness and hip belt are constructed of closed cell foam covered in  a 3D breathable "air mesh" to wick water away  
  • Nylon ripstop pack material combines durability and lightweight
  • DWR (durable water repellent) finish protects contents from light rain and moisture
  • Empty pack weighs only about 9 lbs  

The HoverGlide “Commuter,” “Hiker,” and “Tactical” Backpacks all fit onto the same size frame and can be switched out depending on your needs.

              **Please note that The Trekker is only offered on a 24” frame and will not fit onto the 20” frame. There are plans for future bags that will fit on the 24” frame.**  

The “Tactical” means business! Ideal for first responders, military personnel and anyone tackling long training runs, the primary purpose of this pack is to lesson the impact on your body even when the stakes are high.  The “Tactical” pack makes heavy supplies easier to carry, especially under more stressful situations that require running, climbing stairs, or other activities that cause heightened physical exertion.

  • 30L capacity sized 
  • Permits you to suspend up to 25 lbs (more weight can be carried but the pack must be locked)
  • Main compartment carries clothing layers, bivy gear, first aid, and off-trail work materials
  • Easy-access secondary pocket stores lunch and layers
  • Internal organization holds smartphones, GPS units, pens, documents, and maps secure and easy to locate
  • External stash pocket keeps emergency clothing layers instantly accessible
  • Harness and detachable padded hip belt are constructed of closed cell foam covered in  a 3D breathable "air mesh" to wick water away 
  • Internal sleeve holds a two-liter reservoir for hydration on the move
  • Webbing grid on back panel accepts MOLLE units to expand capacity and organize essential gear
  • Exceptionally durable 1000D Cordura pack material resists tears and abrasion and holds weights.
  • DWR (durable water repellent) finish protects contents from light rain and moisture   

Ready for a day on the trails? The “Hiker” was made just for you. With enough room to hold your gear, hydration, and other essentials, this pack is your go-to for shorter trips. Featuring an external stash pocket, you’ll have easy access to an extra change of clothes, snacks, or whatever else you need to get to in a hurry. But, don’t worry, your wallet and keys will be safe and sound in the security pocket built for your more sensitive items.

  • 30L capacity holds gear, food, and clothing for a day on the trail 
  • Permits you to suspend up to 25 lbs (more weight can be carried but the pack must be locked)
  • Internal sleeve holds a two-liter reservoir for hydration on the move
  • Easy-access secondary pocket stores and organizes digital devices, maps, guidebooks, and trail necessities
  • Internal zippered security pocket holds your keys and wallet 
  • Low-profile zippered external pocket is great for sunscreen, camera, or sunglasses
  • External stash pocket keeps emergency clothing layers instantly accessible
  • Harness and detachable padded hip belt are constructed of closed cell foam covered in  a 3D breathable "air mesh" to wick water away 
  • Compression straps secure your gear and minimize pack sway
  • Haul loop at top makes grab-and-go a breeze 
  • 200D pack material is lightweight, resists tears and abrasion
  • DWR (durable water repellent) finish protects contents from light rain and moisture 

The “Commuter” features a patented 20” modular frame design that allows users to easily switch out other of our smaller bag types, including the “Hiker” and the “Tactical” packs. With an eye towards comfort and holding up to 30 liters, this pack is your go-to for  daily commuting, day hikes, cross-training, and as the perfect pack for a first responder. 

  • 28L capacity
  • Permits you to suspend up to 25 lbs (more weight can be carried but the pack must be locked)
  • Perfect for work and commuting
  • Easy-access secondary pocket stores and organizes digital devices, documents, and work tools
  • Low-profile top pocket is great for keys, wallet, and transit passes
  • Two side pockets hold water bottles, a travel umbrella, or a light shell jacket
  • Harnesses are constructed of closed cell foam covered in a 3D breathable "air mesh" to wick water away. 
  • Compression straps secure your gear and minimize pack sway
  • External webbing loops accept bicycle safety lights
  • Haul loop at top makes grab-and-go a breeze 
  • Canvas-look 300D pack material resists tears and abrasion
  • DWR (durable water repellent) finish protects contents from light rain and moisture   

The HoverGlide has gone through scientific and durability testing to ensure it's incredibly effective while also tough enough to withstand the needs of the United States military, 

DURABILITY TESTING   

 Smash Test

Throw Test

ROAD TESTED

Our operational consultant, former Force Recon Marine Sgt. Shawn Carmody decided to put HoverGlide to the test by running in the Marine Corps Marathon in Washington, DC while wearing a prototype of the tactical pack filled with 20lbs.  He likes to say he ran his fastest marathon while wearing the HoverGlide, and he did, although, to be fair it was his first and only Marathon. 

In 2002 Dr Larry Rome, received a call from the Office of Naval Research-explaining that Special Forces were in Afghanistan carrying over 20 lbs of  batteries in addition to the 80 lbs already in their backpack. They asked if there was a way to capture the troops’ locomotory movements and convert those movements into electricity which would recharge a small rechargeable battery and reduce carried weight.  

Rome, a professor of Biology at the University of Pennsylvania and an expert in muscle function and biomechanics, invented the Suspended Load Technology (SLT) in which the load can move up and down with respect to the person walking. Adding a generator, the SLT pack generated considerable electricity with normal movement – a 1000-fold increase over previous attempts (20 Watts vs 20 milliwatts).  

Rome filed patents and founded Lightning Packs in 2004. Rome’s team announced this discovery in the journal Science which received international acclaim. Rome noticed that all the subjects in the study preferred walking and running with the SLT pack rather than with normal packs. So he took out the generator and developed a non-electrical version of  the SLT pack - which eventually became HoverGlide. The pack reduced accelerative forces during walking and running 82-86% and reduced joint pain and metabolic rate. The study was published in the journal Nature in 2006.From athletes getting more out of their training to those with mobility issues have an easier time carrying a backpack while walking, HoverGlide’s focus is to reduce force on joints.
 

 Lightning Packs received funding from the Office of Naval Research,  US ARMY, National Institutes of Health and US Small Business Innovation Research Grant in 2006. This extended through 2016 to focus on the Electricity-Generating SLT pack with the team delivering over 130 packs to the USMC and US ARMY. In 2016, the team decided to focus again on what has become the ergonomic, non-electrical “HoverGlide.” Along the way, Lightning Packs has been awarded 5 US, 3 Canadian, 2 European and one Australian Patent.

The HoverGlide “Commuter,” “Hiker,” and “Tactical” Backpacks all fit onto the same size frame and can be switched out depending on your needs.              **Please note that The Trekker is only offered on a 24” frame and will not fit onto the 20” frame. There are plans for future bags that will fit on the 24” frame.**  The “Tactical” means business! Ideal for first responders, military personnel and anyone tackling long training runs, the primary purpose of this pack is to lesson the impact on your body even when the stakes are high.  The “Tactical” pack makes heavy supplies easier to carry, especially under more stressful situations that require running, climbing stairs, or other activities that cause heightened physical exertion.
30L capacity sized 
Permits you to suspend up to 25 lbs (more weight can be carried but the pack must be locked)
Main compartment carries clothing layers, bivy gear, first aid, and off-trail work materials
Easy-access secondary pocket stores lunch and layers
Internal organization holds smartphones, GPS units, pens, documents, and maps secure and easy to locate
External stash pocket keeps emergency clothing layers instantly accessible
Harness and detachable padded hip belt are constructed of closed cell foam covered in  a 3D breathable "air mesh" to wick water away 
Internal sleeve holds a two-liter reservoir for hydration on the move
Webbing grid on back panel accepts MOLLE units to expand capacity and organize essential gear
Exceptionally durable 1000D Cordura pack material resists tears and abrasion and holds weights.
DWR (durable water repellent) finish protects contents from light rain and moisture   
Ready for a day on the trails? The “Hiker” was made just for you. With enough room to hold your gear, hydration, and other essentials, this pack is your go-to for shorter trips. Featuring an external stash pocket, you’ll have easy access to an extra change of clothes, snacks, or whatever else you need to get to in a hurry. But, don’t worry, your wallet and keys will be safe and sound in the security pocket built for your more sensitive items.
30L capacity holds gear, food, and clothing for a day on the trail 
Permits you to suspend up to 25 lbs (more weight can be carried but the pack must be locked)
Internal sleeve holds a two-liter reservoir for hydration on the move
Easy-access secondary pocket stores and organizes digital devices, maps, guidebooks, and trail necessities
Internal zippered security pocket holds your keys and wallet 
Low-profile zippered external pocket is great for sunscreen, camera, or sunglasses
External stash pocket keeps emergency clothing layers instantly accessible
Harness and detachable padded hip belt are constructed of closed cell foam covered in  a 3D breathable "air mesh" to wick water away 
Compression straps secure your gear and minimize pack sway
Haul loop at top makes grab-and-go a breeze 
200D pack material is lightweight, resists tears and abrasion
DWR (durable water repellent) finish protects contents from light rain and moisture 
The “Commuter” features a patented 20” modular frame design that allows users to easily switch out other of our smaller bag types, including the “Hiker” and the “Tactical” packs. With an eye towards comfort and holding up to 30 liters, this pack is your go-to for  daily commuting, day hikes, cross-training, and as the perfect pack for a first responder. 
28L capacity
Permits you to suspend up to 25 lbs (more weight can be carried but the pack must be locked)
Perfect for work and commuting
Easy-access secondary pocket stores and organizes digital devices, documents, and work tools
Low-profile top pocket is great for keys, wallet, and transit passes
Two side pockets hold water bottles, a travel umbrella, or a light shell jacket
Harnesses are constructed of closed cell foam covered in a 3D breathable "air mesh" to wick water away. 
Compression straps secure your gear and minimize pack sway
External webbing loops accept bicycle safety lights
Haul loop at top makes grab-and-go a breeze 
Canvas-look 300D pack material resists tears and abrasion
DWR (durable water repellent) finish protects contents from light rain and moisture   
The HoverGlide has gone through scientific and durability testing to ensure it's incredibly effective while also tough enough to withstand the needs of the United States military, DURABILITY TESTING    Smash TestThrow TestROAD TESTEDOur operational consultant, former Force Recon Marine Sgt. Shawn Carmody decided to put HoverGlide to the test by running in the Marine Corps Marathon in Washington, DC while wearing a prototype of the tactical pack filled with 20lbs.  He likes to say he ran his fastest marathon while wearing the HoverGlide, and he did, although, to be fair it was his first and only Marathon. In 2002 Dr Larry Rome, received a call from the Office of Naval Research-explaining that Special Forces were in Afghanistan carrying over 20 lbs of  batteries in addition to the 80 lbs already in their backpack. They asked if there was a way to capture the troops’ locomotory movements and convert those movements into electricity which would recharge a small rechargeable battery and reduce carried weight.  Rome, a professor of Biology at the University of Pennsylvania and an expert in muscle function and biomechanics, invented the Suspended Load Technology (SLT) in which the load can move up and down with respect to the person walking. Adding a generator, the SLT pack generated considerable electricity with normal movement – a 1000-fold increase over previous attempts (20 Watts vs 20 milliwatts).  Rome filed patents and founded Lightning Packs in 2004. Rome’s team announced this discovery in the journal Science which received international acclaim. Rome noticed that all the subjects in the study preferred walking and running with the SLT pack rather than with normal packs. So he took out the generator and developed a non-electrical version of  the SLT pack - which eventually became HoverGlide. The pack reduced accelerative forces during walking and running 82-86% and reduced joint pain and metabolic rate. The study was published in the journal Nature in 2006.From athletes getting more out of their training to those with mobility issues have an easier time carrying a backpack while walking, HoverGlide’s focus is to reduce force on joints.  Lightning Packs received funding from the Office of Naval Research,  US ARMY, National Institutes of Health and US Small Business Innovation Research Grant in 2006. This extended through 2016 to focus on the Electricity-Generating SLT pack with the team delivering over 130 packs to the USMC and US ARMY. In 2016, the team decided to focus again on what has become the ergonomic, non-electrical “HoverGlide.” Along the way, Lightning Packs has been awarded 5 US, 3 Canadian, 2 European and one Australian Patent.

story:
Beach days are about making memories, and with integrated solar power you’ll always have the charge ready on your devices to capture your special moments. A handy pocket in the roof of the Hub houses the solar panels, powering two USB outputs which sit neatly in a pocket above the door. Store the power in a battery for later, or use it to power your devices directly - keep the music going, keep the lights lit, and never miss another moment.

**Available as an add-on perk, or as part of the Deluxe Package**

No beach kit is complete without a towel, so we've created the world's biggest beach-towel to use as the flooring of your Beach Hub. Ninety square feet of comfort underfoot, stretching from corner to corner of the Beach Hub, with special spot outside for you to lounge on with a drink. This quick-drying, ultra-absorbent, sand-free towel is an essential addition to your beach day.  

**Available as an add-on perk, or as part of the Deluxe Package**

There aint no party like a Beach Hub party! Our LED lighting kit contains ten metres of lighting, with special loops positioned around the canopies of the tent so you can cover the entire structure in light. Use the remote control to choose from 365 colours and various effects and get the mood just right - warm sunset glow, winking fireflies or all-out disco party.

 **Available as an add-on perk, or as part of the Deluxe Package**

Instant setup can be done by one person in under sixty seconds - all you need to do is release the control strap and unfold the canopies - presto! your Beach Hub is born! If you like following steps then we've included on-tent guidance and if the wind is up then we've got a steps to beat that too, making the Beach Hub even easier and more versatile than you expected.

The takedown is the hard part right? Wrong . The Beach Hub has five easy steps baked into its body, and all completed in two minutes flat. These colour-coded guide spots mean that anybody can master the takedown right off the bat. It takes one person around 120 seconds to complete the takedown, meaning more beach time!

There isn't a beach tent out there that you can truly relax in - that's why we created the Beach Hub - the biggest instant beach shelter in the world. There's enough space for six people to hang out, it's got headroom to stand up in, twisting room to get changed for a swim, table room for a sunset banquet and plenty of space to just sit back and watch the waves. Size is everything ;-) 

Nothing is more important than making sure you’re safe from sunburn and our materials are specially designed with protection from ultraviolet rays. The Beach Hub boosts your seaside safety by blocking up to 98%* of UV radiation. And with four doors, you can always choose the direction of your protection.

You don't want to wilt in the high noon heat either, and the Beach Hub is ready to keep you cool as a cucumber. Climate control fabrics maintain the heat in the tent, so you can truly chill out. 

Nobody likes a rainy beach, and if you do get surprised by a summer shower then the Beach Hub is the perfect spot to be in, with waterproof fabrics throughout to keep you safe and dry inside.  

When it’s time to adventure away from the Hub, you need to be sure that your valuables are safe. Beat the pickpockets with the lock pocket, which comes with two keys, plenty of room, and gives you the confidence to head for the waves without looking back.

Ice-cool drinks and fresh food are served courtesy of the built-in cool pocket, which uses multi-layered isothermal foam insulation to maintain the temperature of your food and drink , so you can always reach for a cool one. 

Where do you put your wet beachwear? Throw it into into our dry bags and & keep it from soaking your other stuff. The pop open dry bags fold down smaller than a tangerine and are open in second, ready for you to throw in your wet things to deal with when you get home.

The Beach Hub has plenty of them - six in fact - with spades of room to store your beach toys, drinks, day clothes and more.

Dropping anchor at the beachside is easy, with specially designed pegs that grip the sand and counterweight sand-bags built into the body of your Beach Hub. This is why we’re happy to certify the Beach Hub for winds of up to 50km/h (31mph). Our guy ropes are reflective too, which means less trips at your beach parties.

Got a bigger gang? Connect your beach Hubs together for double the space and double the fun. Each Beach Hub can connect to another, so you can connect two, three, eight, or a thousand. This makes the Beach Hub perfect for BBQs, beach parties or just for big families. 

The Beach Hub has been a long time in the making. We’ve combined expertise in tent making and technology with a love of the beach to make what we think is the perfect companion for days and days of sun and sand.

We’ve involved a large community of beach enthusiasts to get the best of their know-how and experience and to make sure that our product is beach-ready as soon as it arrives with you. Numerous features, from the counterweight sandbags and anchors, toppermost UPF protection and towel flooring have come about as a direct result of their input and testing.

We’ve spent all summer testing it, and the product you see in the video is ready to go, but we have left a few minor details undetermined so that we can involve our kickstarter community in how their product turns out. To kick-start production we’ve ensured that all tech elements (such as the solar power pack, towel materials and the LED) have been tested, finalized and priced. As the campaign progresses we’ll gather your feedback on how you’d like to see the color ways and a couple of other final tweaks before we press the go button. With your help we can make something exceptional. 

 

 

We have secured the best possible rates for the Beach Hub, which is larger than regular packages. And with shipping partners in the US, EU and Australia, our backers in these regions will be charged a standard rate with no extra VAT or duty charges. 

 

For more accurate pricing, just check the postage calculator when you pledge. Please note that there will be a surcharge to areas such as Hawaii and Alaska. In all cases of surcharges and taxes we will you contact you well  before we ship your product to arrange any payment.

Numerous features, from the counterweight sandbags and anchors, toppermost UPF protection and towel flooring have come about as a direct result of their input and testing.
We’ve spent all summer testing it, and the product you see in the video is ready to go, but we have left a few minor details undetermined so that we can involve our kickstarter community in how their product turns out. To kick-start production we’ve ensured that all tech elements (such as the solar power pack, towel materials and the LED) have been tested, finalized and priced. As the campaign progresses we’ll gather your feedback on how you’d like to see the color ways and a couple of other final tweaks before we press the go button. With your help we can make something exceptional. 
 

 
EU
 

 
We have secured the best possible rates for the Beach Hub, which is larger than regular packages. And with shipping partners in the US, EU and Australia, our backers in these regions will be charged a standard rate with no extra VAT or duty charges. 
 

 
For more accurate pricing, just check the postage calculator when you pledge. Please note that there will be a surcharge to areas such as Hawaii and Alaska. In all cases of surcharges and taxes we will you contact you well  before we ship your product to arrange any payment.
 

 

By backing us on Indiegogo you become part of the team, and the first rule of Team Beach Hub is to create the ultimate beach hub! A big part of getting this is facing the unknowns of the process. As part of the team we want to involve you in this, and for you to be ready too.
You're joining a fantastic team, full of experience and skill and deep beach love. We have veteran crowdfunders, who have delivered $1.6 million of crowdfunded products. We have trusted manufacturers with a completed prototype, able product designers, crack customer experience experts and logistics know-alls. We have planned and scheduled, double checked and underlined.
However, crowdfunding, and product development is a process - it happens in real-time and is subject to chance and circumstance, and we want you to be aware that there may be hitches in the road. We’ve had hitches before, and we’ve overcome each and every one of them, but a packaging error, a part malfunction or a global pandemic - these things can and do happen - and they pose challenges to our project. As part of the team, you can leave all that to us, but do be aware that delays are possible and when you support a crowdfunded project, they can be part of the ride.
We're also backing our product, and your Beach Hub will arrive with a 12 month warranty on all faults. What we can't do, though, is refund your pledge for a delay in the project or if you change your mind. When you back a crowdfunding project you support a process - a way of making a great idea happen - and it's not quite the same as purchasing a product in a shop. We're going to use your support to create the product you see before you, and we're going to do a fantastic job of it, but to do that we need to count on your support in a way that's slightly different from a shop purchase and we hope that - as a part of the indiegogo community - you understand that.
We fully expect to deliver your Beach Hub in time for Summer 2021 and for the duration of the project we’ll be sending you a bimonthly newsletter to keep you updated on where the project is at and where we’re headed.

story:
QuenchSea is a groundbreaking, low-cost, portable, manually-powered device that instantly turns seawater into drinkable freshwater

So how does QuenchSea Work?
 
QuenchSea has been independently tested and proven to turn seawater into fresh drinking water. See our test, witnessed by TÜV NORD, below. You can also read our witness report here: 
Witness Report TUV NORD

Independent Witness Test of
Quench Sea Prototype by TUV Nord

Operating since 1869, TÜV NORD is one of the largest and most respected independent inspection, certification and testing organisations in the world.
 

But how does it taste?
Sea you can drink!

QuenchSea is an innovative technology that combines a hydraulic system, triple pre-filtration and a small reverse osmosis membrane to desalinate seawater into freshwater using manual human power. At sea or on the coast, convert seawater into clean fresh drinking water instantly
 

In ideal conditions, QuenchSea can produce 6 litres of water within one hour. It is the size of a conventional iron and weighs less than a kilogram. See our more detailed product specifications below

   

Our aim is to exceed your expectations at every level and keep you fully updated on our journey, from finalising product development, manufacturing and delivery to sharing the impact we will make globally.

 

As Featured In

Community Support and Comments

The Cause Behind QuenchSea

Two thirds of the world’s population live in water scarce regions and over seven million die each year from water-related diseases. We hope this product launch can go some way to solving that. It is our mission to donate 100 million QuenchSea devices by 2027 and impact over 1 Billion people.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
There is nothing so powerful as an idea whose time has come

Victor Hugo

story:
The F.100 is a versatile and powerful flashlight built from the ground up for your next adventure - high-powered 1000 lumen CREE LED, fast charging enabled, magnetic lanyard, and an adaptable mounting system, the F.100 is the sort of torch you can take with you anywhere.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Unique, yet familiar: we've put a lot of work into making the F.100 fit your life, from carrying it in your bag, to looping it on a belt, to hanging it in your tent. It can throw out 1000 lumens to light up your night, charge itself quickly and even charge your tech.

It's everything you never knew you wanted - and more.

 

 

Phone about to die?? No charger around? How often does that happen to us all...

The F.100 can charge your phone and get you out of trouble. Camping, driving, or just about town, you can rest assured you have your power needs covered.

Equipped with a USB-C port under the tail cap, it delivers a 5V 1A supply to your tech. 

 

 

It also comes with a 2600mAh rechargeable battery which can be swapped out. Need more capacity? Just bring along another battery - a great way to customise your charging needs.

 

 

The latest innovation in fast-charging technology, Power Delivery lets you charge your flashlight's battery 50% in 30 minutes. No longer do you have to wait hours. Even when you forget to charge before your trip, a quick top up can get you out of trouble.

 *requires a PD enabled cable + charger

 

 

POWER PACK ADD-ON (OPTIONAL)

Get the most out of power delivery (PD) with a PD cable + PD charger.  These are available in our ADD-ON section below.

 

 

The F.100 is paired with an intuitive magnetic mounting system, powered by strong rare-earth neodymium magnets. The holder easily snaps onto any steel surface making the F100 at home, from the fridge to the workshop shelves.

 

 

BIKE HANDLEBAR MOUNT

But that's not all - we've made a handlebar mount for all you cyclists out there. With a matching neodymium magnet, attaching your newly minted bike light is as simple as dropping it into place.

 

 

 

Turning your night into day comes from the high powered CREE XP-L V6 LED. This powerhouse delivers 1000 lumens at the touch of a button.

 

 

 

* Please note that currently there are supply challenges around LED's and as such we have the Luminus SST-40 as an alternative.

 

Every F.100 comes with a unique magnetic lanyard giving you the freedom to carry the way you want. Made from 550-paracord, it's magnetic bead allows you to quickly connect to everything from belts to bags.

Need some directional light? 

Slide the lanyard up the body to point the light where you need it. 

 

 

 

Thumb activated, anti roll and tail stand all in one.

Easily cycle through your light modes with the push of your thumb and when you lay it down you don't need to worry about it rolling away. The lanyard design stops any accidental rolls and the flat end also allows you stand it up vertically (perfect for those times when you want some reflective illumination).

 

 

The F.100  is rated to IPX6 which gives you all you need for the everyday challenges of life. Dirt, dust, water and mud are no match. Simply wash your torch clean at the end of an adventure (no need to worry as it can handle momentary immersions).

 

 

 

Hard-anodizing creates a corrosion-resistant surface with the hardness of high-strength steel which does not chip, flake or peel...in short, tough as nails.

 

 

The F.100 will be launching in 3 color options: BLACK, SILVER + ORANGE

Because of the hard anodized finish these colors will stand the test of time. No need to worry about making a decision now - you can let us know about which color you'd like after the campaign.

So why not get one of each? 

 

 

The F.100's had quite the journey since we first dreamed it up in early 2020, and in that time it's gone through quite a few iterations. Here's a quick walk down memory lane. 

 

 

Are you ready to get on board and pre-order your F.100? Select the pledge that best suits you, and we'll take it from there. Remember, all color selections will be available on your backer survey when we release it soon after the campaign ends.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Want to know a little (or a lot) more about the F.100 and it's accessories?

Here are the details. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping & Taxes

 

Shipping, Taxes (and VAT / GST) will be calculated and paid for before we ship out our product to you. This keeps costs down since we will know how many units we are sending to each shipping zone after the campaign ends.

You will be responsible for paying local Tax and duties when applicable. You will not always be required to pay duties or import tax, but it is important that you make yourself aware of the duties that apply in your country in case you are charged.

The F.100 is light enough to keep shipping costs to a minimum and we are working hard to provide you with the best possible rates, especially during this challenging COVID19 time. You will find below our shipping costs estimations. The rates below are considering a 1x F.100 pledge.

 

 

After the campaign ends, you will receive an email from BackerKit (and multiple followups if needed) to select your final order choices and pay any additional shipping costs.

* BREXIT SPECIAL REQUIREMENT - Due to recent changes we are required to charge and collect VAT for the UK. This will be done through Backerkit after the campaign has finished.

 

 

 

We are partnering with ShipBob to handle fulfilment and shipping for most (if not all) of the pledges. They're no strangers to e-commerce and crowdfunding, so you can rest assured your pledge will be in good hands. In addition all pledges shipped via Shipbob will be covered by a 20 day domestic US, and a 30 days international guarantee.

If you don't receive your pledge within that timeframe once you receive tracking then we will dispatch another to you free of charge. How's that for piece of mind.

 

 

 

Want to hear more, get exclusive deals and stay up to date with what we're doing? Follow us on instagram and sign up to the newsletter on our website to get in the loop.
